NK057(shi)001:1: // rgyud rgyal gsang ba snying po'i 'grel pa rong zom chos bzang gis mdzad pa bzhugs so //
NK057(shi)001:2: dkon cog gsum gyi rang bzhin byang chub sems //
NK057(shi)001:3: de stsol bla ma de rgya lhag pa'i lha //
NK057(shi)001:4: de dbang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas pa la //
NK057(shi)001:5: phyag 'tshal de gsung lam dang sgrub bcas la'o //
NK057(shi)001:6: sems kyi rang bzhin byang chub rin po che //
NK057(shi)001:7: rgyal dang grol rnams dbyer med tshul gcig kyang //
NK057(shi)001:8: 'khrul snang dbang la don ltar ma grub ste //
NK057(shi)001:9: thugs rje skyabs ldan rnams kyis gzung du gsol //
NK057(shi)001:10: dus kyi mnar ba'i gang zag bdag lta bus //
NK057(shi)001:11: dka' don zab mo gzhig par mi 'os kyang //
NK057(shi)001:12: bdag rjes 'brang ba'i don phyir gsol btab pas //
NK057(shi)001:13: dpyad par shes bzhin nan gyis bris pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:14: gdams ngag brjed dang log par rtogs pa dang //
NK057(shi)001:15: gzhung sgo so so'i lta ba 'dzin pa yis //
NK057(shi)001:16: sgro dang skur ba'i gnas su gyur to 'tshal //
NK057(shi)001:17: 'phags dang mkhas pas bzod pa bzhes par mdzod //
NK057(shi)001:18: rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
NK057(shi)001:19: mtshan nyid dang rgyud dang lung thams cad kyi spyi /
NK057(shi)001:20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba /
NK057(shi)001:21: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
NK057(shi)001:22: thams cad ma lus par 'phros te /
NK057(shi)001:23: 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi tshul ni /
NK057(shi)001:24: ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po /
NK057(shi)001:25: phyogs bcu'i dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK057(shi)001:26: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid
NK057(shi)001:27: / ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa'i chos
NK057(shi)001:28: thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med
NK057(shi)001:29: pa'i bdag nyid chen po'i ngang las /
NK057(shi)001:30: g.yo ba'i rtsol ba dang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' bzhin du /
NK057(shi)001:31: sngon gyi smon lam dang thugs rje chen po lhun
NK057(shi)001:32: gyis grub pa'i shugs dang shes rab chen po'i stobs
NK057(shi)001:33: kyis / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par gyur pa'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:34: gdul bya rnams kyi dkar po'i las kyi bag chags kyi rgyu las /
NK057(shi)001:35: sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa sna tshogs pa gdul bya so so'i ngo gang la snang ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:36: dper na lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi gnas man chad nas /
NK057(shi)001:38: mtho ris kyi gnas rnams su /
NK057(shi)001:39: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi rkyen char so sor 'bab pa yang /
NK057(shi)001:41: gnas so so'i nam mkha'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:42: 'gro ba so so'i las kyi rgyu las /
NK057(shi)001:43: char so sor 'bab pa 'grub pa yin yang /
NK057(shi)001:44: rgya mtsho'i lha yang 'di snyam du bdag gis ni
NK057(shi)001:45: gnas 'di rnams su so so'i las kyi skal ba
NK057(shi)001:46: dang 'tshams par sprin 'di lta bu bsdu bar bya'o
NK057(shi)001:47: // glog 'di lta bu dbyung bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:49: char 'di lta bur dbab par bya'o snyam du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog /
NK057(shi)001:51: nam mkha' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis 'gro ba
NK057(shi)001:52: 'di dag gi 'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung ba'i char
NK057(shi)001:53: 'bab pa'i go skabs dabye'o snyam du mi rtog /
NK057(shi)001:56: 'gro ba so so'i las kyi bag chags kyang 'di
NK057(shi)001:57: snyam du bdag gis las kyi skal ba dang 'tshams
NK057(shi)001:58: pa'i char dbab par bya'o snyam du mi rtog /
NK057(shi)001:60: mngon par mi rtsol bzhin du /
NK057(shi)001:61: rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa'i dbang gis gnas de rnams su
NK057(shi)001:62: so so'i las kyi skal ba dang 'tshams pa'i sprin
NK057(shi)001:63: 'du ba nas char 'bab pa'i bar du so sor
NK057(shi)001:64: 'byung ba ni / lha'i dbang po dbang sgyur gyi
NK057(shi)001:65: gnas su gser gyi snying po lta bu'i sprin 'du
NK057(shi)001:66: 'byung ba ni / ba dang / de bzhin du
NK057(shi)001:67: glog dang 'brug rnams kyang tha dad du 'byung zhing
NK057(shi)001:68: char yang rang bzhin tha dad du 'bab pa nas
NK057(shi)001:69: 'byung ba ni / ba dang / / 'dzam bu gling gi bar du yang de bzhin te /
NK057(shi)001:70: sprin rnams kyang mu tig dmar po lta bu nas /
NK057(shi)001:71: ri nag po brtsegs pa lta bu'i bar dang /
NK057(shi)001:72: glog kyang gser kha sbyangs pa nas /
NK057(shi)001:73: rin po che an+da rnyil 'od 'phro ba lta bu'i bar dang /
NK057(shi)001:74: 'brug kyang ka la ping ka'i dbyangs lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:75: rol mo'i sgra dbyangs lta bu nas /
NK057(shi)001:76: rgya mtsho 'khrug pa lta bu'i sgra'i bar dang /
NK057(shi)001:77: char yang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char nas /
NK057(shi)001:79: chu dang ba'i char gyi bar du so so'i las
NK057(shi)001:80: kyi skal ba dang 'tshams par so so tha dad
NK057(shi)001:82: gdul bya so so'i ngo gang la byin rlabs tha dad par snang zhing /
NK057(shi)001:83: dkon cog gsum gyi rang bzhin tha dad du mthong ba ni 'di lta ste /
NK057(shi)001:84: theg pa thun mong du grags pa'i sangs rgyas dkon cog /
NK057(shi)001:85: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK057(shi)001:86: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
NK057(shi)001:87: pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes
NK057(shi)001:88: bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba bla na med
NK057(shi)001:89: pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa zhes bya
NK057(shi)001:90: ba'i yon tan gyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan gyis brjod
NK057(shi)001:91: pa / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi sku dang bdag nyid //
NK057(shi)001:92: rtsa ba'i sku dang 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku dang bcas pa /
NK057(shi)001:93: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyis bsdus pa /
NK057(shi)001:94: rab tu byung ba'i cha byad 'chang ba /
NK057(shi)001:95: skyes pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa /
NK057(shi)001:97: mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:98: yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:99: sangs rgyas dkon cog go zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:101: dam pa'i chos thog mar dge ba /
NK057(shi)001:109: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba la legs par gsungs pa /
NK057(shi)001:111: mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:113: dge 'dun la yang 'phags pa'i dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa /
NK057(shi)001:116: lta ba dang dad pa mi phyed pa /
NK057(shi)001:117: mchod gnas kyi dpal gyi zhing /
NK057(shi)001:120: skyes bu zung bzhi dang gang zag ya brgyad kyis bsdus pa zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:121: theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i gzhung las grags pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:122: sangs rgyas dkon cog yon tan gyi mtshan gong du smos pa lta bus brjod pa /
NK057(shi)001:123: ye shes bzhi dang chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i
NK057(shi)001:124: dbang gis chos lnga'i bdag nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa
NK057(shi)001:125: dang / 'phrul ba'i sku dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya dang /
NK057(shi)001:126: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:127: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya bas bsdus pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad dang /
NK057(shi)001:128: rab tu byung ba'i cha byad 'chang ba /
NK057(shi)001:129: skyes pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa /
NK057(shi)001:131: gtso bo du ma pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:132: chung ngu'i rgyud kyis bsdus pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:133: sangs rgyas dkon cog ces 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:134: chos dkon cog kyang ji skad smos pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:135: theg pa chen po'i gzhung dang lam dag mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:138: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa'o zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:139: gzhan yang gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa thun mong du grags pa'i sangs rgyas dkon cog /
NK057(shi)001:140: ji skad smos pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan gyis brjod pa /
NK057(shi)001:141: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum mam bzhi'i bdag nyid chos nyid dag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:143: byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha dang bcas pa /
NK057(shi)001:146: rdo rje'i rigs gsum gyis bsdus pa /
NK057(shi)001:147: longs spyod rdzogs pa dag sprul pa dang zhi ba
NK057(shi)001:148: dang khro bo'i cha byad 'chang ba rig sngags dang
NK057(shi)001:149: gsang sngags kyi gzugs su bzhugs pa /
NK057(shi)001:150: gtso bo dang 'khor dang gcig dang du ma dang /
NK057(shi)001:151: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor dang snying po'i dkyil 'khor la
NK057(shi)001:152: sogs pa'i bye brag gis dkyil 'khor che chung rnams
NK057(shi)001:153: su yongs su dag pa chen po'i lha rgyud du
NK057(shi)001:154: gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas dkon cog ces 'dod do
NK057(shi)001:155: // chos dkon cog kyang ji skad smos pa'ang /
NK057(shi)001:156: gsang ba bla na med pa'i gzhung dang lam dang bcas pa'o zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:157: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun yang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /
NK057(shi)001:158: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
NK057(shi)001:159: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:161: gzhan yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi gzhung las grags
NK057(shi)001:162: pa'i sangs rgyas dkon cog gong du smos pa'i yon
NK057(shi)001:163: tan gyi mtshan gyis brjod pa /
NK057(shi)001:164: ye shes lnga dang gsum dang bzhi'i mtshan nyid chos nyid dag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:166: byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis rang bzhin khyad par can dang /
NK057(shi)001:167: khyad par can ma yin pa'i lha dang bcas pa /
NK057(shi)001:168: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
NK057(shi)001:170: rdo rje dang pad+ma dang nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang
NK057(shi)001:171: gis rigs bzhi'am lngas bsdus pa longs spyod rdzogs pa
NK057(shi)001:172: dang / sprul pa dang zhi ba dang khro bo'i cha byad 'chang ba /
NK057(shi)001:173: snying po dang phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi gzugs su bzhugs pa /
NK057(shi)001:174: gtso bo dang 'khor dang gcig dang du ma la /
NK057(shi)001:175: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:177: chos dang las kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK057(shi)001:178: phyag rgya bzhi pa dang gcig pa la sogs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:179: bye brag gis dkyil 'khor chen po dang chung ngu
NK057(shi)001:180: rnams su yongs su dag pa chen po'i lha rgyud
NK057(shi)001:181: du gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas dkon cog ces 'dod
NK057(shi)001:182: do // chos dang dge 'dun gyi tshul yang gsang ba spyi'i tshul bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:183: gzhan yang rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul la grags pa'i sangs rgyas dkon cog /
NK057(shi)001:184: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po /
NK057(shi)001:185: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK057(shi)001:186: kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid
NK057(shi)001:187: ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad
NK057(shi)001:188: dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med
NK057(shi)001:189: pa'i rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag
NK057(shi)001:190: nyid chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa yon tan
NK057(shi)001:191: gyi mtshan gyis brjod pa ye shes chen po drug
NK057(shi)001:193: zag pa dang bcas pa zag pa med pa'i chos
NK057(shi)001:194: thams cad dbyer med par sku gsung thugs rdo rje
NK057(shi)001:195: lta bu'i dkyil 'khor du ye nas lhun gyis grub
NK057(shi)001:197: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lnga dang /
NK057(shi)001:198: byang chub sems kyi dbang gis rigs drug gis bsdus
NK057(shi)001:199: pa longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa dang zhi
NK057(shi)001:200: ba dang khro bo'i cha byad 'chang ba /
NK057(shi)001:201: thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i rgyan chen
NK057(shi)001:202: po la rol pa chen po'i gzugs su bzhugs pa
NK057(shi)001:203: / gtso bo dang 'khor dang gcig dang du ma
NK057(shi)001:204: dang sku dang gnas dang spyod yul lta bu la
NK057(shi)001:205: / / chos thams cad ye nas mngon par rdzogs
NK057(shi)001:206: pa sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin dbyer med cing gcig
NK057(shi)001:207: dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyis dus bzhi
NK057(shi)001:208: mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings nas sku gsung thugs lhun
NK057(shi)001:209: stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs pa ni
NK057(shi)001:210: sangs rgyas dkon cog go zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:211: chos dang dge 'dun gyi tshul yang thun mong du bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:212: ji ltar gsang ba spyi'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:213: thun mong ma yin par bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:214: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid chos te /
NK057(shi)001:215: dge 'dun gyi rang bzhin yang de nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:216: des na rgyu dang 'bras bu dang lam dang sgrub
NK057(shi)001:217: pa rnams dbyer med pa ni kun tu bzang po
NK057(shi)001:218: byang chub sems zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:219: de nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po
NK057(shi)001:220: rdo rje sems dpa' gdod ma nas sangs rgyas pa
NK057(shi)001:222: rnal 'byor thams cad kyi gtso bo zhes grags pa gang yin pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:223: rnam par 'phrul pa'i dbang du bshad na /
NK057(shi)001:224: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun du sprul pa'ang yod de /
NK057(shi)001:225: 'di ltar phyag rgyar sprul pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:226: gang zag tu sprul pa rnams so //
NK057(shi)001:227: chos dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas su 'phrul pa'ang yod de /
NK057(shi)001:228: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang gzungs rnams
NK057(shi)001:229: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' legs par sprul
NK057(shi)001:230: pa lta bu'o // dge 'dun chos dang sangs rgyas su 'phrul pa yang yod de /
NK057(shi)001:231: slob pa'i sa la gnas pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrub pa lta bu'o //
NK057(shi)001:232: 'di lta bu la sogs pa dag bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:233: theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i gzhung
NK057(shi)001:234: bzung nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phrul pa gdul bya
NK057(shi)001:235: la ji ltar snang ba'i tshul theg pa so so'i
NK057(shi)001:236: gzhung las grags pa mdo tsam bstan pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:237: de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs spyir snang
NK057(shi)001:238: ba de dag gi gzhi yang rnam par bzhi ste
NK057(shi)001:239: / de yang gzhung kha cig ni rtsod gzhi med pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:240: kha cig ni rtsod gzhi dang bcas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:241: de la gzhi rnam pa bzhi ni /
NK057(shi)001:242: dang po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gong du
NK057(shi)001:243: bstan pa'i tshul lnga po de dag ji ltar smos
NK057(shi)001:244: pa bzhin du ldan pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:245: gdul bya'i dbang la snang ba tsam yang ma yin no zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:246: gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ni
NK057(shi)001:247: lus dang gnas dang spyod yul du snang ba ni
NK057(shi)001:248: mi mnga' 'o // dee dag ji lta ba dang
NK057(shi)001:249: ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes don dam pa
NK057(shi)001:250: dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i yul can rnam par
NK057(shi)001:251: mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang dag pa 'jig rten
NK057(shi)001:252: pa'i ye shes manga'o zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:253: gsum pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dag pa
NK057(shi)001:254: 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyang mi manga'o zhes 'dod
NK057(shi)001:255: do // de la rtsod gzhi med pa ni theg
NK057(shi)001:256: pa chung ngu'i gzhung 'dzin pa rnams ni byang chub
NK057(shi)001:257: sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa'i lus ni bdag
NK057(shi)001:258: tu lta ba dang srid pas bskyed pa'i so so'i
NK057(shi)001:260: des srid pa de la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
NK057(shi)001:261: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs te mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas /
NK057(shi)001:262: 'di yang ji ltar bstan pa bzhin 'dod pa la rtsod gzhi med do //
NK057(shi)001:263: theg pa chen po nyan thos dang thun mong gi tshul ltar na yang /
NK057(shi)001:264: byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa tha ma pa'i lus ni smon lam gyis bsgrub pa'i lus yin te /
NK057(shi)001:265: lus 'di lta bu len pa'i rgyu yang bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags dang /
NK057(shi)001:266: gnas kyis sa'i ma rig pas bskyed par 'dod pa yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:267: ji skad bstan pa bzhin sangs rgyas nyid la ldan par 'dod pa'i phyir rtsod gzhi med do //
NK057(shi)001:268: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam pa dang bcas par smra pa'i gzhung ltar na yang /
NK057(shi)001:269: phyi rol gyi don sems las gud na med na
NK057(shi)001:270: yang sems nyid las dang gnas dang spyod yul lta
NK057(shi)001:271: bu'i rnam par snang bar skye ba yin la /
NK057(shi)001:272: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:273: mngon par zhen par dang bral ba'i ye shes gzugs kyi sku dang /
NK057(shi)001:275: de'i rgyan la sogs par yod par snang bar 'dod la rtsod pa'i gzhi med do //
NK057(shi)001:276: rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam pa med par smra ba'i
NK057(shi)001:277: gzhung ltar na yang khams gsum pa'i sems kyang don
NK057(shi)001:278: ltar snang ba'i rnam pa dang bral ba yin la
NK057(shi)001:279: / snang ba ni sems de nyid dang gzhan du brjod du med pa'i bag chags te /
NK057(shi)001:280: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i dus na bag
NK057(shi)001:281: chags yongs su dag nas ye shes rnam pa dang
NK057(shi)001:282: bral ba skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid rgyun 'brel par
NK057(shi)001:284: gzugs kyi sku la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad
NK057(shi)001:285: par yang sngon gyi smon lam dang thugs rje chen
NK057(shi)001:286: po'i shugs dang / ye shes chen po'i dbang gis
NK057(shi)001:287: dpag bsam gyi shing dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu
NK057(shi)001:288: rin po che ltar 'gro ba'i don yon tan 'byung
NK057(shi)001:289: bar 'dod pas 'di la'ang rtsod pa'i gzhi med do
NK057(shi)001:290: po'i shugs dang / // rtsod gzhi dang bcas pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:291: gang dag dbu ma dang gsang sngags kyi gzhu 'dzin
NK057(shi)001:292: pa rnams don dam par chos thams cad spros pa
NK057(shi)001:294: kun rdzob tsam du sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mi 'gog
NK057(shi)001:295: par yang smra bas tshul 'di dag la brten nas
NK057(shi)001:296: / sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas lugs kyang tha dad par smra ste /
NK057(shi)001:297: de'i gzhi la'ang tha dad par smra'o //
NK057(shi)001:298: de la mdo sde dbu ma pa'i tshul ni kun
NK057(shi)001:299: rdzob nyan thos mdo sde pa dang tshul mthun par
NK057(shi)001:300: smra bas 'di'i rtsod pa ni mi dpyad do //
NK057(shi)001:301: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma dang /
NK057(shi)001:302: gsang sngags kyi tshul 'dzin pa dag gi rtsod gzhi dang po ni /
NK057(shi)001:303: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni /
NK057(shi)001:304: tshul lnga'i skabs su ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nyid kyi rgyud la ldan pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:305: de la kha cig ni gsang sngags la grags pa'i gzhung bzung nas /
NK057(shi)001:306: sangs rgyas la chos 'di ltar ldan par smra ste /
NK057(shi)001:308: bde ba kun gyi mchog rigs mnyam med ye shes gzugs //
NK057(shi)001:309: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog min //
NK057(shi)001:310: bdag nyid kun tu rtag gnas srid gsum mchog gsum gzugs //
NK057(shi)001:311: dpal ldan tshad med bde ba'i rgya mtsho mi 'gyur bas //
NK057(shi)001:312: bde chen bde skyed rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po la //
NK057(shi)001:313: 'gro ba gsum gyi gnyen 'gyur phyogs pas phyag 'tshal te //
NK057(shi)001:315: sangs rgyas rnams ni kun tu bzang po byang chub
NK057(shi)001:316: kyi sems rdo rje rdo rje 'chang chen po rdo
NK057(shi)001:317: rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ye shes lnga dang
NK057(shi)001:319: rtag tu da ltar byung ba lta bu'i sku mnga'
NK057(shi)001:320: ba longs spyod rdzogs pa chen po 'phrul pa thams
NK057(shi)001:322: rtag tu yongs su dag pa'i zhing khams na mi 'gyur bar bzhugs pa /
NK057(shi)001:323: btsun mo'i 'khor dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor na
NK057(shi)001:324: bde ba thams cad dang mi 'bral bar bzhugs te
NK057(shi)001:325: / bde ba de yang 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings
NK057(shi)001:326: rtogs pa de kho na nyid kyi don la dmigs
NK057(shi)001:327: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis mnyes pa'i bde
NK057(shi)001:328: / ba dang / yid bde ba dang ldan pa /
NK057(shi)001:329: gzugs la sogs pa'i spyi rol gyi 'dod pa'i bde ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:330: gzugs dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i bde ba la sogs te 'di ltar bde ba mchog dang ldan pa /
NK057(shi)001:331: bde ba zag pa med pa dang ldan pa /
NK057(shi)001:332: bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
NK057(shi)001:333: bde ba mi 'gyur ba dang ldan pa /
NK057(shi)001:334: bde ba chen po dang ldan pa /
NK057(shi)001:335: gdul bya thams cad la bde ba skyed pa dang ldan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:336: de bas na bde ba chen po pa zhes bya'o zhes nges par 'dzin no //
NK057(shi)001:337: kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung bzung
NK057(shi)001:338: nas btsun mo'i 'khor la longs spyod pa ni smad
NK057(shi)001:340: sangs rgyas rnams la mi mnga' yi bsod nams kyi
NK057(shi)001:341: tshogs tshad med pa las bsgrubs pa'i rnam par smin
NK057(shi)001:342: pa'i sku ye shes chen po'i rten gyi bdag nyid
NK057(shi)001:343: yongs su dag pa'i zhing dang bcas pa nyid rdzogs
NK057(shi)001:344: par longs spyod pa'i bde ba dang bcas pa /
NK057(shi)001:345: ji ltar 'dul ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa 'di lta bu nges par 'dzin to //
NK057(shi)001:346: 'di gnyis ka yang kun rdzob tu rnal 'byor spyod
NK057(shi)001:347: pa ba rnam pa bden par smra ba'i gzhung la
NK057(shi)001:349: 'di ltar sems can gyi dus na yang phyi rol
NK057(shi)001:350: gyi yul la skye ba'i don gyi gzung 'dzin med
NK057(shi)001:351: kyang sems nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa lta bu'i
NK057(shi)001:352: rnam par skye ba yod pas /
NK057(shi)001:353: de bzhin du gnas gyur pa'i gnas skabs na yang
NK057(shi)001:354: ye shes rang snang ba'i sku dang zhing gi bkod
NK057(shi)001:355: pa dag yod do snyam du rtog go //
NK057(shi)001:357: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gzugs kyi sku dag ni mi mnga' ste /
NK057(shi)001:358: 'on kyang don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden
NK057(shi)001:359: pa'i yul can gyi ye shes rnam pa gnyis mnga'
NK057(shi)001:360: zhes rtog go // kha cig ni ye shes des
NK057(shi)001:361: kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi ba de ba'i bdag nyid
NK057(shi)001:362: nyams su myong ngo zhes kyang 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:363: tshul 'di rnal 'byor spyod pa ba rnam pa brdzun par smra ba'i gzhung la brten pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:364: 'di ltar sems can gyi dus na yang sems gzung
NK057(shi)001:365: 'dzin gyi rnam par skye ba'i de ltar bden pa
NK057(shi)001:367: sangs rgyas kyi gnas skabs na yang dag pa 'jig
NK057(shi)001:368: rten pa'i ye shes mnga' yang de ltar bden pa
NK057(shi)001:369: ni ma yin no zhes rtog go //
NK057(shi)001:371: sangs rgyas ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes tsam ste /
NK057(shi)001:372: yon tan snang ba thams cad de'i dbang gis 'byung ngo zhes nges par 'dzin te /
NK057(shi)001:373: tshul 'di yang rnal 'byor spyod pa ba rnam pa med pa la brten pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:374: de ltar rtsod gzhi gsum po 'di dag ni /
NK057(shi)001:375: chos thams cad la bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid du 'dzin pa las 'byung ba yin te /
NK057(shi)001:376: 'di ltar sems can gyi dus na snang ba'i dngos
NK057(shi)001:377: po rnams kyang bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid tsam
NK057(shi)001:378: yin la / sangs rgyas kyi sa na yang bden
NK057(shi)001:379: pa gnyis kyi tshul dang ldan no zhes rtog go
NK057(shi)001:381: sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa tsam ste /
NK057(shi)001:382: sku dang ye shes kyi bkod pa thams cad ni sngon gyi smon lam dang /
NK057(shi)001:383: thugs rje chen po'i shugs dang /
NK057(shi)001:384: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag par gyur pa'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:385: gdul bya rnams kyi dkar po'i bag chags kyi sa
NK057(shi)001:386: bon gyi dbang las byung ba rten med par 'byung
NK057(shi)001:387: ste / dper na drang srong smon lam grub pas
NK057(shi)001:388: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na smon lam btab pa rnams
NK057(shi)001:389: ste / / drang srong shi nas dus yun ring
NK057(shi)001:390: mo 'das kyang smon lam grub par gyur pa la
NK057(shi)001:391: brten mi dgos pa bzhin no zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:392: tshul 'di yang bden pa rnam pa gnyis dbyer med
NK057(shi)001:393: par 'dod pa'i gzhung thun mong ma yin pa la
NK057(shi)001:394: brten pa ste / 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi sa
NK057(shi)001:395: la rten med par ma zad sems can gyi dus
NK057(shi)001:396: na yang dngos po sna tshogs su snang ba la
NK057(shi)001:397: brten pa ste / rten med de / 'di ltar
NK057(shi)001:398: dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo las
NK057(shi)001:399: brten pa ste / rten med de / / sdug
NK057(shi)001:400: bsngal gyi rgyu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun
NK057(shi)001:401: tu rtog pa yin par bstan pa'i skabs su dris
NK057(shi)001:402: brten pa ste / rten med de / / pa
NK057(shi)001:403: / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog
NK057(shi)001:405: smras pa 'jig tshogs la lta ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:406: smras pa de'i rgyu gang yin /
NK057(shi)001:408: smras pa 'dod chags kyi rgyu gang yin /
NK057(shi)001:409: smras pa phyin ci log gi 'du shes so //
NK057(shi)001:410: smras pa de'i rgyu gang yin /
NK057(shi)001:412: smras pa rten med pa'i rgyu gang yin /
NK057(shi)001:413: smras pa btsun pa rten med pa la ni rgyu'i gnas med do zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:414: 'khor ba'i chos kyang rten med par 'byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:415: sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:416: mkha' la rlung brten de la chu yi phung po brten //
NK057(shi)001:417: de la sa chen 'di brten de la 'gro ba brten //
NK057(shi)001:418: sems can las la spyod pa'i rgyu ni de 'dra zhes //
NK057(shi)001:419: nam mkha' gang la gnas zhes don 'di brtags par bgyi //
NK057(shi)001:421: de la rten med pa de las 'byung ba ni dngos po yod pa'ang ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:422: ji ltar smig rgyu'i chu sngo ba dang g.yo ba
NK057(shi)001:423: dag la rten gyi 'byung ba chen po med par
NK057(shi)001:424: ma zad kyi / ji ltar snang ba de lta
NK057(shi)001:425: bu'i rang gi ngo bo 'byung ba'ang yod pa ma
NK057(shi)001:426: yin te long ba rnams kyi mun pa'ang de dang
NK057(shi)001:427: ma zad kyi / 'dra ste / de bas na
NK057(shi)001:428: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos sna
NK057(shi)001:429: tshogs su snang ba'ang rten dang rang gi ngo bo
NK057(shi)001:430: gnyis ka ma grub pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:431: sems can dang sangs rgyas gnyis ka'ang rang bzhin mnyam par smra'o //
NK057(shi)001:432: 'di ni theg pa chen po thun mong ma yin pa'i tshul yin te /
NK057(shi)001:433: de yang mtshan nyid thun mong ma yin pa ni
NK057(shi)001:434: chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar gzhag
NK057(shi)001:435: pa'i mtshan nyid tsam du 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:436: gang bden pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:437: ngo bo nyid gsum gyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:438: phyi dang nang gi skye mched rnam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:439: bardzusa te 'byung ba'i sems can gang zag gi mtshan
NK057(shi)001:440: nyid rnam par gzhag pa 'di rnams snang ba tsam
NK057(shi)001:441: la brten nas rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar gzhag
NK057(shi)001:442: pa'i mtshan nyid tsam yin par bye brag med do
NK057(shi)001:443: zhes 'dod do // de bzhin du rnam par grol ba yang thun mong ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:444: nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin nyid rnam par grol ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:445: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yang thun mong ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:446: khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba nyid rang byung gi ye shes so //
NK057(shi)001:447: zhing dang spyod yul yang thun mong ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:448: bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'i zhing khams yongs su
NK057(shi)001:449: dag pa 'di nyid kyang yongs su dag pa'i zhing
NK057(shi)001:450: khams so // de yang ji ltar zhe na dper
NK057(shi)001:451: na yi dwags kyis chu klung la rnag khrag tu
NK057(shi)001:453: chos can sa phyogs na mkha' dang bcas pa'i phyogs
NK057(shi)001:454: shig na brlan zhing gsher ba'i bya ba byed par
NK057(shi)001:455: snang ba'i thun mong gi snang ba ma log par
NK057(shi)001:456: mtshungs mod kyi / 'on kyang snang ba de dag
NK057(shi)001:457: pa dang ma dag pa'i tshul so sor snang ba
NK057(shi)001:458: mtshungs mod kyi / ste / 'di ltar yi dwags
NK057(shi)001:459: rnams la ni shin tu ma dag par snang ste
NK057(shi)001:460: brlan pa'i bya ba yang byed la /
NK057(shi)001:461: dbang po'i rgyun nyams par byed pa'i dri dang ro yang snang ngo //
NK057(shi)001:462: mi la sogs pa la ni cung zad ma dag
NK057(shi)001:463: par snang ste brlan pa'i bya ba yang byed la
NK057(shi)001:464: dbang po'i rgyun la yang mi gnod do //
NK057(shi)001:465: zhing dag pa na gnas pa'i gang zag rnams la
NK057(shi)001:466: ni dag par snang ste brlan pa'i bya ba yang
NK057(shi)001:467: byed la dbang po'i rgyun rgyal par byed pa'i dri
NK057(shi)001:468: dang ro dang yon tan phun sum tshogs pa dang
NK057(shi)001:469: ldan pa'i bdud rtsi btung bar yang snang la /
NK057(shi)001:470: kha zas kyi bya ba yang byed cing dam pa'i
NK057(shi)001:471: chos rgyud la skyed par yang byed de sangs rgyas
NK057(shi)001:472: kyi mdzad pa yang byed do //
NK057(shi)001:473: chos la dbang thob pa'i rig 'dzin dag la ni
NK057(shi)001:474: shin tu dag par snang ste chu de nyid yum
NK057(shi)001:475: m+aa ma k+ai'i skur snang ste /
NK057(shi)001:476: de la reg pas brlan pas tshim pa'i bya ba yang byed la /
NK057(shi)001:477: rol pa'i bde ba yang nyams su myong bar yang byed cing /
NK057(shi)001:478: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyud la skyed par yang byed do //
NK057(shi)001:479: bag la nyal yongs su zad pa rnams la ni /
NK057(shi)001:480: snang ba thams cad dang bral te spros pa thams cad yongs su zhi bar yang 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:481: de bas na 'di dag kyang rnam par sgrub pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid tsam yin te /
NK057(shi)001:482: rang rang gi bya ba byed par snang ba tsam yang mi bslu la /
NK057(shi)001:483: gzu bo'i blos gzhal na snang ba de dag kyang
NK057(shi)001:484: ji lta ji ltar dag pa de lta de ltar
NK057(shi)001:486: don 'di dag la 'jug pa'i gang zag gi blo yang thun mong ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:487: kha cig ni nyan thos chen po rnams kyi bslab lugs bzhin rjes su slob bo //
NK057(shi)001:488: kha cig ni sa chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su slob bo //
NK057(shi)001:489: kha cig ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su slob ste /
NK057(shi)001:490: 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i tshul la 'jug par byed do //
NK057(shi)001:491: de dag la sogs pa thun mong ma yin pa'i
NK057(shi)001:492: chos rnams la slob cing sbyong ba tshul bzhi pa
NK057(shi)001:494: de dag ni dkon cog gi tshul lnga bstan pa'i gzhi'i rnam pa bzhi brjod pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:495: da ni 'khor lo bskor ba de dag nyid brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:496: de ltar tshul sna tshogs kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag kyang /
NK057(shi)001:497: 'dul ba'i dbang gis theg pa lnga yi sgo nas
NK057(shi)001:498: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gsungs shing
NK057(shi)001:500: de dag las kyang grub pa'i mtha' lnga zhig ston te /
NK057(shi)001:501: de dag gi mthar thug pa ni dpal gsang ba'i
NK057(shi)001:502: snying po de kho na nyid nges pa 'di nyid
NK057(shi)001:503: yin no zhes shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:504: de la 'dul ba'i dbang gis ni gsung gis 'dul ba'i bye brag go //
NK057(shi)001:506: lha dang mi'i theg pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:507: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:508: rang byang chub kyi theg pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:509: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:510: gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:511: de la mi dang lha'i theg pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:512: 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma las /
NK057(shi)001:513: dge bcu spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa //
NK057(shi)001:514: 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu //
NK057(shi)001:515: tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa //
NK057(shi)001:516: tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no //
NK057(shi)001:517: zhes gsungs pa 'di nyid yin no //
NK057(shi)001:518: de la mi zhes bya ba'i nges tshig ni ma
NK057(shi)001:519: nu sha zhes bya ba bskal ba dang po'i mi
NK057(shi)001:520: lha las babs pa'i tshe skye rgu'i bdag po ma
NK057(shi)001:521: na zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
NK057(shi)001:522: gzhan rnams kyang de'i dbang gi byung bas ma nu sha zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:523: tshul 'di'i ni shed las skyes pa'i phyir mi zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:524: rnam pa gcig tu sha ma na kar zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:525: tshul bzhin du spyod par byed pa la bya /
NK057(shi)001:526: yang na sha ma ni 'dul ba'am nges pa /
NK057(shi)001:527: na ni tshig gi rkyen te nges pa'i phyir mi zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:528: yang ma na ni rlom sems pa'i bdag nyid de
NK057(shi)001:529: nga rgyal dang bcas pa'am nga rgyal 'dul bar byed
NK057(shi)001:531: lha zhes bya ba'i nges tshig ni de ba zhes
NK057(shi)001:532: bya ba de ba sa ste nyin bar gyi mtshan
NK057(shi)001:533: ma ring bas lha zhes bya /
NK057(shi)001:534: de bzhin du sgra de nyid kyis zhi ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:535: snang ba chen po'i sgron mer gyur ba dang bkra
NK057(shi)001:536: shis pa dang nyi ma ste de'i phyir lha zhes
NK057(shi)001:537: bya'o // yang de b+hi ha ya ste /
NK057(shi)001:538: nam mkha' la bya bas mtho ris pa'i lha rnams
NK057(shi)001:539: phal cher gyi khyim nam mkha' la gnam pa'i phyir
NK057(shi)001:540: lha zhes bya'o // gzhan yang a ma ra ste /
NK057(shi)001:541: bdud rtsi'i zas la longs spyod pas bar ma do'i 'chi ba'i rkyen nyung ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:544: lha ma yin la sogs pa bgegs kyi rigs kyis thub par dka' bas dpa' bo zhes kyang 'dren /
NK057(shi)001:545: tring shi kha zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:546: lha rnams lo sum cu'i tshad las rgan par mi 'gyur bas sum cu pa zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:547: lhag par bstan pa'i tshig la sogs pa de dag
NK057(shi)001:548: gis lha zhes bya ba'i nges pa'i tshig bshad par
NK057(shi)001:549: bya'o // nyan thos kyi theg pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:551: bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yi //
NK057(shi)001:552: ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i //
NK057(shi)001:553: rgyun zhugs la sogs rim pas sbyangs nas ni //
NK057(shi)001:554: nyon mongs dgra rnams zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro //
NK057(shi)001:556: 'di la yang nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba'i lta ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:557: dbang po dang yul 'phrad pa las skyes pa'i blo rnam pa med par skye bar 'dod cing /
NK057(shi)001:558: dbang po dang don yang gong bu dang mthun pa'i rdul phra rab rdzas su yod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:559: 'dus byas thams cad bdag med cing mi rtag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:560: mya ngan las 'das pa rtag par yong par lta ba /
NK057(shi)001:561: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po lam bsgoms pas /
NK057(shi)001:562: rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi 'grub ste /
NK057(shi)001:563: phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las
NK057(shi)001:564: 'das pa dang lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
NK057(shi)001:565: 'das pa'i dbyings su 'gyur bar 'dod do zhes 'byung
NK057(shi)001:566: ngo // mdo sde pa ni dbang po dang yul
NK057(shi)001:567: las byung ba'i blo rnam pa dang bcas par skye
NK057(shi)001:568: ngo // bar 'dod la / dbang po dang yul
NK057(shi)001:569: yang kha dog dang mthun pa'i rdul phra rab rdzas
NK057(shi)001:571: 'dus ma byas rnams kyang mo gsham gyi bu dang
NK057(shi)001:573: ji ltar bye brag tu smra ba bas rdzas su
NK057(shi)001:574: 'dod pa'i chos phal la rdzas med par rtogs so
NK057(shi)001:575: zhes 'byung ngo // ci'i phyir nyan thos zhes bya zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:576: pra ba ka zhes bya ba /
NK057(shi)001:577: pra ba ni nyan pa'i tshig ste /
NK057(shi)001:578: rang sangs rgyas ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' la mi brten pa ma yin gyi /
NK057(shi)001:579: 'bras bu thob kar yang sangs rgyas kyi lung la
NK057(shi)001:580: bstan cing nyan par byed pas na pra ba ka
NK057(shi)001:581: zhes bya'o // yang pra ba ka ni sgrog cing thos par bye pa'i tshig ste /
NK057(shi)001:582: rang sangs rgyas ltar ngag gi sgo nas chos mi ston pa ma yin gyi /
NK057(shi)001:583: rang gis thob pa'i 'bras bu gzhan la sgrog cing
NK057(shi)001:584: thos par byed pas pra ba ka zhes bya ste
NK057(shi)001:585: / 'di ltar don gnyis ming gcig la 'du ru
NK057(shi)001:586: mi rung bas ming gnyis kyi sgo nas gzhag ste
NK057(shi)001:588: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:590: phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes shing //
NK057(shi)001:591: dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug /
NK057(shi)001:592: dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs //
NK057(shi)001:593: byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog /
NK057(shi)001:596: nyan thos las khyad par du gzugs kyi phung po las bdag med par rtogs /
NK057(shi)001:597: tshul khrims kyi gzhi ni mthun /
NK057(shi)001:598: 'bras bu ni tshogs na spyod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:599: bse ru lta bur zhugs pa dang 'bras bur cas pa'i bye brag 'thob bo zhes 'byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:600: ci'i phyir rang sangs rgyas zhes bya zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:601: pra ta ka bud+d+ha zhes bya ba /
NK057(shi)001:602: pra ta ka ni so so rang rang la bya /
NK057(shi)001:604: de'i phyir nyan thos ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten gyi /
NK057(shi)001:605: rang gi byang chub rang gis rtogs pas rang sangs rgyas zhes bya /
NK057(shi)001:606: yang na nyan thos ltar rang gis thob pa'i 'bras bu gzhan la thob par mi byed kyi /
NK057(shi)001:607: ngag gi sgo nas chos mi ston pas rang sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:608: yang na byang chub sems dpa' ltar sems can mang
NK057(shi)001:609: po'i don du byang chub tu sems mi bskyed kyi
NK057(shi)001:610: / rang 'ba' zhig thar bar bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:611: yang rnam pa gcig tu pra ta ya ni rkyen /
NK057(shi)001:612: bud+d+ha ni rtogs pa'i tshig ste /
NK057(shi)001:613: rang sangs rgyas bskal pa du mar tshogs bsags pa'i las kyi mtha' la babs pa na /
NK057(shi)001:614: rkyen zhig gi dbang gis byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:615: des rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rgyu rkyen rnams rtogs par 'gyur pas rkyen rtogs zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:616: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:618: bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa'i //
NK057(shi)001:619: sa bcu rim gyis bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
NK057(shi)001:620: sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam //
NK057(shi)001:621: bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur //
NK057(shi)001:623: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:624: bod+hi sa t+wa zhes bya ba /
NK057(shi)001:625: bod+hi ni a ba bo d+hi ste /
NK057(shi)001:626: khong du chud cing rtogs pa'i tshig go //
NK057(shi)001:627: yang bo d+hi ni skyon dag cing byang ba la
NK057(shi)001:628: yang bya bas don des na byang chub zhes bya'o
NK057(shi)001:629: // sat+wa ni sgra don drug la 'jug ste /
NK057(shi)001:630: snying stobs ste zhe sdang dang /
NK057(shi)001:636: de las 'dir yang byang chub kyi phyir bsam pa
NK057(shi)001:637: brtan zhing mi nur ba yod pas byang chub 'dod
NK057(shi)001:638: pa dang / byang chub dang sems can la dmigs pa yod pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:639: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ni /
NK057(shi)001:640: sems can byang chub pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:641: gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:643: mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang //
NK057(shi)001:644: bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu //
NK057(shi)001:645: rgya mtsho chen por chu klung kun 'bab ltar //
NK057(shi)001:646: rnam thar shes pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus //
NK057(shi)001:648: 'dir ni mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i blo dang /
NK057(shi)001:649: de ston pa'i gzhung gi tshig gnyis ka la theg pa'i sgrar bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:650: spyir theg pa zhes bya ba'i nges tshig ni /
NK057(shi)001:651: ya na zhes bya ba 'gro ba'i bya ba ston
NK057(shi)001:652: pa'i tshig yin pas tshig gzugs por lam la bya'o
NK057(shi)001:653: // brgyud nas ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:655: brjod bya lta bu la yang 'jug par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:656: theg pa lngar rnam par gzhag pa 'di ni /
NK057(shi)001:657: dpal gsang ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi dbang du bshad par zad kyi /
NK057(shi)001:658: bka' spyi'i gzhung la grags pa ltar na theg pa
NK057(shi)001:659: la ni grangs nges pa kho na gzung du yod
NK057(shi)001:661: 'di ltar 'phags pa rtogs chen phyag rgya pa las /
NK057(shi)001:662: theg pa ni gcig tu bas te /
NK057(shi)001:663: gnyis dang gsum du ma mchis so //
NK057(shi)001:664: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:665: 'di ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig kho na'o //
NK057(shi)001:666: theg pa gnyis su yang bstan te /
NK057(shi)001:670: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:671: rdo rje'i theg pa gnyis so //
NK057(shi)001:672: theg pa ni gsum du yang bstan te /
NK057(shi)001:673: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:674: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:675: bla na med pa'i theg pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:676: theg pa bzhir yang bstan te /
NK057(shi)001:677: gsang ba'i thig le nor bu'i rgyud la sogs pa'i pad+ma'i rigs kyi sdom pa gzung ba'i skabs las /
NK057(shi)001:678: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum //
NK057(shi)001:679: dam pa'i chos kyang rab tu gzung //
NK057(shi)001:680: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:682: mtshan nyid kyi theg par bsdus pa mtha' dag go //
NK057(shi)001:683: gsang ba'i theg pa gsum ni /
NK057(shi)001:687: 'di gsum ni sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba bstan pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:688: 'di dag gi don ni 'og nas rgyud kyi dbye
NK057(shi)001:689: ba bstan pa'i skabs su 'chad pas der rig par
NK057(shi)001:690: bya'o // theg pa ni rnam pa dgur bstan pa yang yod de /
NK057(shi)001:691: man ngag lta ba'i phreng ba las gsungs pa ltar /
NK057(shi)001:695: theg pa mtha' yas par bstan pa yang yod de /
NK057(shi)001:696: chos kyi sgo mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
NK057(shi)001:697: bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:698: gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi gzhung las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:700: srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i //
NK057(shi)001:701: rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro //
NK057(shi)001:702: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:703: mdo sde lang+kara gshegs las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:704: ji srid sems 'jug gnas pa'i bar /
NK057(shi)001:705: theg pa'i mtha' la thug pa med /
NK057(shi)001:707: theg pa med par yang bstan te /
NK057(shi)001:709: 'du shes med par gyur pa na //
NK057(shi)001:710: theg pa med cing 'gro ba'ang med //
NK057(shi)001:711: ces gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:712: yang mdo sde dkon cog brtsegs pa las /
NK057(shi)001:713: de bzhin gshegs pa dge chos zag med ni //
NK057(shi)001:714: chos kyi sku mchog yin te de la ni //
NK057(shi)001:715: de bzhin nyid med de bzhin gshegs pa med //
NK057(shi)001:716: 'jig rten dag na gzugs brnyan kun tu snang //
NK057(shi)001:717: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:718: gsang sngags kyi gzhung las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:719: bgrod du med pa lam gyi mchog /
NK057(shi)001:720: ces gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:721: tshul 'di lta bu'i don gyis na //
NK057(shi)001:724: bgrod par bya ba'i gnas rnams tha dad du gzhag tu med do //
NK057(shi)001:725: tshul 'dis ni theg pa med par yang 'dod pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:726: da ni theg pa'i khyad par cung zad brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:727: de la spyi'i khyad par ni /
NK057(shi)001:728: gong du theg pa lnga yi skabs su cung smos par zad do //
NK057(shi)001:729: phyi'i theg pa las gsang ba'i theg pa cis 'phags pa'i khyad par ni /
NK057(shi)001:730: mdor bsdu na tshul rnam pa gcig gis 'phags te /
NK057(shi)001:731: 'di ltar rdo rje theg pa'i tshul nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:733: mtshan nyid kyi theg pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:734: chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba dang ji
NK057(shi)001:735: snyed pa dag gtso bor sgrub cing bye brag phyed
NK057(shi)001:736: par ston to // tshul gnyis kyis 'phags par yang bstan te /
NK057(shi)001:737: lta ba phul du byung ste gtan la dbab pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:738: mdzad spyod rmad du byung ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:739: yang gnyis te shes rab chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:741: yang gnyis te thabs che ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:743: yang gnyis te rgyus 'phags pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:745: de la rgyu ni mtshan nyid kyi theg pa yun ring par bsgrub pa las 'phags so //
NK057(shi)001:746: 'bras bu ni nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu tsam las mi 'grub pa las 'phags so //
NK057(shi)001:747: tshul 'di dag ni 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa las gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK057(shi)001:748: gsum gyis 'phags par bstan pa'i tshul yang snang ste /
NK057(shi)001:749: 'di ltar theg pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa las /
NK057(shi)001:750: dmigs pa rnam par dag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:751: grogs kyi mthu dang spyod pa'i sa //
NK057(shi)001:752: slob ldan rnams kyi theg pa ni //
NK057(shi)001:753: chen po'i chen po nyid du bsgrags //
NK057(shi)001:754: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:755: lha rgyud kyi rtog pa las /
NK057(shi)001:756: dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsum lhun gyis grub //
NK057(shi)001:757: lta spyod rnam pa gsum gyi grub pa'i rtags //
NK057(shi)001:758: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:759: lta spyod gsum ni de'i grogs dang gsum mo //
NK057(shi)001:760: de ltar khyad par rnam par gsum ni dmigs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:761: sgo nas chos thams cad dbyer med par dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:762: gsum gyi rang bzhin zhing dang spyod yul yongs su
NK057(shi)001:763: dag par lta bas dmigs pa rnam par dag par
NK057(shi)001:764: lta ba dang / de'i grogs thun mong ma yin
NK057(shi)001:765: pa'i dam tshig gi sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mthu
NK057(shi)001:766: lta ba dang / dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:767: mdzad spyod nyams su len pas 'phags par bstan to
NK057(shi)001:768: lta ba dang / dang / // yang rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis 'phags pa yod de /
NK057(shi)001:769: tshul gsum pa'i sgron ma las /
NK057(shi)001:770: don gcig na yang ma rmongs dang //
NK057(shi)001:771: thabs mang dka' ba med phyir dang //
NK057(shi)001:772: dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas //
NK057(shi)001:773: sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags //
NK057(shi)001:775: yang rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis 'phags pa yod de /
NK057(shi)001:776: 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa las /
NK057(shi)001:777: dmigs pa chen po'i yang chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:778: de bzhin du sgrub pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:780: thabs rnams chen po'i yang chen por gyur pas 'phags par ston te /
NK057(shi)001:781: de la dmigs pa chen po'i yang chen po ni /
NK057(shi)001:782: don dam pa rgyur blta ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:783: kun rdzob 'bras bur blta ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:784: rgyu gnas su blta ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:785: 'bras bu rol pa'i dkyil 'khor du blta ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:786: byed spyod tshogs su blta ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:787: don bsdus nas rgyu 'bras dbyer med par blta ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:788: sgrub pa chen po'i yang chen po ni /
NK057(shi)001:789: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bcu'i sgo nas
NK057(shi)001:790: bdag dang gzhan gyi don sgrub pa de yang kun
NK057(shi)001:792: rnam par byang ba dbyer med par sbyor bas tshul chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:793: rig pa skad cig ma la tshangs par spyod pas dus chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:794: ched du ma spyad par yang lhun gyis grub par sbyor bas rdzogs pa chen po'o //
NK057(shi)001:795: ye shes chen po'i yang chen po ni /
NK057(shi)001:796: chos dang gang zag gnyis ka la bdag med par rtogs pa de yang /
NK057(shi)001:797: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i yul
NK057(shi)001:798: can du yang mi blta zhing blang dor med pas
NK057(shi)001:799: ye shes kyi yul chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:800: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:801: rnam par byang ba'i chos dbyer med par dus gcig
NK057(shi)001:802: tu mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing 'joms pas ye
NK057(shi)001:804: thabs chen po'i yang chen po ni /
NK057(shi)001:805: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas mtha' rnam
NK057(shi)001:806: pa gnyis gang la'ang mi gnas pa'i thabs dang ldan
NK057(shi)001:807: pa de la / 'dir thabs mkhas pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:808: thabs dka' ba med pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:810: thabs myur ba rnams kyis 'phags so //
NK057(shi)001:811: de yang mi dge bcu dang mtshams med pa lnga la rol yang /
NK057(shi)001:812: bdag nyid la mi gos par 'gro ba 'dren pas thabs mkhas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:813: dka' thub dang sdom pa rnams kyis mi gzir bas lus dang sems ji ltar bde zhing dga' bas /
NK057(shi)001:814: bdag dang gzhan grol bar byed pa'i thabs yod pas dka' ba med pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:815: theg pa 'og ma ltar mi dge ba ni mi
NK057(shi)001:816: rung zhes sgo dogs pa lta bu ma yin gyi
NK057(shi)001:817: / rang rang gi zhen pa'i spyod pa la gnas
NK057(shi)001:818: bzhin du de nyid la thabs kyi spyod pas zin
NK057(shi)001:819: pas grol ba'i thabs yod pas mang ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:820: dus yun ring mo lta bur bsgrub dgos pa ma
NK057(shi)001:821: yin gyi mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa myur du
NK057(shi)001:822: bsgrub pa'i thabs yod pas thabs myur ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:823: de yang dmigs pa dang spyod pas myur te /
NK057(shi)001:824: de la dmigs pa yongs su dag pas bsam pa myur ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:825: thogs pa med pa spros pa'i bag chags kyi rgyun myur du ldog par nus pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:826: las kyi rnam par smin pa ldog par nus pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:827: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po skye ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:828: chos mnyam pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis blo 'jug par nus pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:829: spyod pa'i sgo nas kyang dka' thub dang sdom pas
NK057(shi)001:830: ma gzir bas bsam pa las su rung bar gyur
NK057(shi)001:831: pa dang / mnyam pa dang mthun pa'i spyod pa
NK057(shi)001:832: brtul zhugs kyi spyod pas bsam pa mi mnyam pa'i
NK057(shi)001:834: chos spyod kyi sgo 'dus pa la spyod pas gcig la gcig mi sgrib pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:835: cho ga ltag chad la skyon du mi lta bas the tshom gyi gegs mi ldang ste /
NK057(shi)001:836: de dag lta bu'i phyir na thabs myur ba zhes bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:837: da ni theg pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas chos
NK057(shi)001:838: kyi sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhig bstan
NK057(shi)001:839: pa de yang / grub pa'i mtha' lngar 'dus par
NK057(shi)001:840: bstan pa de'i tshul du cung zad brjod par bya
NK057(shi)001:841: pa de yang / ste / de yang grub pa'i
NK057(shi)001:842: mtha' kha cig ni gzung ba dang 'dzin par snang
NK057(shi)001:843: ba'i phyi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:844: sa bon nas 'bras bu'i bar gyis bsdus pa lta bur snang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:845: nang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma rig pa
NK057(shi)001:846: nas rga shi'i bar gyis bsdus pa lta bur snang
NK057(shi)001:847: ba ni / sems las gud na yod pa ma
NK057(shi)001:848: yin te rang gi sems nyid 'khrul pa'i dbang gis
NK057(shi)001:849: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su snang ba la
NK057(shi)001:850: ba ni / / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos por 'dogs so zhes ston la /
NK057(shi)001:851: de yang 'di ltar rnal 'byor spyod pa ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:852: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dbu ma pa dag go //
NK057(shi)001:853: grub mtha' gnyis pa ni bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i las dang /
NK057(shi)001:854: mi g.yo ba'i las dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:855: bdag po'i 'bras bu ni ngan song gi gnas dang /
NK057(shi)001:857: yongs su dag pa'i zhing khams dag na yang chud mi za bar yod de /
NK057(shi)001:858: de yang sems dang sems las byung ba nyid ma yin no zhes ston pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:859: de yang 'di ltar nyan thos bye brag tu smra ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:861: mdo sde dbu ma pa dag go //
NK057(shi)001:862: gsum pa ni las dang las kyi 'bras bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:863: 'khrul pa snang ba'i dbang dag med par skur pa gdab tu rung ba ma yin mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:864: 'on kyang rig sngags dang gsang sngags mnyes pa'i bya ba'i thabs byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK057(shi)001:865: de nyid gsum dang ldan pa dag la de dag gis mi gos so zhes ston pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:866: de yang 'di ltar bya ba'i rgyud dang /
NK057(shi)001:868: rnal 'byor phyi pa thub pa rgyud kyi gzhung 'dzin pa dag go //
NK057(shi)001:869: bzhi pa ni las nyid ye shes /
NK057(shi)001:871: nyon mongs pa nyid grol ba chen po'i rang bzhin la /
NK057(shi)001:872: de dag gos par lta ga la 'gyur te gos par mi 'gyur zhes ston pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:873: 'di ltar rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi gzhung 'dzin pa dag go //
NK057(shi)001:874: lnga pa ni sdug bsngal dang byang chub la sogs
NK057(shi)001:875: pa chos thams cad gdod ma nas mnyam pa chen
NK057(shi)001:876: po'i rang bzhin dbyer med par lhun gyis grub pa
NK057(shi)001:877: la / gang zhig gis gang zhig la bsgoms pas gang zhig 'grub par 'gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:878: 'di lta bu'i gnas med par ston pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:879: grub mtha' thams cad kyi mtha' 'dir thug pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:880: de yang 'di ltar dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu
NK057(shi)001:881: 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i gzhung dpal gsang ba'i snying po 'di
NK057(shi)001:882: nyid do // de bas na mtshan nyid dang rgyud
NK057(shi)001:883: thams cad kyi lung gi spyi gsang ba'i snying po
NK057(shi)001:884: de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad ma
NK057(shi)001:885: lus par 'phros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag
NK057(shi)001:886: gi tshul brjod pa 'khrul ba'i 'khor lo spyi'i tshul
NK057(shi)001:887: nyid do // dang / gsung gi 'khor lo theg
NK057(shi)001:888: pa sna tshogs sgo nas grub mtha' sna tshogs su
NK057(shi)001:889: bstan pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog ni 'di
NK057(shi)001:890: nyid do zhes shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:891: de la rgyud thams cad bshad pa'i sgo dang tshul rnam par gzhag pa mang na yang /
NK057(shi)001:892: rtogs par bde ba'i phyir mdor bsdus na /
NK057(shi)001:893: spyi dang khyad par gyi rgyud gyi mtshan bstan pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:894: de bzhin du rgyud kyi dbye ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:897: dgos 'brel rnams kyis don rgyas par bstan pa mtha' dag 'dus par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:898: gzhung 'chad pa'i skabs ma yin pa rgyud ces bya ba'i mtshan tsam ston pa'i tshe ni /
NK057(shi)001:903: ldang tshad lta bu'i sgo nas bstan na tshig 'brel bar 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:904: 'dir ni gzhung 'chad pas dang por mtshan bstan par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:905: de yang spyir ni sgrar snang ba'i bdag nyid ni rgyud don zhes grags so //
NK057(shi)001:906: de yang ston pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen po'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /
NK057(shi)001:907: thugs rje chen po la sogs pa'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:908: gdul bya'i dkar po'i bag chags kyi rgyu las sangs
NK057(shi)001:909: rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs kyi 'khrul pa snang ba
NK057(shi)001:910: na / sgrar snang ba'i bdag nyid ni rgyud du 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:911: de yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i bslab
NK057(shi)001:912: par gyur pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dngos po
NK057(shi)001:913: rnams ston pas khyad par du byas pa yin gyi
NK057(shi)001:914: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la sogs pa bzung
NK057(shi)001:915: bar mi bya'o // de la rgyud ces bya ba'i sgra bshad pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:916: tan+t+ra pra ban ta zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:917: sngags kyi rgyud rnams zhi ba la sogs pa'i las phra mo bsgrub pa'i cho ga dang /
NK057(shi)001:918: mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa
NK057(shi)001:919: thun mong gi dngos grub chen po sgrub pa'i cho
NK057(shi)001:920: ga dang / thar pa mi gnas pa'i mya ngan
NK057(shi)001:921: las 'das pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'i bye brag tu
NK057(shi)001:922: gyur pa rtsa ba dang snying po la sogs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:923: ga dang / sngags dang / sngags de dag gi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK057(shi)001:928: brtul zhugs la sogs pa cho ga sna tshogs 'brel bar bstan pas rgyud ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:929: de ni rgyud thams cad kyi spyi'i mtshan bstan pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:930: khyad par gyi mtshan bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:931: 'phags pa rtogs pa'i rgyal po rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhes bya ba yin te /
NK057(shi)001:932: de la 'phags pa ni thabs kyi theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyid yin te /
NK057(shi)001:934: gong du bstan pa'i theg pa'i khyad par las shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:935: rtog pa'i rgyal po yang thabs kyi theg pa 'di nyid yin te /
NK057(shi)001:936: de la rtog pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:937: rnam par mi rtog pa'i don mtshon pa'i mtshan ma'i thabs la bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:938: de yang rgyal ba rnams kyis rtog pa'i thabs kyi mtshan mar sprul pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:939: des na rgyud dang lha dang dngos grub dang de'i
NK057(shi)001:940: thabs rnams la 'jug pa las 'dir ni gzhung nyid
NK057(shi)001:942: gzhung rnams kyi nang na gong du bstan pa ltar
NK057(shi)001:943: 'bras bu mchog 'di nyid yin pas rtog pa'i rgyal
NK057(shi)001:944: po'o // rdo rje sems dpa' ni byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin yin te /
NK057(shi)001:945: de yang rigs kyi sems dang /
NK057(shi)001:946: rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi sems dang /
NK057(shi)001:947: 'bras bu'i ngo bo rnams dbyer med par byang chub kyi rang bzhin yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:948: kun tu bzang po byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:949: de ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
NK057(shi)001:950: sems dpa' thams cad kyi rgyal po lta bur de
NK057(shi)001:951: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan to //
NK057(shi)001:952: de yang rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i bdag nyid yin la /
NK057(shi)001:953: sems dpa'i sgra gong du bstan pa bzhin du du ma la 'jug kyang /
NK057(shi)001:957: de la brtan pa ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ltar brtan pas rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
NK057(shi)001:958: de yang rigs kyi sems kyi gnas skabs su de ltar gsungs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:959: sems can kun gyi sems gang ni /
NK057(shi)001:960: rdo rje zhes su bshad pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:961: brtan pa'i phyir na sems dpar brjod //
NK057(shi)001:963: 'bras bu'i dus na yang de ltar bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:964: rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni //
NK057(shi)001:965: deng 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
NK057(shi)001:966: brtan pa'i phyir na dpa' zhes bya //
NK057(shi)001:968: rgyu dang 'bras bu dbyer med par rang bzhin de lta bu yin par bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:969: sems dpa' sngon dang mtha' med pa //
NK057(shi)001:970: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
NK057(shi)001:972: gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha //
NK057(shi)001:974: rdo rje ltar brtan pa de yang sems nyid rdo rje lta bur brtan pa yin par gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:975: chos nyid dang chos can du phye nas phyogs gcig
NK057(shi)001:976: gi tshul nas brtan par gsungs pa ni ma yin
NK057(shi)001:978: sems brtan nyid kyis sems dpa' ste //
NK057(shi)001:979: sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:981: rdo rje lta bur rtogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:982: 'di ltar rdo rje ni 'dus ma byas pa'i don /
NK057(shi)001:983: sems dpa' ni snying po byang chub la dgongs pa nges par 'grel ba ste /
NK057(shi)001:985: skye med ye shes rang gi dbyings //
NK057(shi)001:986: mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don //
NK057(shi)001:987: sems dpa' ye shes rdo rje ste //
NK057(shi)001:988: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:989: chos thams cad rdo rje ltar dbyer mi phyed ba'i
NK057(shi)001:990: don rtogs pa'i ye shes de yang rdo rje ltar
NK057(shi)001:991: gnyis su med par gyur pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:992: 'di ni re zhig 'bras bu'i tshul bzung ste bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:993: sems dpa'i sgra bsdus pa la 'jug pa'i tshul ni /
NK057(shi)001:994: 'khor ba dang myang ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK057(shi)001:995: cad rdo rje ltar dbyer med par bsdus pas rdo
NK057(shi)001:998: rdo rje sems dpas bsdus pas na //
NK057(shi)001:1000: mi phyed rdo rje zhes brjod de //
NK057(shi)001:1001: sems dpa' srid gsum gcig pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1002: 'di ni shes rab ldan pa yis //
NK057(shi)001:1003: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bshad //
NK057(shi)001:1005: 'di dag lta bu ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes
NK057(shi)001:1006: bya ba'i don gyi rang gi ngo bo yin par
NK057(shi)001:1007: shes par bya'o // de'i rtags kyi phyag rgyar snang ba ni rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhung las /
NK057(shi)001:1008: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po byang chub kyi sems rdo rje /
NK057(shi)001:1010: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen po ni spyod
NK057(shi)001:1011: yul yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por na
NK057(shi)001:1012: rtag tu da ltar byung ba lta bu'i sku ngo
NK057(shi)001:1013: bo nyid kyis 'da' bar dka' ba /
NK057(shi)001:1014: ye shes lha mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor na longs spyod chen po'i lhun la rol pa mdzad cing /
NK057(shi)001:1015: thugs rje chen pos gdul bya thams cad ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du chud mi gson pa /
NK057(shi)001:1016: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po chos thams cad
NK057(shi)001:1017: kyi rang bzhin 'di lta bu ni rdo rje sems
NK057(shi)001:1019: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi tshul las ni /
NK057(shi)001:1020: sras kyi dang po rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po phyag na rdo rje de nyid /
NK057(shi)001:1021: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid chos kun gyi rang bzhin te /
NK057(shi)001:1022: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa 'di rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yin no zhes 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:1024: bcom ldan 'das kyi pad+ma'i drung pa las sprul pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1025: khro bo rdo rje'i rigs gnod sbyin gyi bu kun
NK057(shi)001:1026: tu bzang po las phyag na rdo rjer dbang bskur
NK057(shi)001:1027: ba gang yin pa de nyid la rdo rje sems
NK057(shi)001:1029: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa'
NK057(shi)001:1030: kun tu bzang po de dbang bskur bar dus la
NK057(shi)001:1031: bab par mkhyen nas bskul ba'i tshe 'di skad du
NK057(shi)001:1032: / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa //
NK057(shi)001:1033: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mchog tshur shog /
NK057(shi)001:1034: ces mtshan nas bos pa gang yin pa lta bu'o //
NK057(shi)001:1035: de bzhin du mtshan nyid kyi theg pa las kyang
NK057(shi)001:1036: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjer grags so
NK057(shi)001:1037: // de las 'dir ni thabs kyi theg pa'i gzhung
NK057(shi)001:1038: 'di nyid la rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ste
NK057(shi)001:1039: // / gang gi phyir don gang ston pa'i gzhung de nyid kyang de'i sgrar bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1041: thun mong ma yin pa'i tshul du ni /
NK057(shi)001:1042: gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa'i gzhung gis
NK057(shi)001:1043: rgyud dang ston pa'i mtshan thun mong du bstan par
NK057(shi)001:1044: bzhed do // gang gi phyir rgyud dang ston pa
NK057(shi)001:1045: rang bzhin dbyer med pa yin la de'i phyir sgra
NK057(shi)001:1047: dbyer med pa ya nga rang bzhin dbye ba mi dmigs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1048: sgyu ma tsam du ye shes chen po de nyid
NK057(shi)001:1049: gsung gi phyag rgyar byin gyis brlab pa yin pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1050: phyir ro // sgyu 'phral d+r+wa ba zhes bya ba
NK057(shi)001:1051: ni spyir thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba
NK057(shi)001:1052: phyir ro // la 'jug / bye brag tu yi ge sgyu 'phrul la yang 'jug /
NK057(shi)001:1054: rgyu thabs kyi rig byed la yang ma ya dza la zhes zer te /
NK057(shi)001:1055: spyir ma nges pa'i 'phrul pa sna tshogs su ston pa la bya bar bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1056: 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab thun mong ma yin pa'i zung du 'brel ba'i sgrar bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1057: de yang chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa
NK057(shi)001:1058: las 'gro ba'i don du bdag nyid chen po rnams
NK057(shi)001:1059: kyi thabs kyi 'phrul pa cir yang ma nges pa
NK057(shi)001:1060: ltar snang ba ni sgyu 'phrul lo //
NK057(shi)001:1061: de nyid d+r+wa ba yin te bslu ba'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:1062: rnam pa gcig tu thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba 'dzin cing mi gtong ste 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:1064: ji ltar d+r+wa ba 'brel ba yin pa bzhin thabs
NK057(shi)001:1065: kyi 'phrul pa ji snyed pa yang mtshan ma med
NK057(shi)001:1066: pa'i shes rab kyis ma zin cing ma 'brel ba
NK057(shi)001:1067: med pas sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1068: de las kyang rtog pa sko'i mtshan du smos pa
NK057(shi)001:1069: ni gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
NK057(shi)001:1071: de la gsang ba'i don ni /
NK057(shi)001:1072: spyir rtogs par dka' ba dang rtogs su mi rung ba la'ang 'jug ste /
NK057(shi)001:1074: de la rtogs par dka' ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1075: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi dgongs pa ni
NK057(shi)001:1076: dam par gyur pa 'di lta bu gang zag skal
NK057(shi)001:1077: ba med cing blo ma sbyangs pa rnams kyi blos
NK057(shi)001:1078: rtogs par dka' bas gsang ba zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1079: rtogs su mi rung ba ni 'di lta bu'i don
NK057(shi)001:1080: dang rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa dag 'jig rten
NK057(shi)001:1081: pa dang theg pa 'og ma rnams kyi spyod yul
NK057(shi)001:1083: gsang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyi yang gsang ba'i theg pa zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1084: de bas na gsang ba thams cad 'di dag tsam du 'dus pa las /
NK057(shi)001:1085: gsang ba ni gab pa'i gsang ba dang sbas pa'i gsang ba rnam pa gnyis yin te /
NK057(shi)001:1086: de ltar yin pas gzhung 'di nyid las /
NK057(shi)001:1087: khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa //
NK057(shi)001:1089: de la gab pa'i gsang ba yang phul du byung ba'i lta ba yin la /
NK057(shi)001:1090: sbas pa'i gsang ba yang rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa'i sgo yin par mngon te /
NK057(shi)001:1092: gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par /
NK057(shi)001:1093: sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:1094: sngon gyi mkhan po rnams kyis gsungs pa'i rang bzhin gyi gsang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1097: gzhan la mi bstan pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba
NK057(shi)001:1098: rnam pa bzhir phye nas gsungs pa'ang der 'dus pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1099: phyir ro // rang bzhin gyi gsang ba la yang /
NK057(shi)001:1101: ngo bo nyid kyi gsang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1102: gud na med pa'i gsang ba rnams su phye ste /
NK057(shi)001:1103: gab pa'i gsang ba la yang dpon slob kyi dgongs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1104: yi ge dkyus kyi dbang gi sgo gnyis su phye ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1105: sbas pa'i gsang ba la yang /
NK057(shi)001:1106: tshig sbas dang yig sbas kyi tshul rnam pa gnyis dang /
NK057(shi)001:1107: gzhan la mi bstan pa'i gsang ba la yang /
NK057(shi)001:1108: gsang ba'i yul dam med pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1110: dam nyams pa rnams la gsang ba'i dmigs spyi gsang bzhi /
NK057(shi)001:1113: gsang bar gnyer gtad pa gnyis te rnam pa bcu po 'di dag mi bstan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1114: 'di dag ni gzhan la mi bstan pa'i gsang ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:1115: zhes gsungs pa de dag ste /
NK057(shi)001:1116: de dag don la 'gal ba yod pa ma yin na yang /
NK057(shi)001:1117: bsdus na gab sbas gnyis su 'dus par snang la /
NK057(shi)001:1118: 'di nyid kyi gzhung las kyang de ltar 'byung ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1119: bla mas kyang de ltar gsungs pas de dag tsam du shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1120: snying po zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1121: spyir na gar+b+ha sa ra ste /
NK057(shi)001:1122: 'phro ba'i gzhir gyur pas snying po zhes bya /
NK057(shi)001:1124: dkyil na gnas pa'am bcud du gyur pas snying po zhes bya /
NK057(shi)001:1125: gar+b+ha pa ra ma pra ste /
NK057(shi)001:1126: dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pas snying po zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1127: de las 'dir yang tshul de dag dang mthun pa'i sgrar bshad de /
NK057(shi)001:1128: de las 'phro ba'i gzhir gyur pas snying po'i don du bshad pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1129: bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa rdzogs pa chen po'i don 'di ni /
NK057(shi)001:1130: sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrul pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur cing /
NK057(shi)001:1131: gsung gi 'phrul pa thams cad kyi 'phrul pa theg
NK057(shi)001:1132: pa thams cad kyi 'phro ba'i gzhir gyur par bstan
NK057(shi)001:1133: te / de'i yul yang gong du ji skad bstan pa'i tshul bstan pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1134: de dang mthun par rgyud 'di nyid las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:1135: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang //
NK057(shi)001:1136: dam tshig bsgrub dang grub pa dang //
NK057(shi)001:1137: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
NK057(shi)001:1138: phyogs bcu kun tu rab grags pa //
NK057(shi)001:1139: gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te //
NK057(shi)001:1140: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i tshul lta bur /
NK057(shi)001:1141: 'phrul pa thams cad kyi 'phro gzhir gyur ba las kyang snying po'i don yin par rig par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1142: dkyil na gnas pa'am bcud du gyur pa'i don ni
NK057(shi)001:1143: yongs su mnyam pa chen po'i dgongs pa'i don 'di
NK057(shi)001:1144: lta bu ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin kun
NK057(shi)001:1145: la khyab pas / dkyil na gnas pa lta bu'ang
NK057(shi)001:1146: yin la de nyid chos rnams kyi bcud du gyur
NK057(shi)001:1147: la khyab pas / pa'ang yin te / 'di ltar gzhung gzhan las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:1148: chos la chos kyi snying por gyur pa 'jam dpal gzhon nu nyid /
NK057(shi)001:1151: kun khyab gdal ba'i snying por 'dus //
NK057(shi)001:1154: mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings //
NK057(shi)001:1156: dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pa'i don ni /
NK057(shi)001:1157: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
NK057(shi)001:1158: cad kyi dam pa'am mchog ni chos mnyam pa nyid
NK057(shi)001:1159: yin la / de ston par byed pa'i gzhung yang bstan pa rnams kyi mchog yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1160: de'i tshul yang gzhung 'di nyid las /
NK057(shi)001:1161: rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /
NK057(shi)001:1163: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du //
NK057(shi)001:1164: shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing //
NK057(shi)001:1165: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi //
NK057(shi)001:1168: de kho na nyid ces pa ni //
NK057(shi)001:1169: spyir don la phyin ci ma log pas de kho na nyid ces bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1172: de la mi 'gyur ba'i sgo nas ni /
NK057(shi)001:1173: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni rtag tu ji lta ba bzhin nyid de /
NK057(shi)001:1174: 'di la 'gyur ba med pas de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1175: de rtogs pa'i ye shes kyang don mthun par skye ste /
NK057(shi)001:1176: 'di la bslu ba med pas de kho na nyid ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1177: de'i dbang gis byung ba'i sku la sogs pa'i 'phrul pa rnams kyang /
NK057(shi)001:1178: nam yang 'gro ba rnams chud mi gson te /
NK057(shi)001:1179: don chen po la brgyud nas sam /
NK057(shi)001:1180: gzugs por sbyor bar byed pas de kho na nyid ces bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1181: skabs skabs su rang rang gi don la phyin ci
NK057(shi)001:1182: ma log cing mi bslu ba tsam la yang de
NK057(shi)001:1184: gzhung 'di nyid kyi rang skad ni /
NK057(shi)001:1185: rgyu'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK057(shi)001:1186: 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dang /
NK057(shi)001:1187: rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i de kho na nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:1188: de la rgyu'i de kho na nyid thun mong ma yin pa'i gzhung bstan pa ltar /
NK057(shi)001:1189: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med cing gzhi ma
NK057(shi)001:1190: grub pa las cir yang 'phrul pa 'byung ba'i ngo
NK057(shi)001:1191: bo nyid med pa 'di nyid rgyu'i de kho na
NK057(shi)001:1192: nyid do // 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid ni /
NK057(shi)001:1193: de las cho 'phrul sna tshogs su snang ba yang sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid de /
NK057(shi)001:1194: 'di la phyin ci log dor zhing bsal du med pas 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:1195: rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i de kho na nyid ni /
NK057(shi)001:1196: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bur rnam par gzhag pa
NK057(shi)001:1197: de yang ma skyes pa nyid chu zla ltar sgyu
NK057(shi)001:1198: ma sna tshogs snang zhing bya ba byed la /
NK057(shi)001:1199: sgyu ma nyid la ngo bo nyid med de ma
NK057(shi)001:1200: skyes pas bden pa gnyis kyi ming tsam du yang
NK057(shi)001:1202: dbyer med pa'i tshul 'di la phyin ci log med
NK057(shi)001:1203: pas rgyu 'bras ro gcig pa'i de kho na nyid
NK057(shi)001:1204: ces bya'o // nges pa zhes bya ba nges pa'i don te /
NK057(shi)001:1205: 'di ltar rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa brgyud de
NK057(shi)001:1206: drang pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba chud mi gson pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1207: thabs su gsungs pa lta bu tsam ma yin gyi
NK057(shi)001:1208: / nyid kyis ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i don
NK057(shi)001:1209: skal pa dang ldan pa rnams la tshig gzugs por
NK057(shi)001:1210: bstan pa yin pas nges pa zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1211: de ltar tshig rnam pa bzhi po 'di'i yul yang gcig gam tha dad /
NK057(shi)001:1212: tshig snga ma dang phyi ma dang bar ma dag gang rung gcig gi don ston nam /
NK057(shi)001:1214: don gzhan zhig ston par byed snyam pa la /
NK057(shi)001:1215: 'di ni de dag kun kyang ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:1216: gzhi gcig yon tan gyi sgo so so nas bstan
NK057(shi)001:1217: pas yul gcig dang tha dad par yang mi 'gyur
NK057(shi)001:1218: ro // gzhi'i don gang yang rung ba zhig gtso
NK057(shi)001:1219: bor ched du bstan par bya ba ma yin pas
NK057(shi)001:1220: tshig snga ma'am phyi ma'am bar ma dag gi don
NK057(shi)001:1221: gcig ston pa ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1222: spyi gzhi chos can tha dad mi ston pas don so so ba ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1223: ming 'di dag gis bstan par bya ba brgyud nas don gzhan zhig ston pa ma yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:1224: don gzhan ston pa ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1225: tshul 'di ni dper na lha'i dbang po la brgya byin dpa' bo grong khyer 'jig ces bstan na /
NK057(shi)001:1226: 'di ni lha'i dbang po gang zag gcig ston pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1227: ming yin pas don tha dad par ston pa ma
NK057(shi)001:1228: yin no // 'on kyang brgya byin zhes bya bas spyin dag tu ston /
NK057(shi)001:1229: dbang po zhes bya bas ni rgyal por ston /
NK057(shi)001:1230: grong khyer 'jig ces bya bas ni dmag dpon du ston /
NK057(shi)001:1231: de'i phyir mtshan nyid gcig ston pa'ang ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1232: ming de gsum gang yang rung ba cig ston pa'ang ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1233: tsha ba dang grang ba ltar so sor ston pa yang ma yin /
NK057(shi)001:1234: shing la bya ldang zhes ston pa ltar brgyud nas gzhan bstan pa yang ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1235: 'di ni las kyi gzhir bstan pa zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1236: las dang yon tan so sor bstan par bya ba'i gzhi chos can gcig tu bsdus pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1237: de bas 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:1238: dpal kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa'i don mthar thug pas 'di ni gsang ba'am snying po'ang yin /
NK057(shi)001:1239: de kho na nyid kyang yin /
NK057(shi)001:1240: nges pa'ang yin no zhes ston par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1241: 'di dag tsam ni rgyud kyi mtshan spyi dang khyad par grags pa bstan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1242: 'di dag ni gang zag 'go smos pas go ba rnams kyi don yin par grags pa yin la /
NK057(shi)001:1243: phal pa rnams la yang spyi'i don khong du chu da par phan pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1244: rgyud rnams kyi dbye ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1245: ming gi sgra 'jug pa'i yul gyi sgo nas dbye ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1246: don dang tshig gi sgo nas dngos po drug la 'jug ste /
NK057(shi)001:1247: de la don gyi sgo nas ni gzhi'i rgyud ces bya ba rigs la 'jug pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1248: thabs kyi rgyud ces bya ba sngags dang phyag rgya
NK057(shi)001:1249: la sogs pa bslab pa'i dngos po lam gyi mtshan
NK057(shi)001:1250: nyid dang / 'bras bu'i rgyud ces bya ba thun
NK057(shi)001:1251: mong ba dang mchog gi dngos grub kyi mtshan nyid
NK057(shi)001:1252: rnams gang zag gcig gis shes pa'i rgyud la rgyu
NK057(shi)001:1253: rkyen 'bras bu'i tshul du 'brel bar gnas pas /
NK057(shi)001:1254: rgyud ces bya ba 'brel ba'i don du grub pa yin mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:1255: 'on kyang spyi ming yan lag la 'jug pas dngos po gsum du 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:1256: rjod par byed pa'i sgo nas ni /
NK057(shi)001:1257: gong du brtan pa'i sgrar snang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1258: de nyid skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyur byas pa sgrar grags pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK057(shi)001:1259: de'i brdar gyur pa glegs bam du gtogs pa rnams te /
NK057(shi)001:1260: de bas na ming gdags pa'i yul rnam pa drug yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1261: lta spyod kyi khyad par gyi sgo nas rnam par dbye ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1265: de la bya ba'i rgyud la yang rgyud kha cig
NK057(shi)001:1266: las dang bya ba cung zad smad de ston pas
NK057(shi)001:1267: bye brag gi rgyud ces kyang grags /
NK057(shi)001:1268: gnyis ka'i rgyud ces kyang grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1269: de la bya ba'i rgyud ces bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1270: bya ba gtsor ston pa'o zhes bshad de /
NK057(shi)001:1271: phyir rol gyi lus kyi bya ba kha zas bskyung zhing smyung ba la gnas pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1272: dus kyi khrus chen po gsum khrus phra mo dang bcas pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1274: dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba la sogs pa gtsang sbra dang /
NK057(shi)001:1275: dka' thub dang brtul zhugs drag po spyad pa las /
NK057(shi)001:1276: rig sngags dang gsang sngags rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:1278: lus kyi bya ba gtsor len pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1279: bya ba chen bas bya ba'i rgyud ces bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1282: gzhi las 'phags pa la bya bas /
NK057(shi)001:1283: spyi'i rgyud las bye brag tu gyur pa nyid la bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1285: u da tsa ra ste ngag la bya bas lus
NK057(shi)001:1286: kyi bya ba rnams kyi go ngag gi gsang sngags
NK057(shi)001:1287: kyis byed par yang bshad de /
NK057(shi)001:1288: spyir na bya ba cung zad shas chung bas spyod pa'i rgyud ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1290: phyir rol gyi bya ba la ma brten par 'gyur
NK057(shi)001:1291: yang sems kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas grub par
NK057(shi)001:1292: ston pa'o // rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'ba' zhig la
NK057(shi)001:1293: yang dbye ba rnam pa gnyis sam gsum dang bzhi
NK057(shi)001:1295: de la gzhung kha cig las ni rnal 'byor phyi nang zhes kyang grags /
NK057(shi)001:1296: kha cig las rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po zhes grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1297: de la phyi pa ni tshangs par spyod pa'i dka' thub dang bcas pa yin la //
NK057(shi)001:1298: nang pa ni mnyam pa chen po'i dka' thub dang
NK057(shi)001:1299: ldan pas spyod pas bye brag tu phye bas bdag
NK057(shi)001:1300: gis de kho na nyid sgrub pa dang mi sgrub
NK057(shi)001:1301: pa'i sgo nas dmigs pas bye brag tu phye ba'o
NK057(shi)001:1302: zhes grags so // rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul 'ba' zhig la yang /
NK057(shi)001:1303: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i tshul gnyis su grags pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1304: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul zhes gsum du grags pa'ang /
NK057(shi)001:1305: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa dang sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba
NK057(shi)001:1306: la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi gzhung la yang snang la
NK057(shi)001:1307: / mkhan po rnams kyis mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs rnams su yang de bzhin du grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1308: tshul 'di nyid la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi dbye
NK057(shi)001:1309: bar grags pa rnams kyang 'dus par shes par bya'o
NK057(shi)001:1310: // rtsa ba dang yan lag gi sgo nas dbye ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK057(shi)001:1315: de la dang po nyid du gzhan la ma brten
NK057(shi)001:1316: par gzhung tshugs pa ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya'o
NK057(shi)001:1317: // de'i dka' ba gcod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1318: ma tshang ba kha bskang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1320: de dag gi bye brag mchog bshad pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1321: phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ste 'di ltar /
NK057(shi)001:1322: ud ta ra tan+t+ra zhes bya ba /
NK057(shi)001:1323: rtse mo'i don dang bla mar gyur pa lta bu la yang snyeg /
NK057(shi)001:1324: phyis 'byung ba la yang bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1325: don gyi gnas skabs kyis rgyud phyi ma zhes pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:1326: rgyud bla ma zhes sbyar ro //
NK057(shi)001:1328: rgyud gang gis rgyud dag bshad pa gang yin pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1330: de dag du ma bstan pa'i las dang dngos grub kyi cho ga zhib mo bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1331: kha cig na re rgyud ni mdor bsdus te bstan
NK057(shi)001:1332: pa'i tshul yin pas rtog pa zhib mo rnams ni
NK057(shi)001:1333: rgyud du mi bsdu'o zhes zer ro //
NK057(shi)001:1334: kha cig na re gzhi de ltar grags pa yin mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:1335: dper na shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo sde zhes brjod
NK057(shi)001:1336: pa bzhin rtog pa zhib mo rnams la yang rgyud
NK057(shi)001:1337: ces byas pa la nyes pa med do zhes zer
NK057(shi)001:1338: ro // de dag ni rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1339: de las dpal gsang ba snying po 'di ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gtogs so //
NK057(shi)001:1340: de'i tshul las kyang rdzogs pa'i tshul gtso bor sgrub par byed pa rtsa ba'i rgyud du grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1341: da ni gzhung gi ldang tshad bstan par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1344: yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang /
NK057(shi)001:1345: yongs su gtad pa rnams tshang ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1347: 'dir yang de bzhin du shes par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1348: de la gleng gzhi ni phun sum tshogs pa lnga'i lo rgyus brjod pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1349: gzhi ci las gleng bslang ba'i bcas rgyud ston pas gleng gzhi zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1350: yang rnam pa gcig tu ni /
NK057(shi)001:1352: nges par sbyin par byed pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1353: gang dag phyir gyur pa rnams bka' ma yin par the tshom za ba dag la /
NK057(shi)001:1354: dpang po dang don rtags brjod pas yid ches par
NK057(shi)001:1355: 'gyur zhing blo la nges pa sbyin par byed pas
NK057(shi)001:1357: de la phun sum tshogs pa lnga ni /
NK057(shi)001:1362: rgyud rnams rang rang gi yon tan rdzogs pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:1363: sbyir rgyu rkyen tshang ba'i phyir phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1364: de yang thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo rnam pa gnyis yin te /
NK057(shi)001:1365: de la thun mong du ni /
NK057(shi)001:1366: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
NK057(shi)001:1369: 'khor gang dang gang bzhugs pa de'i tshe thos so zhes mtshams sbyor bar byed do //
