NK057(shi)001:1370: rgyud 'dir ni thun mong ma yin pa'i gleng gzhi ston te /
NK057(shi)001:1371: de la ston pa thun mong ma yin pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1372: dpal kun tu bzang po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de
NK057(shi)001:1373: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
NK057(shi)001:1374: thugs rdo rje'i bdag po chos thams cad kyi rang
NK057(shi)001:1376: gang zag gi rgyud gcig mngon par rdzogs pa sangs
NK057(shi)001:1377: rgyas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i gzugs
NK057(shi)001:1378: kyi sku lta bu gcig ston par 'dod pa ni
NK057(shi)001:1379: ma yin no // gnas thun mong ma yin pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1380: 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa /
NK057(shi)001:1381: chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang thams cad snying po
NK057(shi)001:1382: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid
NK057(shi)001:1384: dag pa dang ma dag pa'i zhing khams phyogs kyi
NK057(shi)001:1385: chas phye ba zhig gnas su 'dod pa ni ma
NK057(shi)001:1386: yin no // 'khor thun mong ma yin pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1387: ye shes chen po rang snang ba'i 'phrul pa gang zag dang bcas pa'i chos dang /
NK057(shi)001:1388: zag pa med pa'i chos dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin
NK057(shi)001:1389: byang chub chen po las mi gzhan pa gang yin
NK057(shi)001:1391: rang gi rgyud dag pa'am dad pas 'dus pa la sogs pa lta bu ni ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1392: dus thun mong ma yin pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1393: dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na sku gsung
NK057(shi)001:1394: thugs lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs
NK057(shi)001:1395: pa nyid yin gyi skad cig thang cig la sogs
NK057(shi)001:1399: bsam pa las 'das pa la sogs pa'i dus kyis phye ba ni ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1400: rgyud kyi gzhung phun sum tshogs pa thun mong ma yin pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1402: mya ngan las 'das pas bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
NK057(shi)001:1403: gdod ma nas dbyer med par mngon par rdzogs par
NK057(shi)001:1404: sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin yin par ston gyi /
NK057(shi)001:1405: rigs dang bshes gnyen gyi stobs la brten nas rgyu
NK057(shi)001:1406: sgrub pas 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus la ltos pa
NK057(shi)001:1408: 'di dag kyang 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na zhes
NK057(shi)001:1409: bya ba la sogs pa ji skad gsungs pa las
NK057(shi)001:1410: shes par bya'o // rgyu 'byung ba'i rkyen ni gleng bslang yin te /
NK057(shi)001:1411: de yang spyir thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sgo nas rnam pa gnyis so //
NK057(shi)001:1412: de la thun mong ni rgyud dang mdo sde spyi las 'byung ba bzhin /
NK057(shi)001:1413: ston pas gleng bslang ba zhig na yang /
NK057(shi)001:1416: ljags kyi dbang po brkyang ba la sogs pa'i sgo nas bskul bar mdzad pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1417: gzhan la ched du brjod pa lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:1418: 'khor gyi gleng bslang ba zhig na yang /
NK057(shi)001:1420: zhus pa'i tshig dag gi sgo nas gleng slong bar byed do //
NK057(shi)001:1421: thun mong ma yin pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1422: 'di'i skabs su chos thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:1423: chen po'i rang bzhin mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i
NK057(shi)001:1424: gnas chen por sangs rgyas pa'i don /
NK057(shi)001:1425: sangs rgyas nyag gcig gi dgongs pa la gsal ba'i
NK057(shi)001:1426: don gang yin pa der ngam zhing ngo mtshar ba'i
NK057(shi)001:1427: tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs
NK057(shi)001:1428: pa nyid la ched du brjod pa'i tshul gyis gleng
NK057(shi)001:1429: bslang ba'o // de yang sku dang ye shes sprul
NK057(shi)001:1430: pa'i bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i che
NK057(shi)001:1431: bslang ba'o // ba dang / de nyid mtshan ma
NK057(shi)001:1432: med pa'i ngang du lhun gyis grub pas chos kyi
NK057(shi)001:1433: dbyings su sangs rgyas pa'i che ba'i sgo nas kun
NK057(shi)001:1434: tu bzang pos gleng bslang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1435: kun tu bzang mos gleng bslang ba gnyis su bstan no //
NK057(shi)001:1436: yongs su shes bar bya ba'i dngos po ni /
NK057(shi)001:1437: spyir rgyud thabs cad kyis bstan par bya ba'i dngos po mdor bsdu na rnam pa dgu yin te /
NK057(shi)001:1442: phrin las te gzhi rnam pa lnga /
NK057(shi)001:1446: mchod pa ste de ltar yan lag bzhi'o //
NK057(shi)001:1447: de la dkyil 'khor gyi sgra 'jug pa'i yul ni /
NK057(shi)001:1448: skabs kyi bye brag gis mang mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:1449: rgyud kyi dngos po ston pa'i skabs 'dir ni chos
NK057(shi)001:1450: kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pho brang
NK057(shi)001:1452: de la de skad ces ci'i phyir bya zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:1454: man+da ni snying po'i nying khu'am dkyil 'khor lta bu la bya la /
NK057(shi)001:1455: la ni len cing 'dzin pa ste gzhi'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:1456: de bas na chos kyi rgyal srid bsgrub par bya
NK057(shi)001:1457: ba la snying po gzhi 'dzin du gyur pa'i phyir
NK057(shi)001:1458: snying po len pas dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1459: rnam pa gcig tu yi ge 'brel bar brjod na /
NK057(shi)001:1460: kun nas zlum zhing yongs su bskor ba'i don te /
NK057(shi)001:1461: de lta na yang gang na gtso bo la 'khor
NK057(shi)001:1462: gyi dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba'i don gyis dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:1463: zhes bya'o // yang ma da ni mdzes pa'i don /
NK057(shi)001:1464: la ni brgyan pa'i don te /
NK057(shi)001:1465: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la gnas dang 'khor la
NK057(shi)001:1466: sogs pas brgyan pa'i phyir yang de skad ces bya'o
NK057(shi)001:1467: // yang na ma da ni mnan pa'am brjid phab pa /
NK057(shi)001:1469: don 'dis na bzhugs pa'i gnas nyid la yang dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1470: dkyil 'khor gyi dbye ba bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1471: gzhung so so nas grags pa rnams ni rang rang gi skabs bzhin dbye bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1472: gzhung 'dir grags pa ni 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma las /
NK057(shi)001:1474: gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum //
NK057(shi)001:1476: byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog bstan //
NK057(shi)001:1478: de ltar na dkyil 'khor bdun du dbye bar bstan to //
NK057(shi)001:1479: de la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni chos thams
NK057(shi)001:1480: cad kyi rang bzhin ye nas rnam par dag pa
NK057(shi)001:1481: ji lta ba yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1482: don de lta bu dgongs pa lhun gyis grub par
NK057(shi)001:1483: gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gong du dkon
NK057(shi)001:1484: cog bstan pa'i skabs su ji skad bshad pa lta
NK057(shi)001:1485: bu'o // gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK057(shi)001:1486: sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i spyod yul du ji
NK057(shi)001:1487: ltar snang ba thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil
NK057(shi)001:1490: de las kyang khyad par du gzugs sku dang mchod
NK057(shi)001:1491: rten la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mtshan mar gyur pa
NK057(shi)001:1492: gang yin pa'o // ting nge 'dzin yi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK057(shi)001:1493: chos thams cad dbyer med par sku gsung thugs kyi
NK057(shi)001:1494: dkyil 'khor du rtogs nas de nyid ting nge 'dzin
NK057(shi)001:1497: gzhi de las bye brag tu lha so so'i rigs dang /
NK057(shi)001:1498: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa so sor gsal bar byas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1499: gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
NK057(shi)001:1500: byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po nyid dkyil 'khor gyi dam pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:1501: de nyid rtogs pa dang sgom pa'i man ngag ston pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1503: lha rnams thams cad 'tshogs pa dang //
NK057(shi)001:1504: skye bo dam pa kun 'tshogs pas //
NK057(shi)001:1505: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
NK057(shi)001:1506: de bzhin mdza' ba 'dus par gsungs //
NK057(shi)001:1509: lhag par dkyil 'khor grangs kyis phye ba'ang med la /
NK057(shi)001:1510: don gyis na rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK057(shi)001:1511: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK057(shi)001:1514: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor rnams ston no //
NK057(shi)001:1515: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku
NK057(shi)001:1516: gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang 'phrul pa ston pa
NK057(shi)001:1517: rnams ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yin par mngon
NK057(shi)001:1518: no // gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par gsungs pa ni ting nge 'dzin no //
NK057(shi)001:1519: gang rdul tshon la sogs pa mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar gyur pa ni gzugs brnyan no //
NK057(shi)001:1520: gang skye bo dam pa 'dus nas dkyil 'khor tshang bar spyod pa na tshogs so //
NK057(shi)001:1521: gang byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i man ngag
NK057(shi)001:1522: tu ston pa ni byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:1523: ro // ci'i phyir rgyud rnams su phal cher dkyil 'khor gtsor ston par mdzad ce na /
NK057(shi)001:1524: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgyal srid
NK057(shi)001:1525: bsgrub par bya ba la rgyu'i gtso bo chos kyi
NK057(shi)001:1526: rgyal po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:1528: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
NK057(shi)001:1529: de yang bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa
NK057(shi)001:1530: la 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no
NK057(shi)001:1531: // de yang rgyal ba rnams kyis bkas bcad pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1532: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i bslab par gyur pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1533: 'da' ru mi rung ba'i mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1534: 'di dag gis ni tha mal pa'i legs par spyad pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1535: theg pa thun mong gi sdom pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1536: 'das par gyur yang nyes pa chen po med par
NK057(shi)001:1537: gyur pa rnams las bye brag tu byas pa'i mtshan
NK057(shi)001:1539: de la ci'i phyir dam tshig ces bya zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:1540: sa ma ya zhes bya ba'i sgra spyir don du ma la 'jug ste /
NK057(shi)001:1541: re zhig cung zad bsdus nas tshigs su bcad pa /
NK057(shi)001:1542: kun thob 'gro dang rtogs pa dang //
NK057(shi)001:1543: yang dag thob sogs gsum de bzhin //
NK057(shi)001:1544: rdzogs thob dus dang mnyam par sbyor //
NK057(shi)001:1545: gsang ba bsten pa bza' ba dang //
NK057(shi)001:1546: mna' dang sdom pa yal gam bcas //
NK057(shi)001:1547: dam par gyur dang dam pa mtshon //
NK057(shi)001:1548: dam par gsungs dang dam du 'dzin //
NK057(shi)001:1549: 'das na sreg par byed pa dang //
NK057(shi)001:1550: kun kyang 'da' ba ma yin pas //
NK057(shi)001:1551: sa ma ya zhes bya ba yin //
NK057(shi)001:1553: de las 'dir ni mnyam par sbyor ba byed pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1554: mnyam rdzogs chen po thob pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1555: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1557: rnam grangs gong du bstan pa lta bur phyogs gzhan yang gsungs so //
NK057(shi)001:1558: dam tshig gi dbye ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1559: spyi dang khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig ces spyir grags te /
NK057(shi)001:1560: de la spyi'i sdom pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1561: theg pa thun mong gi sdom par grags pa'i so sor thar pa'i sdom pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1562: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dag kyang gsang sngags kyi sdom pa'i gzhir grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1563: lha spyi'i sdom par gyur pa rigs lnga'i sdom pa
NK057(shi)001:1564: lta bu'ang rigs gcig gi lha mnyes par byed pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1565: tshe'ang gzhan thun mong gi bsrung byar grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1566: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dus dang gnas skabs spyir bsrung bar bya ba'i sdom pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1567: rtsa ba dang yang lag tu gtogs pa'i spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig rnams dang /
NK057(shi)001:1568: brtul zhugs kyi dam tshig dang /
NK057(shi)001:1569: rgyun gyi dam tshig la sogs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1570: de dag ni spyi'i dam tshig tu gtogs pa'i dbye ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:1571: khyad par gyi dam tshig ni /
NK057(shi)001:1572: rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi blo rtsal gyi khyad par las so so'i bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang /
NK057(shi)001:1575: ye shes kyi dam tshig dang /
NK057(shi)001:1581: tshangs pa'i gnas rnams khyad par rim pa bzhin gnas te /
NK057(shi)001:1582: 'di lta bu ni khyad par rtsal 'phang gi dam tshig ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1584: spyi'i sdom pa la gnas pa'i rnam 'byor pas sgrub
NK057(shi)001:1585: pa chen po la sogs pa'i dus skabs su bsrung
NK057(shi)001:1586: ba lhag par bstan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1587: 'di ltar seng ge'i khog pa mi bshig pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1588: stag gzig gol ba'i god lhag mi bsdu ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1589: gangs kyi zhun chu mi btung ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1590: rdo rje'i go cha mi gdal ba la sogs pa gzhung spyi las grags pa rnams so //
NK057(shi)001:1592: bsrung ba dang sgrub par gyur ba'i rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga dang /
NK057(shi)001:1593: mi spang ba mi dor bar gyur pa'i yan lag bcu ste /
NK057(shi)001:1594: de ltar dam tshig bco lnga'o //
NK057(shi)001:1595: 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
NK057(shi)001:1596: ltar dgos pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur
NK057(shi)001:1597: pa / bslab pa thams cad kyi gzhi 'dzin pa'i sa gzhi lta bu /
NK057(shi)001:1598: dge ba'i dbang po thams cad kyi srog lta bur bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1599: gang gi phyir rgyud rnams su rgyal ba rnams kyis dam tshig bstan ce na /
NK057(shi)001:1600: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi chos kyi rgyal srid
NK057(shi)001:1601: bsgrub par bya ba la gzhi 'dzin pa yin pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1602: phyir de bstan to zhes shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1604: sngags kyi lha rnams mnyes par byas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas /
NK057(shi)001:1605: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs
NK057(shi)001:1606: su gyur pa bsnyen sgrub gnyis dang yan lag bzhis
NK057(shi)001:1607: bsdus pa'o // sgrub par byed pas sgrub pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1608: don len cing thob par byed pa la bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1612: sbyin sreg la sogs pa thabs kyi cho ga'i dbye ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1613: rten gyi bye brag dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK057(shi)001:1614: phyi rol gyi phyag rgya chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:1616: dam tshig gi rdzas la sogs pa'i sgo nas rten gyi dbye ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1618: thun mong gi dngos grub chen po dang /
NK057(shi)001:1619: mchog gi dngos grub kyi sgo nas dbye ba la sogs pa rnams ni rgyud spyir bshad par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1620: 'dir ni yi ge sgyu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas las phra mo dang /
NK057(shi)001:1621: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK057(shi)001:1622: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas 'dod pa'i yon
NK057(shi)001:1623: tan lnga la rol cing dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs
NK057(shi)001:1624: rnams gsungs te / der ni nang gi gzungs kyi phyag rgya la brten pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1625: dam rdzas bdud rtsi la brten pa'ang 'dus par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1627: 'jig rten gyi lha chen po bsgrub pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1630: pra dbab pa lta bu 'jig rten gyi sgrub pa phra mo'ang gsungs so //
NK057(shi)001:1631: ci'i phyir bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis rgyud rnams su sgrub pa rnams bstan ce na /
NK057(shi)001:1632: dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rnams kyi dgos pa yang
NK057(shi)001:1633: 'gro ba rnams kyi thar pa dang bde ba bsgrub
NK057(shi)001:1636: bka' thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid de /
NK057(shi)001:1637: de yang dbang thob pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa /
NK057(shi)001:1638: dkyil 'khor la brten nas go 'phang gi chos gzhan
NK057(shi)001:1639: gyi rgyud la 'god par byed pa'i las kyi bdag
NK057(shi)001:1640: nyid do // 'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud kyi skabs su sbyin pa rnam pa bzhir grags pa las /
NK057(shi)001:1641: dbang bskur sbyin pa zhes bya ba rin po che'i rigs kyi dam tshig tu gtogs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1642: de la ci'i phyir dbang bskur ba zhes bya zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:1643: a b+hi shiny+tsa zhes bya ba'i sgra mngon par gtor ba'am chus brlan par byas pa'i tshig ste /
NK057(shi)001:1644: sgra 'di dngos su na dri ma dag par byed pa tsam la 'jug la /
NK057(shi)001:1645: brgyud nas ni go 'phang gi chos thob par byed cing dbang bskur ba la 'jug ste /
NK057(shi)001:1646: ci'i phyir zhe na 'jig rten du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byung ba na /
NK057(shi)001:1647: sa srungs kyi bus sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi
NK057(shi)001:1648: gnas nas rin po che'i snod bdud rtsi'i chus bkang
NK057(shi)001:1649: ba blangs te / rgyal po'i spyi bor blug cing
NK057(shi)001:1650: khrus byas pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang
NK057(shi)001:1651: thob par byas pas de la a b+hi shiny+tsa zhes
NK057(shi)001:1652: ba blangs te / grags so // de bzhin du
NK057(shi)001:1653: chos kyi rgyal po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung
NK057(shi)001:1654: ba blangs te / grags so // ba na /
NK057(shi)001:1655: lha dang klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis dag pa lha'i
NK057(shi)001:1656: chus khrus gsol bas chos kyi rgyal po 'jig rten
NK057(shi)001:1658: khrus de la a b+hi shiny+tsa zhes grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1659: de bzhin du phyis rjes su 'byung ba rnams kyang
NK057(shi)001:1660: nam go 'phang bsgo bar byed pa'i tshe bum pa
NK057(shi)001:1661: la brten nas khrus gsol bas dbang thams cad kyi
NK057(shi)001:1663: mngon par gtor ba'i phyir dbang bskur ba zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1665: phyi nang gi rgyud so so las rang rang gi gzhung so sor grags mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:1667: nus pa'i dbang gnyis su grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1668: phan pa ni dbu rgyan phreng ba cod pan la
NK057(shi)001:1669: sogs pa rgyud las gsungs pa'i dbang bcu po dag
NK057(shi)001:1670: da lta nyid nas nus pa so so la bsgo
NK057(shi)001:1671: ba med pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1672: gsang ba nyan pa'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:1673: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:1674: las rnam bzhi spyod pa'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:1676: rdo rje rgyal po bka' rab 'byams kyi dbang rnams phan pa'ang yin la /
NK057(shi)001:1677: da lta nyid du nus pa so so la bya
NK057(shi)001:1678: bar gnas pas bsgos pa yin pas de skad ces
NK057(shi)001:1679: bya'o // ci'i phyir bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis rgyud rnams su dbang bstan ce na /
NK057(shi)001:1680: go 'phang gi chos rim par thob par bya ba 'di la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:1682: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub
NK057(shi)001:1683: kyi sems la brten nas 'gro ba'i don spyod pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1684: mtshan nyid de tshad med pa bzhi'i rgyu las byung
NK057(shi)001:1685: ba yin no // byed pa po rnams kyi nye
NK057(shi)001:1686: bar 'dod pa ni las zhes zer te sgo gsum
NK057(shi)001:1687: gyi bya ba'i mtshan nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:1689: rigs kyi sgo nas tshar gcod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1690: phan 'dogs pa gnyis kyi bye brag las /
NK057(shi)001:1691: zhi ba la sogs pas las rnam pa bzhi lta
NK057(shi)001:1692: bu las rab tu dbye ba'i spros pa grangs chad
NK057(shi)001:1693: pa dang / grangs chad pa med par gsungs pa rnams so //
NK057(shi)001:1694: thabs kyi sgo nas dbye ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1695: rdzas la brten pa dang ma brten pa'i bye brag gis /
NK057(shi)001:1698: sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i sgo nas thabs kyi cho ga ji snyed gsungs pa rnams so //
NK057(shi)001:1699: ci'i phyir bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis rgyud rnams su phrin las bstan ce na /
NK057(shi)001:1700: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrub pa la thabs 'di dag tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:1701: 'di dag ni gzhi lnga zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1702: sngags la sogs pa'i yan lag bzhi'ang 'di dag gi
NK057(shi)001:1703: bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi yan lag yin pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1704: phyir ro // de bas na dngos po de dag
NK057(shi)001:1705: gang gtso bor byed kyang sngags la sogs pa'i yan
NK057(shi)001:1706: lag bzhi po 'di las thabs lhag pa gzhan med
NK057(shi)001:1707: de bya ba thams cad la 'di dag tshang ba'i
NK057(shi)001:1708: phyir ro // phyir ro // de la sngags zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1709: spyir shes pa dang dpung gnyen du ldan pa'i don la bshad de /
NK057(shi)001:1710: 'di ltar man tra zhes bya ba'i sgra /
NK057(shi)001:1711: ma n+aa a b+aa bo da na zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1712: rtogs shing khong du chud pa la bya bar skad kyi byings las bshad /
NK057(shi)001:1714: skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gyur pa la 'jug pas
NK057(shi)001:1715: spyir na thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'am
NK057(shi)001:1716: / 'bras bu dang bcas pa la 'jug par gzhung phal mo che na grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1717: gzhung so so nas grags pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:1718: spros pa med pa'i don la yang gsang sngags zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1719: 'di ltar rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las 'di skad du /
NK057(shi)001:1720: spros pa med pa'i don gsang sngags kyi dngos po
NK057(shi)001:1721: de nyid tshul sna tshogs nas zhes pa la sogs
NK057(shi)001:1722: rgya cher gsungs pa lta bu 'o //
NK057(shi)001:1723: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la yang gsang sngags zhes gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:1725: gnyis med ye shes 'di nyid ni //
NK057(shi)001:1726: thub pas sngags zhes gsungs pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:1727: zhes gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:1729: gnyis med yid ni skyob pa na //
NK057(shi)001:1730: gal te de ltar na yang sngags //
NK057(shi)001:1731: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:1732: tshul 'di dag gis na shes pa nyid skyob pa yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:1734: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las ni /
NK057(shi)001:1735: sems skyob pas shes skyob zhes bshad de /
NK057(shi)001:1736: 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi spyod pa bshad pa'i skabs nas /
NK057(shi)001:1738: yul dang dbang po rnams kyi sems //
NK057(shi)001:1739: de ni man zhes bshad pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:1740: tra zhes bya ba skyob pa'i don //
NK057(shi)001:1741: 'jig rten spyod las rnam grol ba'i //
NK057(shi)001:1742: sdom pa kun nas gang gsungs pa //
NK057(shi)001:1743: skyob pa rdo rje thams cad kyi //
NK057(shi)001:1744: sngags kyi spyod par bstan pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:1746: don de lta bu'i rtags su gyur pa lha rnams kyi sku la yang sngags zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1748: sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang //
NK057(shi)001:1749: rmad du byung ba'i gtor ma dbul //
NK057(shi)001:1750: bshang gci sha dang 'bru mar dang //
NK057(shi)001:1751: sems las byung ba'i tsan+dana dang //
NK057(shi)001:1752: khu ba dag gis sngags rnams kun //
NK057(shi)001:1753: tshim par 'gyur bar kun tu bshad //
NK057(shi)001:1755: de dag gi sgor gyur pa dang h+aum la sogs pa'i yi ge'i sngags tshig dang /
NK057(shi)001:1756: gzhung gi tshogs dang sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rnams la yang sngags zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1757: de bzhin rig pa dang gzungs rnams la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1758: shes rab dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid ni rigs sngags /
NK057(shi)001:1759: dran pa dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid la ni gzungs sngags zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1760: de gnyis kyi rtags su gyur pa ni lha mo'i dbyibs dang gzugs su gyur pa dag go //
NK057(shi)001:1761: sgo ni snga ma bzhin shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1762: spyi'i mtshan nyid 'di lta bu la 'jug pa las /
NK057(shi)001:1763: yan lag bzhi bstan pa'i skabs 'dir ni /
NK057(shi)001:1764: ngag gi brjod pa'i mtshan nyid la sngags zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1766: 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing //
NK057(shi)001:1767: dbye bar dka' la gsang ba nyid //
NK057(shi)001:1768: gsang ste bsgrub phyir brjod pas na //
NK057(shi)001:1769: de phyi sngags zhes brjod pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:1770: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:1771: gsang ba'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir brjod pa'i gsang
NK057(shi)001:1772: tshig lha dang bgegs rnams kyis kyang bzlar mi rung
NK057(shi)001:1773: zhing mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya gsang
NK057(shi)001:1774: ste ngag tu basngagasa shing brjod par bya ba yin
NK057(shi)001:1775: pa'i phyir gsang sngags zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1776: 'di'i las ni mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1777: ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyud la skyed par byed
NK057(shi)001:1778: pa dang / lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi
NK057(shi)001:1779: mtshan ma'i sprul pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang
NK057(shi)001:1780: pa dang / / rkyen gyi byed pa dang thun
NK057(shi)001:1781: mong dang mchog gi dngos grub kyis bsdus pa'i 'dod
NK057(shi)001:1782: pa'i don thams cad grub cing thob par byed pa
NK057(shi)001:1783: pa dang / / dang / chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur pas lha rnams mnyes par byed pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1784: 'di lta bu'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:1785: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra
NK057(shi)001:1786: bar don thams cad sgrub cing de yang lha rnams
NK057(shi)001:1787: nyid gsang sngags kyi gzugs su sprul zhing byin gyis
NK057(shi)001:1788: brlabs pa'o zhes kyang grags so //
NK057(shi)001:1789: 'di lta bu la ni brtags pa gzhan yang snang ste /
NK057(shi)001:1790: phyag rgya'i skabs su mgo dril te bshad par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1791: phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:1792: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi sku gsung thugs mtshon pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa la bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1793: 'di las brgyud nas ni mtshan ma med pa'i don dang /
NK057(shi)001:1794: bdag nyid chen po nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la yang phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug go //
NK057(shi)001:1795: mtshon pa'i phyag rgya de yang mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi dang ldan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1796: bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi mtshan mar gyur pa
NK057(shi)001:1797: dang gang gis kyang 'da' zhing gzhig tu mi rung
NK057(shi)001:1798: ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po nyag gcig gis yin gyi thun mong ma yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1799: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad bsgrub par nus pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1800: yang gsum ste chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1801: ye shes chen po'i gzugs brnyan du gyur pa /
NK057(shi)001:1802: rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtha' yas pa mtshon pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1803: gnas su gyur pa las dang dngos grub thams cad
NK057(shi)001:1804: pa'o // de la ci'i phyir phyag rgya zhes bya zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:1806: mu dra na da mu dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:1807: 'debs shing mtshon pas na phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1808: gang la ji ltar 'debs she na /
NK057(shi)001:1809: rnal 'byor phyi pa'i tshul las ni //
NK057(shi)001:1810: ji ltar rgyal po rang rig rgyas //
NK057(shi)001:1811: rgyal po rtsigs ni btab pa ltar //
NK057(shi)001:1812: bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs //
NK057(shi)001:1813: skye bo kun la de bzhin 'debs //
NK057(shi)001:1815: bdag gi de kho na nyid la lha'i mtshan mas gdab bo zhes 'byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:1816: rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul las ni //
NK057(shi)001:1817: thams cad kun la de bzhin 'debs //
NK057(shi)001:1819: lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya las lhag pa'i phyag rgya 'phrul pa tsam la bya bar bzhed do //
NK057(shi)001:1821: bde bar gshegs pa dang 'gro ba thams cad dbyer
NK057(shi)001:1822: med pas byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po
NK057(shi)001:1824: mnga' dbang chen po brnyes pa'i phyir dang 'gro don
NK057(shi)001:1825: 'di la brtson pa rnams kyi phyiir 'debs par byed
NK057(shi)001:1826: do zhes nang pa'i tshul las bzhed do //
NK057(shi)001:1828: mu dra na da mu dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:1829: dgyes pa bskyed pas na phyag rgya zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1830: bya ba dang rnal 'byor phyi pa'i tshul ltar na yang /
NK057(shi)001:1831: phyag rgya ni mo'i rtags dang yang ldan pa yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:1832: lha mo rnams sbas pa'i sku ste /
NK057(shi)001:1833: gang zhig la 'di bstan par gyur na dam tshig
NK057(shi)001:1834: gi ngo bo nyid kyis dgyes pa bskyed par bshad
NK057(shi)001:1835: do // rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul ltar na yang bud med nyid la phyag rgya'i sgrar bshad de /
NK057(shi)001:1836: de ltar na phyag rgya bud med kyi sgrar bshad pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1837: 'di gnyis la dgyes pa bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid du rang bzhin bye brag tu gyur pa med de /
NK057(shi)001:1838: 'on kyang 'jig rten na sa bla dang sa steng na gnas pa'i tshul gzung nas /
NK057(shi)001:1839: phra ba dang dwangs ma la spyod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1840: rags pa dang snyigs ma la spyod pa'i tshul bzung nas bstan pa tsam du zad do //
NK057(shi)001:1841: yang mu ni grol ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:1842: da ra ni bcings pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:1843: bdag dang gzhan 'ching ba dang grol ba'i las byed pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:1844: so sor bcings pa las 'grol bar byed pa'i las byed pas /
NK057(shi)001:1845: bcings grol gyi don gyis phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1848: don chen po la gegs byed pa rnams 'joms pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:1849: bgegs chen por gyur pa mi shigs pa'i grong khyer
NK057(shi)001:1850: chen po 'joms par byed pas 'joms pas na phyag
NK057(shi)001:1851: rgya zhes bya'o // yi ge gsum po so sor phral te bshad na /
NK057(shi)001:1852: mu ni mu la ste rtsa ba la 'jug pas
NK057(shi)001:1853: phyag rgyas bsrung na dam tshig mi nyams pas dam
NK057(shi)001:1854: tshig gi rtsa ba zhes bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1855: da ni he du ste dbu rgyan la sogs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:1856: rgyas btab na dbang dang ldan par 'gyur bas dbang
NK057(shi)001:1857: bskur ba'i rgyu zhes bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1858: ra ni s+thi ra ste brtan pa'i don la 'jug
NK057(shi)001:1859: pas phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs na lus brtan zhing
NK057(shi)001:1860: bgegs la sogs pas mi phyed par 'gyur bas lus
NK057(shi)001:1861: brtan par byed pa'i phyir phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1863: 'di ni dam tshig rtsa ba ste //
NK057(shi)001:1864: dbu rgyan bcings pa rgyu yi mchog /
NK057(shi)001:1865: gang gi lus kun brtan pas na //
NK057(shi)001:1866: phyag rgya zhes ni bya ba yin //
NK057(shi)001:1868: 'di ni phyag rgya spyi'i nges pa'i tshig go //
NK057(shi)001:1870: mtshon par bya ba dang byed pa'i sgo nas dbye ba byas na ni /
NK057(shi)001:1871: dam tshig dang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen
NK057(shi)001:1872: po zhes bya bar phye ba ni mtshon par byed
NK057(shi)001:1873: pa'i sgo nas rnam par gzhag pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1874: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:1875: las kyi phyag rgya zhes bya bar grags pa bud med kyi lus la 'jug pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1876: ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba yid kyis sprul pa'i lha mo la grags pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1877: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings mtshan ma med pa la 'jug pa rnams ni /
NK057(shi)001:1878: mtshon par bya ba'i sgo nas rnam par gzhag pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1879: de la so so'i nges pa'i tshig ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:1880: dam tshig ni bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi thugs gsang ba ye shes /
NK057(shi)001:1881: phyag rgya ni de'i mtshan mar gyur pa rnams te /
NK057(shi)001:1882: de bas na 'di ni phan tshun tha dad pa'i don du bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1883: yang na 'di la lha mi 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid kyi dam tshig dang ldan pa yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:1884: 'di gnyis chos dang chos can du bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1885: yang phyag rgya gang yin pa de nyid mi 'da'
NK057(shi)001:1886: ba'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin pas de skad ces
NK057(shi)001:1887: bya ste / bdag nyid gcig par bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:1888: tshul 'di ltar chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1889: dbye ba gzhan yang mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
NK057(shi)001:1890: mtshan ma dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'am /
NK057(shi)001:1891: ji skad du grags pa'i phyag rgya rnams dang /
NK057(shi)001:1892: lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:1893: kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar grags pa'i phyag
NK057(shi)001:1894: rgya rnams kyang gzhung so so'i skad du dbye bar
NK057(shi)001:1895: bya'o // ci'i phyir bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis
NK057(shi)001:1896: rgyud rnams su phyag rgya bstan par mdzad ce na
NK057(shi)001:1897: bya'o // / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrub pa
NK057(shi)001:1898: la sangs rgyas bas kyang phyag rgya lhag par bstan
NK057(shi)001:1899: bya'o // / pa'i phyir ro // sngags dang phyag
NK057(shi)001:1900: rgya zhes bya ba rnam pa 'di gnyis kyang gcig
NK057(shi)001:1901: gis khyab par bstan pa yin mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:1902: khyad par cung zad tsam du na phyag rgya ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma gtsor byed pa yin la /
NK057(shi)001:1903: gsang sngags ni ngag gi bden tshig gtsor byas te bstan pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1904: 'di gnyis ka la yang gzhung dang gang zag so
NK057(shi)001:1905: so'i rtog pa'i dbang gis brtag pa rnam pa du
NK057(shi)001:1907: de la dang po ni rnam par smin pa'i lus
NK057(shi)001:1908: dang ngag gi phye ba'i bye brag zhig go zhes
NK057(shi)001:1910: de bzhin du gnyis pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyi
NK057(shi)001:1911: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang brdar gyur pa'o
NK057(shi)001:1912: // zhes brtag pa 'jug tu rung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:1913: gsum pa ni mtshan ma 'di nyid las dang dngos
NK057(shi)001:1914: grub thob par byed pa'i nus pa can no zhes
NK057(shi)001:1915: bya'o // bzhi pa ni 'di nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'phrul pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1916: las kyi dbang gis snang ba gnyis 'dres nas snang ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:1918: lnga pa ni mtshan ma byin rlabs dang ldan pa
NK057(shi)001:1919: 'di nyid la dam tshig can gyi skye bo rnams
NK057(shi)001:1920: kyis lha nyid du kun tu brtag pa zhes bya'o
NK057(shi)001:1921: // drug pa ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes
NK057(shi)001:1922: chen po de nyid thugs rje dang smon lam gyi
NK057(shi)001:1923: dbang gis mtshan mar byin gyis brlabs shing gyur pa
NK057(shi)001:1924: // ste / dper na bag chags kyi dbang gis
NK057(shi)001:1925: sems nyid yul dang lus su snang ba lta bu
NK057(shi)001:1926: zhes bya ba'i brtag pa 'jug tu rung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:1927: tshul 'di lta bu rnams las mchog tu gyur pa
NK057(shi)001:1928: ni drug pa 'di nyid yin par shes par bya'o
NK057(shi)001:1930: sngags kyi skabs su lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom pa la bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:1931: de yang chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1932: don la phyin ci ma log pa'i ye shes dang /
NK057(shi)001:1933: de dag gi dbang gis snang ba'i gzugs kyi sku
NK057(shi)001:1934: cha shas dang bcas pa la lha zhes bya ba'i
NK057(shi)001:1936: de lta bu'i don la sems rtse gcig tu byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ting nge 'dzin te /
NK057(shi)001:1937: de bas na mtshan ma med pa'i don la sems rtse gcig pa'ang rung /
NK057(shi)001:1938: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i don la rtse gcig kyang rung /
NK057(shi)001:1939: las dang dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin par bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:1940: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor yang don bsdu na /
NK057(shi)001:1941: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
NK057(shi)001:1942: yongs su brtags pa'i rnal 'byor dang /
NK057(shi)001:1943: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang gsum du 'dus par bshad de /
NK057(shi)001:1944: 'di gsum yang lha rgyan gcig pa'i rnal 'byor cig la yang tshang la /
NK057(shi)001:1945: rgyud so so'i grub pa'i mtha' yis dmigs pa so sor 'dod pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:1946: de la byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor ni bdag
NK057(shi)001:1947: gi de kho na nyid la lha'i de kho na
NK057(shi)001:1948: nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs shing bsgos na /
NK057(shi)001:1949: lcags kyi rigs la gser 'gyur gyi rtsi btang ba bzhin du 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:1950: yongs su brtags pa'i rnal 'byor ni gser la sogs
NK057(shi)001:1951: pa legs par bzhu ba las sku gzugs la sogs
NK057(shi)001:1953: byang chub kyi sems dag pa las gzugs kyi skur bskyed par 'dod do //
NK057(shi)001:1954: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni chu dwangs pa'i nang du gzugs brnyan 'char ba rtsol ba med pa bzhin /
NK057(shi)001:1955: rang bzhin dag pa'i rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas ting nge 'dzin skad cig mas rdzogs par 'phrul lo //
NK057(shi)001:1956: rnal 'byor 'di gsum gyis ni gsang sngags mtha' dag bsdus par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:1957: 'di'i gzhis ni mtshan nyid kyi theg pa gsum yang bsdus pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:1958: 'di ltar rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las /
NK057(shi)001:1959: dang po dam tshig byin brlab pa //
NK057(shi)001:1961: dbu ma rdzogs par bya ba dag /
NK057(shi)001:1964: de la dang po'i tshig ni gzhung lugs la 'jug pas gzhung lugs dang po ste /
NK057(shi)001:1966: de dang mthun pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor te /
NK057(shi)001:1968: 'dir bdag gi de kho na nyid la bdag ni phung po lnga blos rnam par ma phye ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:1969: de kho na nyid ni mu stegs can gyis bdag
NK057(shi)001:1970: dang bdag gi la sogs pa kun tu brtags pas
NK057(shi)001:1971: stong pa / phung po khams dang skye mched kyi
NK057(shi)001:1972: chos tsam med par skur pa gdab tu mi rung
NK057(shi)001:1973: ba 'di ni bdag gi de kho na nyid do
NK057(shi)001:1974: stong pa / // de ni byin gyis brlab tu rung ba'i gzhi ste /
NK057(shi)001:1975: de la byin gyis rlob par byed pa ni lha'i dngos po'o //
NK057(shi)001:1976: de yang chos nyid dag pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:1977: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
NK057(shi)001:1978: rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang /
NK057(shi)001:1981: gzugs la sogs pa'i lhar rtogs pa rnams so //
NK057(shi)001:1982: 'dir phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi blo mi gtong bas
NK057(shi)001:1983: gzhung lugs dang po nyan thos dang mthun pa yin
NK057(shi)001:1984: te / de lta bus 'dul ba'i gang zag gi
NK057(shi)001:1985: dbang du gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i thabs
NK057(shi)001:1986: te / yin no // yongs su brtags pa'i rnal
NK057(shi)001:1987: 'byor ni rnal 'byor spyod pa ba dang sgo mthun
NK057(shi)001:1988: te / yin no // pa yin te / 'di
NK057(shi)001:1989: ltar bdag gi de kho na nyid kyang gzung ba
NK057(shi)001:1990: dang 'dzin par kun tu brtags pas stong pa sems
NK057(shi)001:1991: dang sems las byung ba rang rig pa gang gis
NK057(shi)001:1992: kyang gzung bar bya ba ma yin pa gang la
NK057(shi)001:1993: yang 'dzin par byed pa ma yin pa /
NK057(shi)001:1994: skad cig ma rgyun 'brel par gnas pa 'di tsam med par skur pa gdab tu mi rung ste /
NK057(shi)001:1995: de yang 'di ltar gyur na ni 'phags pa nyid dang khyad med pa yin mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:1996: 'on kyang so so'i skye bo'i skabs su yang 'di
NK057(shi)001:1997: ltar rtogs shing goms pa las rim gyis lha'i skur
NK057(shi)001:1998: bskyed par bya'o // 'di sems dang ye shes rang
NK057(shi)001:1999: snang ba ma gtogs par yul gud du mi dmigs
NK057(shi)001:2000: pas rnal 'byor spyod pa dang mthun pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:2001: de ltar 'dus pa'i dbang du gsungs pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:2002: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor ni dbu ma dang sgo mthun pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:2003: bdag gi de kho na nyid kyang brtags pa tsam ste /
NK057(shi)001:2004: de la bdag ni phung po lnga la blos ma phye ba tsam mo //
NK057(shi)001:2005: de'i de kho na nyid ni spros pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba tsam ste /
NK057(shi)001:2006: 'di ltar rten gang yang dmigs pa med do //
NK057(shi)001:2007: de las sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sna
NK057(shi)001:2008: tshogs su 'phrul yang rten med cing ngo bo nyid
NK057(shi)001:2009: med pa ste / 'on kyang gdul bya rnams kyi
NK057(shi)001:2010: dbang la snang ba ni chu zla dang 'dra ste
NK057(shi)001:2011: med pa ste / / chu zla ni chu la zla ba'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin /
NK057(shi)001:2012: zla ba nyid las 'ongs pa ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2013: 'on kyang 'jig rten pa'i mig gi blo la chu dwangs par snang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2014: nam mkha' la zla ba gsal ba gnyis yod na /
NK057(shi)001:2015: de'i dbang gis chu'i nang na zla ba yod pa dang 'dra bar snang ngo //
NK057(shi)001:2016: de bzhin du gdul bya rnams kyi blo la 'khrul
NK057(shi)001:2017: pa'i bag chags ma zad kyi bar du snang ba
NK057(shi)001:2018: mi ldog ste / de'i dbang gis dkar po'i bag
NK057(shi)001:2019: chags sgrib pa rim gyis dag pa'i mtshan nyid rgyud
NK057(shi)001:2020: mi ldog ste / dang ba dang / dad pas dkon cog bsten par snang ba'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:2021: rgyal ba rnams kyis kyang smon lam dang thugs rje
NK057(shi)001:2022: lhun gyis grub par mdzad par snang ba mnga' ba'i
NK057(shi)001:2023: dbang gis gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la ji ltar
NK057(shi)001:2024: 'tshams pa bzhin du snang ba 'byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:2025: 'di ltar lhun gyis grub na ni sangs rgyas nyid
NK057(shi)001:2026: dang khyad par med par gyur pa yin mod kyi
NK057(shi)001:2027: / 'on kyang las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor pas
NK057(shi)001:2028: kyang don 'di lta bu rtogs shing bsgoms pa'i ngang
NK057(shi)001:2029: las sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro ba'i don du ji
NK057(shi)001:2030: ltar 'tshams pa bzhin du sprul par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2031: de la rten dang ngo bo nyid gang yang gzung bar mi bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2032: 'di dag ni grub pa'i mthas phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2033: dgos pa so so'i skabs kyi dbye ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:2034: tshul bzhin du sgrub pa'i gang zag gcig la yang spyod pa gsum gyis bsdus pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2035: tha lam pa'i spyod lam gyi bye brag gis de
NK057(shi)001:2036: dag gi ting nge 'dzin yang so so yin te
NK057(shi)001:2037: / de la spyod pa gsum ni dang po 'jug pa'i spyod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2038: bar du dngos grub sgrub pa'i spyod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2039: mtha' mar grub pa'i spyod pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2040: de la 'jug pa'i spyod pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2041: dang po rdo rje slob dpon yongs su gzung ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2042: des bstan pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang nod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2043: de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sdom
NK057(shi)001:2044: pa bzung ste dam tshig can du byas pa dang
NK057(shi)001:2045: / ji ltar bsgom zhing bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2046: man ngag thams cad mnos te man ngag can du
NK057(shi)001:2047: / bya ba dang / de nas kyang brtson pa
NK057(shi)001:2048: mi 'dor bar bka' bzhin byed pa'i mtshan nyid rnams
NK057(shi)001:2049: / bya ba dang / yin no // sgrub pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2050: spyod pa ni bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag tu gtogs
NK057(shi)001:2051: / bya ba dang / yin no // pa rnams
NK057(shi)001:2052: so // grub pa'i spyod pa ni las kyi spros
NK057(shi)001:2054: de dag gi dbang gis phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs su shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2056: sa ma d+hi zhes bya ba mtshungs pa'i blo ste sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:2057: mchod pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:2058: bkur ba'i gnas su gyur pa rnams la sgo gsum nas bkur zhing mchod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2059: rdzas kyi sgo nas kyang mnyes par byas pa'i las kyi bdag nyid de /
NK057(shi)001:2062: don dam pa dang kun rdzob bam /
NK057(shi)001:2063: bla na yod pa dang bla na med pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:2064: rang gi yan lag tu gtogs pa'i phyi rol gyi'am /
NK057(shi)001:2065: nang dang phyi la sogs pa'i dbye bas spyir du mar grags mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:2068: las rnam bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi mchod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2070: sbyor sgrol bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'i mchod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2071: rdo rje glu'i sgo nas bstod pa'i mchod pa tsam du gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:2072: de dag 'dir bstan pa'i nang 'dus par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2074: p+au dza zhes bya ba p+au ra na ra p+au
NK057(shi)001:2075: ra na ra pri yang dza ta ste yang dang
NK057(shi)001:2076: yang dgyes pa bskyed pas mchod pa zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2077: pur ba dza ta ste sngon du bskyed par bya ba'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:2078: de ni dge ba'i las thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:2079: p+au dza rba go ra rba r+tha ste /
NK057(shi)001:2080: mchod pa'i don ni bkur ba'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:2081: de ltar bstan pa'i dngos po dgu po 'di dag
NK057(shi)001:2082: gis ni rgyud thams cad kyang bsdus pa yin la
NK057(shi)001:2083: / 'di nas kyang 'di dag tsam ston par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2084: mtha' ma rgyud yongs su gtad pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2085: rgyud yun du gnas par bya ba'i phyir te /
NK057(shi)001:2086: de ltar na gleng gzhi ni rgyu /
NK057(shi)001:2088: gang bshad pa'i chos kyi dngos po ni 'bras bu /
NK057(shi)001:2089: yongs su gtad pa ni de yongs su mi nyams
NK057(shi)001:2090: par yongs su bsrung ba'i mtshan nyid de 'di tsam
NK057(shi)001:2091: gyis gzhung yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir rgyud kyi ldang
NK057(shi)001:2092: tshad bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2093: da ni rgyud kyi dgos 'brel bshad par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2094: de yang nyan pa po rtogs pa'i blo sngon du gtong ba dag /
NK057(shi)001:2095: dgos 'brel yod par mthong na ni nyan cing bsgrub pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur la /
NK057(shi)001:2096: ma mthong na ni mi 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:2097: de yang legs par bsgrubs pas khong du chud par 'gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:2098: de bas na de dag legs par bsnyad pa bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2099: de yang 'brel ba bsgrub par bya ba yang bsgrub
NK057(shi)001:2100: thabs la sogs pa gzhung tshad ma yin nam ma
NK057(shi)001:2101: yin the tshom za ba rnams la ni /
NK057(shi)001:2102: bka' dang 'brel bar bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2103: gzhung gis dgos pa bsgrub par mi nus sam zhes the tshom za ba rnams la ni /
NK057(shi)001:2104: dgos pa dang 'brel ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2105: don gyi nus pa la the tshom za ba rnams la ni /
NK057(shi)001:2106: don gyi dgos 'brel bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2107: gzhung dbu zhabs kyis don ji ltar ston cing bsgrub pa la the tshom za ba rnams la ni /
NK057(shi)001:2108: rgyud kyi 'brel ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2109: gzhung nyid thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i bka' yin
NK057(shi)001:2110: nam ma yin the tshom za ba rnams la ni
NK057(shi)001:2111: / gzhung spyi'i 'brel ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2112: ston pa dang de'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i rgyud gnyis
NK057(shi)001:2113: gcig pa'am tha dad pa la the tshom za ba
NK057(shi)001:2114: rnams la ni / ston pa dang rgyud du 'brel ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2115: de ltar 'brel pa de rnams kyis don phyin ci
NK057(shi)001:2116: ma log pa'i blo bskyed pa ni de dag rang
NK057(shi)001:2117: rang gi dgos pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2118: mthar phyin pa'i 'bras bu ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2119: de dag gis dgos 'brel legs par khong du chud par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2120: de la bka' dang 'brel pa khong du chud par
NK057(shi)001:2121: byed pa'i tshe ni de nyid kyi khungs su gyur
NK057(shi)001:2122: pa'i lung gang yin pa dang mthun par bshad cing
NK057(shi)001:2123: ngo bstan pas the tshom sel bar 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:2124: dgos pa dang 'brel pa bsgrub pa'i tshe na ni /
NK057(shi)001:2125: gzhung gi brjod bya dang gzhung ni brjod bya brjod byed kyis 'brel ba yin la /
NK057(shi)001:2126: brjod bya'i don rtogs pa ni brjod pa'i dgos pa
NK057(shi)001:2127: yin pas des mi nus pa la the tshom za
NK057(shi)001:2128: ba sel lo // don rtogs pa'i sgo nas 'bras
NK057(shi)001:2129: bu ji ltar sgrub par byed pa bsgrub pa'i tshe
NK057(shi)001:2130: ba sel lo // na ni / phyin ci ma
NK057(shi)001:2131: log par don rtogs pa shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni
NK057(shi)001:2133: shes nas goms par byed pa ni dgos pa ste 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid rkyen no //
NK057(shi)001:2134: goms pa'i mthus mngon du gyur pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2135: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa ste 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:2136: 'di dag ni don gyi dgos 'brel bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2137: rgyud kyi 'brel ba ni gsang ba 'dus pa las /
NK057(shi)001:2138: le'u bcu bdun pa ni bsnyen sgrub yan lag bzhis
NK057(shi)001:2139: bsdus nas gang zag gcig gi cha rkyen du rung
NK057(shi)001:2141: de yang slob dpon spyi'i las su gyur ba rdul
NK057(shi)001:2142: tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba yongs su rdzogs
NK057(shi)001:2143: pa dang / thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub
NK057(shi)001:2144: bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga dang sangs rgyas dang
NK057(shi)001:2145: byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa dang las kyi spros
NK057(shi)001:2146: pa rnams la bsnyen sgrub bzhir 'brel te gsungs so
NK057(shi)001:2147: pa dang / // rgyud kyi 'brel pa dngos su
NK057(shi)001:2148: ma bshad pa'i rgyud gzhan las kyang dang por 'jug
NK057(shi)001:2149: pa'i spyod pas bsdus pa gzhan gyi don du gtogs
NK057(shi)001:2150: pa dang / // pa / slob dpon spyi'i las su grags pa /
NK057(shi)001:2151: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas slob ma
NK057(shi)001:2152: dbang bskur zhing dam tshig dpog pa'i cho gas bsdus
NK057(shi)001:2154: dngos grub bsgrub pa'i spyod pas bsdus pa rang gi don du gtogs pa /
NK057(shi)001:2155: slob dpon dang slob ma spyi'i las su grags pa
NK057(shi)001:2156: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten yang rung ma
NK057(shi)001:2158: bsnyen sgrub kyi yan lag gi sgo nas thun mong
NK057(shi)001:2159: dang mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho
NK057(shi)001:2160: gas bsdus pa'i 'brel pa bsgrub pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2161: grub pa'i spyod pas bsdus pa phal cher gzhan gyi
NK057(shi)001:2162: don du gtogs pa slob dpon dang slob ma gang
NK057(shi)001:2164: tshul bzhin dpyod pa rnams kyi mtha'i las su gyur
NK057(shi)001:2165: pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad spyod
NK057(shi)001:2166: dang / las rab tu spros pa ji ltar bsgrub pa'i 'brel ba rnams ston te /
NK057(shi)001:2167: der ma gtogs pa'i 'brel pa gzhan bsgrub pa ni med do //
NK057(shi)001:2168: rgyud 'di nyid las kyang 'brel ba 'di dag bsgrub par bya ba yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2169: de dag ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:2170: 'og nas de dag so so'i sgom khog dang /
NK057(shi)001:2171: las kyi go rim ston pa'i skabs nas shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2172: da ni gzhung nyid thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2173: bka' ma yin par the tshom za ba rnams la
NK057(shi)001:2174: lung spyi'i 'brel pa bsgrub par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2175: de la dang po nyid du mu stegs can phyi
NK057(shi)001:2176: rol gyi rig byed spyod pa ba rnams na re
NK057(shi)001:2177: / dge sbyong goo ta mas bshad pa'i chos ni
NK057(shi)001:2178: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin par nges pa
NK057(shi)001:2179: med do zhes rgol bar byed do //
NK057(shi)001:2180: de la dpang po rnam pa gsum brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2181: 'di ltar lung bstan pa'i dpang po dang /
NK057(shi)001:2182: gang zag gi dpang po dang /
NK057(shi)001:2183: lung 'brel ba zhes bya ba'i sgo nas rig pa'i dpang po'o //
NK057(shi)001:2184: de la spyir dpang po zhes bya ba ni yid
NK057(shi)001:2185: ches pa'i gang zag gi sgo nas brjod pa yin
NK057(shi)001:2186: mod kyi / 'on kyang gtan tshigs gzhan yang yid
NK057(shi)001:2187: ches par byed nus na dpang po'i sgras brjod pa
NK057(shi)001:2189: dpang bo de dag kyang rgol ba nyid la grub pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2190: de bas na yid ches pa'i rgyur rung nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:2191: de la dang po lung bstan pa'i dpang po ni /
NK057(shi)001:2192: bram ze rnams kyi rig byed las /
NK057(shi)001:2193: u dum w+aa ra'i me tog dang 'dra bar rgya lam rgya lam na /
NK057(shi)001:2194: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen
NK057(shi)001:2195: pa 'jig rten du rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs
NK057(shi)001:2197: de'i tshe yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i tshe na ni /
NK057(shi)001:2198: glang po che thal dkar mche ba drug pa /
NK057(shi)001:2199: srog chags lham bu chur gsher ba ltar mgo dmar
NK057(shi)001:2200: la 'dril ba cig yum gyi glo g.yas nas 'jug
NK057(shi)001:2201: par yum gyi rmi lam du byung la /
NK057(shi)001:2202: bltams nas kyang mtshan dang dpe bya bzang pos brgyan pa zhig byung ste /
NK057(shi)001:2203: de rab tu ma byung na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur la /
NK057(shi)001:2204: gal te rab tu byung na ni lha dang mi
NK057(shi)001:2205: rnams kyi ston pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro
NK057(shi)001:2206: zhes lung bstan pa'i dpang po yod pa yin no
NK057(shi)001:2207: // dge sbyong goo ta ma yang de bzhin du byung ba yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2208: de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2209: gang zag gi dpang po yang yod pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2210: de yang lha dang bdud la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul
NK057(shi)001:2211: che ba rnams la ni de dag gi yid brtan
NK057(shi)001:2212: du rung ba'i tshad ma sa'i lha mo brtan mas
NK057(shi)001:2213: dpang po byas pa yin la /
NK057(shi)001:2214: dge sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa mthu dang
NK057(shi)001:2215: rdzu 'phrul chung ba rnams kyi dpang po ni de
NK057(shi)001:2216: dag yid ches pa'i tshad mar gyur pa /
NK057(shi)001:2217: rig byed spyod pa'i bram ze dam pa rnams kyis byas te /
NK057(shi)001:2218: 'di ltar bltams pa'i tshe mtshan rtags ni 'di skad du /
NK057(shi)001:2219: rtog ge ba rnams thams cad blo 'khrul te //
NK057(shi)001:2220: rtsod pa'i dus su 'khor los sgyur mi 'byung //
NK057(shi)001:2221: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yin nges //
NK057(shi)001:2223: de'i phyir gang zag gi dpang po yod nges nyid do //
NK057(shi)001:2225: mu stegs can rig byed spyod pa khyed rang gi gzhung las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:2226: gang zag gi bdag rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can gang yin pa de /
NK057(shi)001:2227: yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir blo gros dang /
NK057(shi)001:2229: snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK057(shi)001:2230: de'i grogs su gyur pa lus ngag gi tshangs par
NK057(shi)001:2231: spyod pa'i sgo nas gang zag yongs su dag par
NK057(shi)001:2232: byas te / thar pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i ma yin nam /
NK057(shi)001:2233: kho bo cag bye brag tu smra ba dang po'i lta ba yang /
NK057(shi)001:2234: gang zag yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir shes rab dang /
NK057(shi)001:2236: de'i grogs tshul khrims bdag gis thar pa bsgrub par 'dod pa yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:2238: khyed gang zag rtag par 'dod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2239: kho bo cag mi rtag par 'dod pa'i bye brag
NK057(shi)001:2240: ni de dang 'dra ba khyed kyi lta ba'i bye
NK057(shi)001:2241: brag nang mi mthun pa yod pa dang 'dra'o //
NK057(shi)001:2242: de ni dper na dpag bsam ni shing du 'dra ba'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:2243: sha ba la sogs pa shing gzhan bzhin du rkang
NK057(shi)001:2244: pas 'thungs pas bskyed pa yin par gdon mi za'o
NK057(shi)001:2245: // dpag bsam 'bras bu dang lo ma dang /
NK057(shi)001:2246: dri la sogs pa cung zad mi 'dra ba ni nang gi bye brag ste /
NK057(shi)001:2247: sha ba dang da ba dang kha te ra la
NK057(shi)001:2248: sogs pa yang nang gi bye brag cung zad mi
NK057(shi)001:2250: dpang po 'di dag gis bsgrubs na mu stegs can
NK057(shi)001:2251: gyis sangs rgyas pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen pas ma
NK057(shi)001:2252: gsungs par bsgrub pa'i rig pa gzhan yang mi rnyed
NK057(shi)001:2253: la / dpang po 'di rnams kho bdag nyid la
NK057(shi)001:2254: grub pas the tshom za ba'i gnas kyang mi rnyed
NK057(shi)001:2255: la / do // 'di ni lung 'brel ba'i dpang po bsgrub pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2256: yang nyan thos pa na re /
NK057(shi)001:2257: theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin pas nges pa med do zhes rgol bar byed do //
NK057(shi)001:2258: de la yang snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2259: 'di la lung bstan pa'i dpang po ni khyed nyid
NK057(shi)001:2260: kyi mdo las byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskal
NK057(shi)001:2261: pa grangs med pa gsum du dka' ba sna tshogs
NK057(shi)001:2262: spyad cing sems stobs chen po dang ldan pas sems
NK057(shi)001:2263: can thams cad kyi don nyams su len pa dang
NK057(shi)001:2264: / shes rab che bas slob dpon rgyud du byung ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2265: mthar sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar gsungs pa ma yin nam /
NK057(shi)001:2266: theg pa chen po yang de bzhin du byung ba yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2267: de ji ltar bsgrub pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa
NK057(shi)001:2268: legs par gtan la phab ste bstan pa tsam du
NK057(shi)001:2269: zad do // de'i phyer lung bstan pa'i dpang po dang bcas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2270: gang zag gi dpang po yang yod pa nyid de /
NK057(shi)001:2271: 'di ltar 'phags pa nyan thos chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam bstan pa mdzad do //
NK057(shi)001:2272: lung du 'brel ba'i dpang po yang yod pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:2273: 'di ltar khyed kyi lung las bden pa bzhi la
NK057(shi)001:2274: dmigs nas shes rab kyi mi rtag pa dang sdug
NK057(shi)001:2275: bsngal ba dang stong pa dang bdag med pa'i rnam
NK057(shi)001:2277: bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK057(shi)001:2278: de'i grogs su gyur pa so sor thar pa'i sdom
NK057(shi)001:2279: pa'i sgo nas thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa
NK057(shi)001:2280: bsgrub par 'dod pa ma yin nam /
NK057(shi)001:2281: theg pa chen po yang de dang mthun par 'byung ste /
NK057(shi)001:2282: chos la bdag med par smra ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2283: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la sogs pa cung
NK057(shi)001:2284: zad mi 'dra ba ni nang gi bye brag ste
NK057(shi)001:2286: khyed cag nyid la yang mdo sde pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2287: bye brag tu smra ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2288: kha che bye brag tu smra ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2289: yul dbus kyi bye brag tu smra dang /
NK057(shi)001:2290: sde pa so sor lta ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2291: sdom pa nang mi mthun pa yod pa dang 'dra'o //
NK057(shi)001:2292: de bas na khyed rnams kyis theg pa chen po
NK057(shi)001:2293: sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin par the tshom za
NK057(shi)001:2294: bar mi bya'o // 'di ni lung 'brel pa gnyis pa bsgrub pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2295: yang theg pa chen po pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa rnams na re /
NK057(shi)001:2296: gsang sngags kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka' yin pa'i nges pa med do zhes zer ro //
NK057(shi)001:2297: de la yang snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2298: de la lung bstan pa'i dpang po ni khyed nyid
NK057(shi)001:2299: la grub pa'i mdo sde gdams ngag 'bog pa'i rgyal
NK057(shi)001:2300: po las / nga ni 'di nas mi snang nas //
NK057(shi)001:2301: lo ni brgyad dang bcu gnyis na //
NK057(shi)001:2302: bstan pa'i snying po dam pa zhig /
NK057(shi)001:2303: 'dzam gling lho yi phyogs ngos kyi //
NK057(shi)001:2304: rgyal po dzahzhesa bya ba la //
NK057(shi)001:2305: thugs rje mthun pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK057(shi)001:2306: lag na rdo rjes snang bar byed //
NK057(shi)001:2307: ces lung bstan pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2308: lung bstan pa dang mthun par thun mong du grags pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2309: gsang sngags kyi theg pa yin pa'i phyir lung bstan pa'i dpang po dang bcas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2310: gang zag gi dpang po ni byang chub sems dpa'
NK057(shi)001:2311: phyag na rdo rje rtag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK057(shi)001:2313: theg pa chen po thams cad kyi sdud pa po yin par mdo sde nyid las grags la /
NK057(shi)001:2314: de yang lho phyogs gyad kyi yul lha ma srin
NK057(shi)001:2315: sde brgyad dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
NK057(shi)001:2316: / bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pas dbang bskur bas thun mong du grags pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2317: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje kyang gsang sngags thams cad bsdus nas /
NK057(shi)001:2318: mkhan po ku ku la sogs pa skal pa dang
NK057(shi)001:2319: ldan pa rnams la bshad pas gang zag gi dpang
NK057(shi)001:2321: phyag na rdo rje mthong ba'i skal ba dang mi
NK057(shi)001:2322: ldan pa rnams la mkhan po ku ku yang gsang
NK057(shi)001:2323: sngags thun mong du ma grags pa'i gong du sde
NK057(shi)001:2324: snod gsum po 'dzam bu gling na shes nyen che
NK057(shi)001:2325: bar thun mong du grags pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:2326: des dpal phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong nas dngos
NK057(shi)001:2327: grub chen po phul du byung ba brnyes pa yang
NK057(shi)001:2328: thun mong du grags pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2329: de'i phyir gang zag gi dpang po dang bcas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2330: lung 'brel pa'i dpang po yang yod de /
NK057(shi)001:2331: de yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde nyid las /
NK057(shi)001:2332: bdag dang sangs rgyas rang bzhin mnyam par gnas pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2333: phung po lnga grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2334: nyon mongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2335: nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par grol ba yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2336: sems can gyi sems rang byung gi ye shes kyi snying po can yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2337: chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2338: bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'i zhing khams yongs su
NK057(shi)001:2339: ma dag par snang ba 'di nyid kyang yongs su
NK057(shi)001:2340: dag pa'i zhing khams yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2341: 'jug pa dam pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul la 'jug pa yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2342: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i dam pa bud med
NK057(shi)001:2343: kyis mnyes par byas pa la sogs pa yin pa
NK057(shi)001:2344: ni / khyed kyi lung pha rol tu phyin pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2345: tshul gyi mdo sde nyid kyis gsungs pa yin la
NK057(shi)001:2346: ni / / gsang sngags kyi tshul las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:2347: don de dag nyid ji ltar bsgrub pa'i thabs legs
NK057(shi)001:2348: par gtan la phab pa tsam du zad pas lung
NK057(shi)001:2349: 'brel ba'i dpang po grub pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2350: don de dag nyid mdo gang las ji skad gsungs
NK057(shi)001:2351: pa la the tshom za ba rnams la khungs cung
NK057(shi)001:2353: bdag dang sangs rgyas mnyam par gnas pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2354: phung po lnga sangs rgyas su ston pa'i khungs ni /
NK057(shi)001:2355: sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las /
NK057(shi)001:2356: gang zhig bdag dang sangs rgyas rnams //
NK057(shi)001:2357: rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing //
NK057(shi)001:2358: mi gnas len pa med pa de //
NK057(shi)001:2359: de dag bde bar gshegs pas gsungs //
NK057(shi)001:2360: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
NK057(shi)001:2361: rnam par shes dang sems pa dag /
NK057(shi)001:2362: grangs med de bzhin bshegs pa rnams //
NK057(shi)001:2363: de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur //
NK057(shi)001:2365: nyon mongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
NK057(shi)001:2366: rang bzhin yin pa la sogs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2367: dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK057(shi)001:2368: nyon mongs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ngo zhes bya ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2369: gang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang
NK057(shi)001:2370: bral bas rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya ba ni
NK057(shi)001:2371: / nga rgyal ba rnams la bstan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:2372: nga med pa rnams kyis ni 'dod chags dang zhe
NK057(shi)001:2373: sdang dang gti mug gi rang bzhin rnam par grol
NK057(shi)001:2375: gsog dang gsob dang snying po med pa yin yang /
NK057(shi)001:2376: bsod nams gsog ma yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2377: ye shes gsob ma yin pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2378: rang byung gi ye shes su dbang bskur ba'i snying
NK057(shi)001:2379: po med pa ma yin par gsungs pa lta bu
NK057(shi)001:2380: dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgrub pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid du gsungs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2381: gang nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su ma dag gam /
NK057(shi)001:2382: dmus long rnams kyis mi mthong /
NK057(shi)001:2383: de bzhin du nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni /
NK057(shi)001:2384: sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan bkod pa'i zhing khams bzhin du rtag tu 'di 'dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:2385: khyed rnams kyis ni mi mthong ngo //
NK057(shi)001:2386: zhes sh+aa ri bu la gsungs pa lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:2387: gnyis su med pa'i tshul la 'jug pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK057(shi)001:2388: bud med kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba yang mdo gzhan las /
NK057(shi)001:2389: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
NK057(shi)001:2390: mnyes par bya ba'i phyir rang gi lus bud med
NK057(shi)001:2391: kyi lus su mngon par sprul nas de bzhin gshegs
NK057(shi)001:2392: pa'i mdun du rtag tu gnas so //
NK057(shi)001:2394: de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
NK057(shi)001:2395: ni dpang po dang bral bar gzugs kyi sku mi
NK057(shi)001:2396: ston zhing / dam pa'i chos mi ston te /
NK057(shi)001:2397: the tshom gyi gnas mi ston no //
NK057(shi)001:2398: gang dag the tshom za ba rnams ni nga rgyal
NK057(shi)001:2399: gyi dbang gis gang zag khyad par can la yang
NK057(shi)001:2401: gti mug gis dpang po tshol ba'i blo yang mi skye /
NK057(shi)001:2402: thos pa chung bas rgyal bas dpang po rnam pa gsum gzhag pa yang /
NK057(shi)001:2403: ma thos pa'i blun po ma rabs rnams yin te /
NK057(shi)001:2404: 'brel ba bsgrub pa 'di lta bu yang de lta bu dag srid pa'i phyir yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2405: gzhan yang kha cig 'di skad zer te /
NK057(shi)001:2406: gsang sngags kyi rgyud du grags pa 'di dag la yang /
NK057(shi)001:2407: ldab bu dang zlos bur bstan pa mang du bstan te /
NK057(shi)001:2408: de bas na 'di dag rgyud yin par khungs phyung yang /
NK057(shi)001:2409: kha cig sngon gyi mkhan po rnams kyis gzhung las
NK057(shi)001:2410: bsdus pa la sogs pa rang gis sbyar ba yin
NK057(shi)001:2412: de bas na dad pa'i yul du mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2413: las dang dngos grub kyi rgyur yang mi rung ngo snyam du the tshom za ba ste /
NK057(shi)001:2414: 'di ltar gsang ba 'dus pa las gsungs pa'i byang chub sems kyi le'u dang /
NK057(shi)001:2415: rigs kyi yum dang khro bo bcu'i sngags dang /
NK057(shi)001:2416: las dang drag po'i las kyi brtul zhugs dang phur pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga lta bu /
NK057(shi)001:2417: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i rgyud las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:2418: de bzhin du zlos bur gsungs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2419: gsang ba snying po dang brgyad cu pa lta bu mang nyung zlos bur gsungs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2420: de bzhin du rdo rje gdan bzhi che chung dang /
NK057(shi)001:2421: krish+na ya ma ri che chung la sogs pa 'di
NK057(shi)001:2422: dag ston pas de bzhin du gsungs so zhes bya
NK057(shi)001:2423: ba ni / zlos bur bshad pa don med par 'gyur la /
NK057(shi)001:2424: gal te gang zag gcig gis sdebs pa zhig yin na yang /
NK057(shi)001:2425: gong du bstan pa lta bu'i skyon du 'gyur la /
NK057(shi)001:2426: gang zag gi dpang po yang med de /
NK057(shi)001:2427: de bas na 'di lta bu'i 'brel pa bsgrub par mi nus so zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:2428: de la 'di brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2429: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs gdul bya rnams kyi rgyud la snang ste /
NK057(shi)001:2430: phan pa dang chos nyid ston pa na /
NK057(shi)001:2431: gzugs kyi sku khyad par can du snang ba 'ba' zhig tu ris su chad pa med de /
NK057(shi)001:2432: 'di ltar du thun mong dang khyad par du snang yang rung /
NK057(shi)001:2433: dman pa dang dam par yang rung /
NK057(shi)001:2434: tha na bdud bzhi po dag dang nyon mongs pa
NK057(shi)001:2435: stong phrag brgyad cu po dag gis sems can rnams
NK057(shi)001:2436: nyon mongs par byed pa dag gis sangs rgyas rnams
NK057(shi)001:2437: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mi byed pa gang yang
NK057(shi)001:2438: med do // de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2439: byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba yang rnam par rtog pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2441: de'i phyir gang zag la ngan sems mi bskyed do //
NK057(shi)001:2442: dad pa dang shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin dang
NK057(shi)001:2443: de'i grogs su gyur pa'i sdom pa dang ldan na
NK057(shi)001:2444: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang sangs rgyas nyid dang 'dra
NK057(shi)001:2445: ste / mdo sde'i gzhung las kyang slob dpon brtags pa'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:2446: de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan na sangs rgyas
NK057(shi)001:2447: la brten nas mtshams med pa'i las gsog pa de
NK057(shi)001:2448: bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyi khrag phyung ba
NK057(shi)001:2449: bzhin no // de bas na lung 'brel pa yod
NK057(shi)001:2450: na da lta gang zag gi dpang po med kyang
NK057(shi)001:2451: the tshom gyi gnas su bya ba yang ma yin
NK057(shi)001:2452: na dngos su skur pa gdab pa lta ci smos
NK057(shi)001:2453: bzhin no // te / 'di lta bu la sogs pa ni shin tu bzod par daka'o //
NK057(shi)001:2454: las dang dngos grub kyi rgyur mi rung ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:2455: rgyal ba'i bka' dam pa nyid yin du zin kyang /
NK057(shi)001:2456: slob dpon dam tshig nyams par gyur pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2457: bka' chad kyi gnas su gyur pa rnams kyi lag nas brgyud pa'i gzhung gi tshogs dang /
NK057(shi)001:2458: kha las brgyud pa'i man ngag gi tshogs kyis las dang dngos grub 'grub pa 'gyur ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:2459: skal ba dang dad pa dang mnyam par bzhag pa
NK057(shi)001:2460: rnams shin tu phul du gyur pa 'ga' zhig las
NK057(shi)001:2461: ma gtogs pa / gzhan rgyur rung ba ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2462: de bas na shes bya la phyin ci ma log
NK057(shi)001:2463: par smra ba rnams kyi ched du ni gzhung 'brel
NK057(shi)001:2464: ba'i rig pa grub pa kho nas chog par shes
NK057(shi)001:2465: par bya'o // las dang dngos grub myur du thob
NK057(shi)001:2466: par bya ba la ni bla ma dam pa rnams
NK057(shi)001:2467: kyi bka' thob pa kho na bdag po'i rkyen yin
NK057(shi)001:2468: par bya'o // te / 'di dag tsam gyis gang
NK057(shi)001:2469: zag gi bya ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro
NK057(shi)001:2470: par bya'o // te / // gzhan du rgyud kyi
NK057(shi)001:2471: gzhung la gang zag gis bslad pa la sogs par
NK057(shi)001:2472: the tshom za bas ni skyon gyi gzhi mang por
NK057(shi)001:2473: par bya'o // te / // 'gyur te / dad pa tsam gyis rab tu 'jug bya'i phyir //
NK057(shi)001:2474: rnam par dpyad pa 'di ni ming tsam ste //
NK057(shi)001:2475: gang zhig sgom pa de ni yang dag bral //
NK057(shi)001:2476: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:2477: bka'i spong len byed pa theg pa chen po'i spyi'i dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyur bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:2478: gzhan yang chos la brten nas las kyi sgrib pa gsog pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2479: gang zag la brten nas de bzhin du 'gyur pa
NK057(shi)001:2480: ni sangs rgyas la brten nas las kyi sgrib pa
NK057(shi)001:2482: de bas na rgyud kyi gzhung ldab bu la sogs par ston pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2483: gal te mkhan po rnams kyis bsdus shing sbyar ba srid na yang /
NK057(shi)001:2484: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs 'byung ba la
NK057(shi)001:2485: tshul nges pa med pa yin pas the tshom gyi
NK057(shi)001:2486: yul du bya ba ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2487: yang gal te lta ba mtho dman la rtsod pa
NK057(shi)001:2488: 'di ni sems can gyi don du 'gyur pa yin
NK057(shi)001:2489: pas rgyal bas kyang gnang ba yin la /
NK057(shi)001:2490: sngon gyi mkhan po rnams kyis kyang de ltar bshad pas /
NK057(shi)001:2491: lta ba dman la smad pa 'di la nyes skyon med do zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:2492: 'di lta bu ni gong du lung spyi'i 'grel pa bsgrub pa dang 'dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:2493: mu stegs can gyis legs par bshad pa'i gzhung yang
NK057(shi)001:2494: sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang sprul
NK057(shi)001:2496: sangs rgyas nyid kyis lung bstan pa yin na /
NK057(shi)001:2497: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du snang bas gsungs pa'i lung lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
NK057(shi)001:2498: rgyal ba rnams kyis 'gro ba'i don du gsungs pa 'dra bas /
NK057(shi)001:2499: theg pa chung ngu rnams la yang spang zhing sun dbyung bar mi bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2500: lta ba mtho dman dang thabs che chung yang yod
NK057(shi)001:2501: pa yin pas theg pa gong ma pa la yang
NK057(shi)001:2502: skur pa gdab tu ga la rung ste /
NK057(shi)001:2503: rang rang gi skal ba dang mos pa ji ltar 'tshams pa bzhin so sor spyad par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2505: sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang //
NK057(shi)001:2506: gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam //
NK057(shi)001:2507: ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyis //
NK057(shi)001:2508: don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs //
NK057(shi)001:2510: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rnams ni
NK057(shi)001:2511: 'gro ba chud mi gson pa la so so rang
NK057(shi)001:2513: lta ba mtho dman rtsod pa'i skabs su yang gcig
NK057(shi)001:2514: la gcig smad cing rtsod pa'i phyir skur pa mi
NK057(shi)001:2515: bya'i / nges pa'i don la gang nye ba'i rig pa 'gran pa tsam la nyes skyon med do //
NK057(shi)001:2516: 'di dag ni gzhung 'brel pa bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2517: ston pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa'i bka' yin pas yid ches pa yod kyang /
NK057(shi)001:2518: ston pa dang rgyud gnyis gcig gam tha dad par
NK057(shi)001:2519: the tshom za ba rnams ston pa dang rgyud kyi
NK057(shi)001:2521: gong du sngags dang phyag rgya bshad pa'i skabs su
NK057(shi)001:2522: brtag pa rnam pa drug tu bshad pa bzhin te
NK057(shi)001:2523: / rgyud nyid kyang chos kyi phyag rgya'i khongs su
NK057(shi)001:2524: 'dus pas de bzhin ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o
NK057(shi)001:2525: / // de dag ni rgyud kyi dgos 'brel bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2526: de ltar na tan+t+ra'i mtshan bshad pa la sogs pa
NK057(shi)001:2527: 'di rnams tsam gyis rgyud thams cad kyi spyi don
NK057(shi)001:2528: khong du chud par nus pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2529: da ni de ltar spyi don bsdus pa yin yang
NK057(shi)001:2530: mkhan po rnams kyi man ngag rna brgyud rnams kyi
NK057(shi)001:2531: sgo cung zad tsam grub cing shes par bya ba'i
NK057(shi)001:2532: phyir bzhed pa so so cung zad tsam brjod par
NK057(shi)001:2533: bya ste / de la sngon gyi mkhan po yongs grags pa phyogs gcig ni /
NK057(shi)001:2534: rgyud thams cad kyi don bshad lugs rnam pa gsum du gsung ste /
NK057(shi)001:2535: 'di ltar dbang po rab 'bring rnam pa gsum dang mthun par tan+t+ra'i mtshan bshad pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2536: rgyud dbu zhabs kyi dbye ba bstan pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2537: tshig 'bru re re nas rgyas par bshad pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2538: gzhan yang sgrub pa po rnams sgrub pa'i cha rkyen
NK057(shi)001:2539: dang mthun par dmigs pa'i yul dang thabs 'bras bu
NK057(shi)001:2540: dang bcas par bstan pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2541: rgyud kyi babs dang mthun par rgyud kyi 'phros gzhi
NK057(shi)001:2542: rtsa ba dang yan lag tu bcas par bshad pa
NK057(shi)001:2543: dang / tshul rnam pa gsum yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK057(shi)001:2544: de la don rnam par dbye ba bshad pa'i skabs su yang gleng gzhi dang /
NK057(shi)001:2546: yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang /
NK057(shi)001:2547: rgyud kyi dgos 'brel bstan pa rnams su 'byed do //
NK057(shi)001:2548: dngos po'i skabs su'ang dkyil 'khor dam tshig sgrub pa
NK057(shi)001:2549: dbang phrin las te gzhi rnam pa lngar phye nas
NK057(shi)001:2550: rgyud so so'i gzhung dang sbyor bar byed do //
NK057(shi)001:2551: rtsa ba'i rgyud 'di nyid kyi skabs su yang dkyil 'khor la rang bzhin dang /
NK057(shi)001:2555: gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor rnams su
NK057(shi)001:2556: phye nas rang bzhin la yang sku rnam pa lnga
NK057(shi)001:2559: de bzhin du thugs rnam pa lnga le'u gnyis pas bsdus pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2560: gsung rnam pa lnga le'u bzhi pa'i yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bsdus pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2561: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin sku'i dkyil 'khor le'u bzhi
NK057(shi)001:2562: pa dang lnga pa'i yi ge sgyu 'phrul bsgom pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2564: le'u drug pa dkyil 'khor gyis bsdus pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2565: ting nge 'dzin gsung dang thugs bdun pa dang brgyad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas bsdus par byed de /
NK057(shi)001:2566: de bzhin du dgu pa gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor /
NK057(shi)001:2567: bcu pa ni dbang bskur ba /
NK057(shi)001:2568: bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor /
NK057(shi)001:2569: bcu gsum pa ni gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor /
NK057(shi)001:2570: bcu bzhi pa ni dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2571: de bzhin du khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la yang sbyar bar bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:2572: dam tshig dang phrin las ni le'u bcu dgu pa dang nyi shu pas dngos su bstan par zad /
NK057(shi)001:2573: sgrub pa ni yi ge sgyu 'phrul gyi ting nge
NK057(shi)001:2574: 'dzin gyi sgo nas sgrub pa le'u lnga ba nas
NK057(shi)001:2575: gsungs pa dang / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa rnams su 'dus par ston no //
NK057(shi)001:2576: sngon gyi mkhan po dbus lugs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2577: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud thams cad kyang bshad thabs rnam pa lngas 'chad de /
NK057(shi)001:2578: chos thams cad 'bras bu'i chos su sangs rgyas pa'i
NK057(shi)001:2579: phyir don spyi rgya rlabs kyis bcad de 'chad pa
NK057(shi)001:2580: dang / gzhung gi 'brel pa shes par bya ba'i
NK057(shi)001:2581: phyir tshig gi sdeb sbyor legs par bshad pa dang
NK057(shi)001:2582: dang / / don sbas pa'i dgongs pa thon par
NK057(shi)001:2583: bya ba'i phyir gab pa'i sbas thabs 'byin pa la
NK057(shi)001:2585: theg pa chen po'i lta ba zab mo dang /
NK057(shi)001:2586: spyod pa rlabs po ches gdul bya rnams mi skrag
NK057(shi)001:2587: par bya ba'i phyir don mi 'tshams pa 'tshams par
NK057(shi)001:2588: bshad pa dang / gang zag rnams kyis bsgrub pa
NK057(shi)001:2589: nyams su len shes par bya ba'i phyir rgyud dkrugs
NK057(shi)001:2590: pa rnams skabs sbyar te bshad pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:2591: de rnams kyang dpe dang sbyar te tshigs su bcad pa /
NK057(shi)001:2592: khyung chen nam mkhar ldings pa spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcod //
NK057(shi)001:2593: gsal la ma 'dres don gyi che ba ston //
NK057(shi)001:2595: ngang pa'i rgyal po mi 'gyogs stabs su 'gro //
NK057(shi)001:2596: tshig gi sdeb sbyor legs pas don dam bsegs su gcod /
NK057(shi)001:2598: rus sbal gab pa lta bu'i blo shes pa //
NK057(shi)001:2599: gab pa'i sbas thabs 'byin shes slob dpon yin //
NK057(shi)001:2601: smad kyi rna bu brag la 'dzeg pa ltar //
NK057(shi)001:2602: mi 'tshams 'tshams bshad skyon med yon tan basngagasa //
NK057(shi)001:2604: ji bzhin don gyi bsnol mtshams ma shor bar //
NK057(shi)001:2605: steng 'og 'phen sdud 'tshol ba'i skabs sbyor ba //
NK057(shi)001:2606: man ngag yod pa'i slob dpon de ltar 'chad //
NK057(shi)001:2607: ces bya ba rnams kyis khog dbub par bzhed do //
NK057(shi)001:2608: de la rgyud 'di'i skabs su don spyi rgya rlabs kyis gcod pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2609: phyag rgya chen po lnga'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
NK057(shi)001:2610: rigs lnga ye shes lnga'i ngang du sangs rgyas par
NK057(shi)001:2612: de la phyag rgya chen po lnga ni /
NK057(shi)001:2613: rdo rje gsor ba lta bu nas /
NK057(shi)001:2614: ral gri bskor ba'i bar dag ste /
NK057(shi)001:2615: ji ltar phyag rgya de dag la las dang yon tan bye brag med par snang ba bzhin /
NK057(shi)001:2616: rgyud 'di'i dbu zhabs nas kyang chos thams cad 'bras
NK057(shi)001:2617: bu'i chos su sangs rgyas par ston par bye brag
NK057(shi)001:2619: de las kyang khyad par du dbus lugs bka' phyogs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:2620: phyag rgya so so dang rigs dang ye shes so sor sbyar te bstan no //
NK057(shi)001:2621: tshig gi sdeb sbyor legs par bshad pa'i skabs su yang /
NK057(shi)001:2622: dbang po rab kyi don du tan+t+ra'i mtshan bshad pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:2623: dbang po 'bring gi don du rgyud dbu zhabs kyi don /
NK057(shi)001:2626: yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang /
NK057(shi)001:2627: de ji ltar yongs su shes par bya ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2628: rgyud yongs su gzung ba rnams su phye ste ston no //
NK057(shi)001:2629: yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po la yang le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis la re re la'ang /
NK057(shi)001:2630: rgyud kyi che ba dang le'u rang gi mtshams sbyor dang /
NK057(shi)001:2631: le'u so so'i sgo brtsegs kyi don rnams su phye ste ston no //
NK057(shi)001:2632: de ji ltar yongs su shes par bya ba ni gsang sngags spyir btang ba'i man ngag ste /
NK057(shi)001:2633: thams cad kun tu bzang po dang bzang mo dbyer med par shes par bya bar ston no //
NK057(shi)001:2634: gab pa'i sbas pa 'byin pa'i skabs su yang tshig
NK057(shi)001:2635: byings che ba rnams la phyi nang gsang ba gsum
NK057(shi)001:2636: gyis rgyud kyi dgongs pa dbyung bar ston no //
NK057(shi)001:2637: don mi 'tshams pa 'tshams par bshad pa'i skabs su yang rang bzhin dang /
NK057(shi)001:2639: don rtags kyi sgo nas don mi 'gal zhing 'tshams par ston no //
NK057(shi)001:2640: 'phen sdud skabs sbyar te bshad pa'i skabs su yang
NK057(shi)001:2641: sgrub pa po rnams kyis nyams su blang ba'i las
NK057(shi)001:2642: kyi go rim 'brel bar bzhed do //
NK057(shi)001:2643: spyir sngon gyi mkhan po rnams kyis bshad pa'i gzhung
NK057(shi)001:2644: 'di dag kyang don ga cig gi nang du gcig
NK057(shi)001:2646: 'on kyang gzhung so sor ji skad gsungs pa bzhin
NK057(shi)001:2647: bris pa ni man ngag srol mi nub par bya
NK057(shi)001:2648: ba'i phyir smos pa tsam yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2649: de yan chad ni rgyud spyi dang gzhung 'di nyid
NK057(shi)001:2650: kyi spyi'i don yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir
NK057(shi)001:2652: da ni gzhung 'di nyid kyi yan lag gi don
NK057(shi)001:2653: khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir gzhung gi tshogs
NK057(shi)001:2655: de yang dang po nyid du gzhung 'di nyid kyi
NK057(shi)001:2656: le'u dang 'brel pa khong du chud par bya ba'i
NK057(shi)001:2657: phyir gzhung gi babs khong du chud par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:2658: de la ston pa dpal kun tu bzang po sangs
NK057(shi)001:2659: rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid chos thams cad kyi
NK057(shi)001:2660: rang bzhin te / gnas 'og min chos dbyings kyi
NK057(shi)001:2661: pho brang na nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor gyi
NK057(shi)001:2662: dkyil 'khor dang dbyer med par dus bzhi mnyam pa
NK057(shi)001:2663: nyid dbyings na sku gsung thugs lhun stug po bkod
NK057(shi)001:2664: pa'i rgyan nyid du zhugs pa'i dgongs pa la /
NK057(shi)001:2665: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ji ltar thugs su chud pa'i don gsal ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:2666: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang /
NK057(shi)001:2667: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang tshig rnams yin no //
NK057(shi)001:2668: de ltar nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dgongs
NK057(shi)001:2669: pa la thams cad che ba'i dkyil 'khor yon tan
NK057(shi)001:2670: gyi tshogs 'bras bu'i chos su sangs rgyas pa'i /
NK057(shi)001:2671: chos bshad par bya ba'i gnas gdul bya gud du mi dmigs kyang /
NK057(shi)001:2672: nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor ngam pa'i tshul gyis gleng bslang ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:2673: kun tu bzang pos gleng bslang ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:2674: kun tu bzang mos gleng bslang ba'o //
