NK057(shi)001:5215: chos kun rjes su 'jug pa ste //
NK057(shi)001:5217: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
NK057(shi)001:5218: ji ltar tha dad du bzhag pa'i chos snams kyang phan tshun rjes su mi 'gro ba med de /
NK057(shi)001:5219: gang gi phyir rang bzhin gcig tu ma nges pa
NK057(shi)001:5220: de'i phyir mtshan nyid thams cad kyang spros pa dang
NK057(shi)001:5221: bral ba'i rjes su 'gro ba kho na'o //
NK057(shi)001:5222: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yi ge
NK057(shi)001:5223: 'khor lor gyur pa las gnas bsgyur cing sprul mi
NK057(shi)001:5224: dgos so // de bzhin du dkyil 'khor du gsal
NK057(shi)001:5225: bar gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan
NK057(shi)001:5229: // da ni yi ge sgyur 'phrul gyi sgo nas thun
NK057(shi)001:5230: mong dang mchog gi dngos grub dang las phra mo
NK057(shi)001:5231: rnams bsgrub par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5232: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:5233: de la dang por yi ge sgyu 'phrul dngos grub sna tshogs kyi gzhir bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5234: rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK057(shi)001:5235: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
NK057(shi)001:5236: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK057(shi)001:5237: yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin //
NK057(shi)001:5239: de la chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni sems yin pas yi ge'ang sems nyid du snang ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:5240: sems la'ang ngo bo nyid med de /
NK057(shi)001:5241: de'i phyir sems la snang ba thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid med pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5242: mtshan nyid de lta bu'i yi ge de ni rin po che'i sprin dang 'dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:5243: dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas la sogs
NK057(shi)001:5244: pa mtho ris kyi gnas rnams su rin po che'i
NK057(shi)001:5245: rang bzhin gyi sprin las rin po che sna tshogs
NK057(shi)001:5247: de bzhin du yi ge sgyu 'phrul gyi ting nge
NK057(shi)001:5248: 'dzin las kyang dngos grub sna tshogs su 'gyur ro
NK057(shi)001:5249: // de yang dang po yi ge ji lta ba bzhin brtan par gyur nas /
NK057(shi)001:5250: de nas 'dod pa'i don sna tshogs su bsgyur bas de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:5251: de la dang por mchog gi dngos grub rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du grub par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5253: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5254: de nyid kyis thun mong gi dngos grub chen po 'grub par bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:5256: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5258: dgug dang gtang dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni las phran tshegs so //
NK057(shi)001:5259: de nyid ye shes rang snang ba //
NK057(shi)001:5260: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos grub ji ltar 'grub pa'i tshul ston pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5261: dper na snang ba dang gser 'gyur gyi rtsi dang sman gyi bcud len rnams kyis mun pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5262: lcags kyi rigs sna tshogs dang dug rnams bsal nas /
NK057(shi)001:5263: dngos po dam pa rnams su 'gyur bar byed pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:5264: dngos po ngan pa rnams dor ba med pa bzhin du /
NK057(shi)001:5265: sdug bsngal gyi gnas su gyur pa'i chos rnams ma
NK057(shi)001:5266: bsal bar dngos grub sna tshogs su 'gyur bar bstan
NK057(shi)001:5267: no // yongs ni dngos po sna tshogs su snang
NK057(shi)001:5268: ba rnams kyang sems kyi rnam pa tsam yin pas
NK057(shi)001:5269: ngo bo nyid bsgyur zhing byin gyis brlab mi dgos
NK057(shi)001:5271: ston pa mchod brtson zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni grub pa'i tshad bstan pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5272: dus gsum rgyal bas zhes bya ba la sogs pas
NK057(shi)001:5273: ni dngos grub kyi mchog byang chub kyi sems rtogs
NK057(shi)001:5275: dngos po med las zhes bya ba la sogs pas
NK057(shi)001:5276: ni dngos grub kyi rgyu'i gtso bo ting nge 'dzin
NK057(shi)001:5278: gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa //
NK057(shi)001:5279: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dngos grub kyi
NK057(shi)001:5280: gtso bo byang chub kyi sems de nyid legs par
NK057(shi)001:5281: bstan pa'i phyir / byang chub kyi sems rnam pa bzhi'i tshul bstan no //
NK057(shi)001:5282: de yang dang po sems can gyi don du byang
NK057(shi)001:5283: chub 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid smon pa byang chub kyi
NK057(shi)001:5284: sems dang / sgo gsum nas pha rol tu phyin
NK057(shi)001:5285: pa rnams yongs su spyod pa'i mtshan nyid 'jug pa
NK057(shi)001:5287: mos pa brtan pas gnas pa dang de kho na
NK057(shi)001:5288: nyid kyi don mngon du byed pas gnas pa'i mtshan
NK057(shi)001:5289: nyid gnas pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK057(shi)001:5290: snying rje chen chen po 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems zhes grags so //
NK057(shi)001:5291: 'dir ni dang po byang chub kyi sems rtogs par
NK057(shi)001:5292: byed pa'i mtshan nyid 'jug par byang chub kyi sems
NK057(shi)001:5293: dang / byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ji ltar
NK057(shi)001:5294: yin pa bstan pa'i mtshan nyid gnas pa byang chub
NK057(shi)001:5295: dang / kyi sems dang / byang chub sems kyi
NK057(shi)001:5296: yon tan bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa byang
NK057(shi)001:5298: byang chub kyi sems de nyid ji ltar mngon du
NK057(shi)001:5299: gyur bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid smon pa byang chub
NK057(shi)001:5301: de la dang po rtogs pa'i thabs bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:5302: gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa //
NK057(shi)001:5303: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5304: 'di ltar gang zag gang gis chos rnams la dmigs
NK057(shi)001:5305: pa dang bral ba'i blo 'jug pa mi shes pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5306: gang zag de yis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
NK057(shi)001:5308: des na blo gang gis dngos por blta ba dang dngos po med par blta ba rnams /
NK057(shi)001:5309: de ltar ma grub cing 'jig pa'i blo de yis
NK057(shi)001:5310: dmigs pa med pa'i don shes par gyis shig pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5311: don no // gnyis pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin ji ltar yin pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:5312: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK057(shi)001:5313: pho mo ma yin ma ning min //
NK057(shi)001:5314: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5315: sems kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su ma grub pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5316: phyir mtshan nyid gang yang yin par mi 'gyur te
NK057(shi)001:5317: / ci yang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:5318: gsum pa yon tan bstan pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:5319: de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te //
NK057(shi)001:5320: thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu //
NK057(shi)001:5321: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5322: chos rnam par dag pa las ma g.yos bzhin khams
NK057(shi)001:5323: dang skye mched sna tshogs su bstan pa thams cad
NK057(shi)001:5324: ye shes rol pa'i dkyil 'khor du rang shar te
NK057(shi)001:5325: / kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgyas ma btab pa 'ga' yang med pas /
NK057(shi)001:5326: spang bar bya ba'i chos gang yang med do zhes bya ba'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:5327: de ltar na dngos por lta ba'i mtha' dang chad par lta ba'i mtha' yang bsal ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:5328: bzhi pa ji ltar mngon du gyur par bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:5329: gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems //
NK057(shi)001:5330: mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su //
NK057(shi)001:5331: sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na //
NK057(shi)001:5332: dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur //
NK057(shi)001:5334: dper na glang po che ma thul ba myos pa
NK057(shi)001:5335: rnams ni mi 'dod pa'i gnas su tshang 'cha' zhing
NK057(shi)001:5336: / mi 'dod pa'i yul du rgyu ste /
NK057(shi)001:5337: mi 'dod pa'i las su gyur pa rang gi phyogs
NK057(shi)001:5338: kyi rtsig khyim gzhon pa dang sems can gsod pa
NK057(shi)001:5339: la sogs pa'i las byed de /
NK057(shi)001:5340: sems can rnams kyi sems kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:5341: mi 'dod pa'i gnas bdag tu lta ba'i gnas la rten 'cha' zhing /
NK057(shi)001:5342: mi 'dod pa'i yul mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i spyod yul du rgyu ste //
NK057(shi)001:5343: mi 'dod pa'i las 'khor ba dang ngan song gi
NK057(shi)001:5344: sdug bsngal gyi las mngon par 'grub par byed do
NK057(shi)001:5345: // glang po che de yang thabs la mkhas pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5346: glang rdzi na tshod mthun pas legs par btul nas
NK057(shi)001:5347: // / thob dang lcags kyus grogs byas na glang po che 'dul bar 'gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:5348: rang gi g.yul brtan par bya ba dang pha rol
NK057(shi)001:5349: gyi dgra sde 'joms par byed pa'i yon tan chen
NK057(shi)001:5351: de bzhin du sems de yang gzhi gnas dang lhag
NK057(shi)001:5352: mthong zung du 'brel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btul
NK057(shi)001:5353: te / sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa bzlas
NK057(shi)001:5354: brjod yan lag lnga dang ldan pas brtan pa'i grogs
NK057(shi)001:5355: te / byas na / sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:5356: de la bzlas brjod kyi yan lag lnga ni /
NK057(shi)001:5357: bdag gi de kho na nyid dang /
NK057(shi)001:5359: gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK057(shi)001:5360: bzlas brjod kyi de kho na nyid dang /
NK057(shi)001:5362: de yang bya ba dang rnal 'byor phyi pa ltar na ni /
NK057(shi)001:5363: bdag dang lha yang gnyis su 'dod la /
NK057(shi)001:5364: byang chub kyi sems de nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5365: dmigs pa dang yan lag tu bcas pa'i bzlas brjod
NK057(shi)001:5366: do // 'dir ni teng nge 'dzin gyis 'phrul ba tsam ste /
NK057(shi)001:5367: rang bzhin tha dad du mi 'dzin no //
NK057(shi)001:5368: de rnams kyang mchog gi dngos grub kyi skabs su bstan no //
NK057(shi)001:5371: // da ni dngos grub kyi rten dang thabs su gyur pa dkyil 'khor yin pas de bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5372: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK057(shi)001:5373: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la /
NK057(shi)001:5374: nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyung bar bzhed nas zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:5375: dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa zhig byin gyis brlabs te /
NK057(shi)001:5376: rang bzhin gzhan du gyur par byas pa zhig gam /
NK057(shi)001:5377: rang bzhin de dag yongs su gsal te de'i yul du 'ongs pa zhig gam /
NK057(shi)001:5378: de'i rgyu las skyes pa ni ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:5379: ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du sangs rgyas par bstan pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5381: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //
NK057(shi)001:5382: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK057(shi)001:5383: rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK057(shi)001:5386: 'di ltar rdzogs pa chen po'i don rtogs pa'i rnal
NK057(shi)001:5387: 'byor pas kun 'byung gi chos su grags pa thams
NK057(shi)001:5388: cad lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por spyod
NK057(shi)001:5389: cig pa'o // de la kun 'byung gi chos ni
NK057(shi)001:5390: nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas bsdus pa zag
NK057(shi)001:5391: pa dang bcas pa'i chos su grags pa rnams so
NK057(shi)001:5392: cig pa'o // // de nyid dkyil 'khor chen po
NK057(shi)001:5393: ji ltar yin pa bstan pa ni gong du bstan
NK057(shi)001:5394: cig pa'o // // pa bzhin no // de la
NK057(shi)001:5395: dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5396: cig pa'o // // pa bzhin no // tshul ni / 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
NK057(shi)001:5398: lha rnams kyi bzhugs tshul ni /
NK057(shi)001:5399: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK057(shi)001:5401: de la gtso bo dang gtso mo ni rdzogs pa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs te /
NK057(shi)001:5402: rgyal po chen po'i tshul du ci yang mi mdzad do //
NK057(shi)001:5403: sems dpa' dang sems ma ni sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs te /
NK057(shi)001:5404: blon po chen po'i tshul du kun la bu gcig pa bzhin du byams so //
NK057(shi)001:5405: khro bo dang khro mo ni gyad kyi dor thabs su bzhugs te /
NK057(shi)001:5406: dmag dpon dang 'dra bar phyi nang gi dngos po
NK057(shi)001:5407: la rngon pas ri dwags mthong ba zhin du 'dul
NK057(shi)001:5408: bar mdzad do // thub pa chen po rnams 'greng bur bzhugs te /
NK057(shi)001:5409: skad cig kyang mi gnas par 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan mar 'gyur ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:5410: de dag kyang gnas gang na bzhugs bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5411: 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
NK057(shi)001:5412: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
NK057(shi)001:5413: mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang //
NK057(shi)001:5414: zhes bya bas ni kun tu bzang po dang bzang
NK057(shi)001:5415: mo dkyil 'khor gyi byed pa po yin yang phya
NK057(shi)001:5416: mkhan gyi tshul du bar khyams la bzhugs so zhes
NK057(shi)001:5417: yongs grags dbus lugs pa gsung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5418: pho brang gi dbus nyid na bzhugs so zhes yongs
NK057(shi)001:5419: grags khams lugs pa dang bdag cag gi bla ma
NK057(shi)001:5420: gsung ngo // rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //
NK057(shi)001:5421: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phyag mtshan rnams ni g.yas dang po na rang rang gi mtshan ma /
NK057(shi)001:5422: g.yon dang po na dril bu ste gzhan rim bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5423: yum rnams ni dril bu kho na'o //
NK057(shi)001:5424: mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can //
NK057(shi)001:5425: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lha rnams kyi tshul bstan pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5426: de yang mnyen pa la sogs pa'i tshul lnga po 'di dag ni lha mo rnams kyi tshul te /
NK057(shi)001:5427: de yang phyi rol gyi rdzas kyi dngos po la mnyen pa yin la /
NK057(shi)001:5428: lcug pa ma yin pa la sogs pa yang yod pa de dag las khyad par du byas pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5429: gsal 'tsher lhun stu ga gzi byin ldan pa ni yab rnams kyi tshul lo //
NK057(shi)001:5430: 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa ni khro bo dang khro mo'o //
NK057(shi)001:5431: de lta bu'i rang bzhin du /
NK057(shi)001:5432: mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi //
NK057(shi)001:5433: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK057(shi)001:5435: sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni //
NK057(shi)001:5436: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'phyong du grags pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5437: slob dpon rin cen mchog gis sgyur 'phrul gzhan nas phyung ste /
NK057(shi)001:5438: skabs skabs su bcug pa las gtsug ru rin cen
NK057(shi)001:5439: gzhon nus 'phyong yon pa dang med pa'i dpe ris
NK057(shi)001:5440: gnyis su phye ste de bzhin du grags so zhes
NK057(shi)001:5441: zer ro // de la gdul bya rnams la sangs rgyas kyi sku ji ltar snang ba'i tshul ni /
NK057(shi)001:5442: de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la //
NK057(shi)001:5443: sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan //
NK057(shi)001:5444: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5445: de la 'gro ba phal pa rnams kyis ni dge
NK057(shi)001:5446: sbyong dang bram ze la sogs pa sdig pa spong
NK057(shi)001:5448: nyan thos rnams kyis ni dgra bcom pa dang spangs pa mtshungs par mthong ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5449: rang rgyal rnams kyis ni bse ru lta bu'i tshul du mthong ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5450: 'o na dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten par ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:5451: grogs po tsam du mthong ba'i phyir rang rang gtso bo yin no //
NK057(shi)001:5452: theg pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
NK057(shi)001:5453: ni 'og min gyi gnas na dpal rnam par snang
NK057(shi)001:5455: sku'i sgo nas chos ston par snang ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5456: skus chos ston pa'i tshul yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te /
NK057(shi)001:5457: dper na spos brtsegs pa'i zhing khams na byang chub
NK057(shi)001:5458: sems dpa' rnams spos kyi shing chen po'i drung na
NK057(shi)001:5459: gnas pa na / shing de'i dri tshor ba tsam
NK057(shi)001:5460: gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud la rnam par thar
NK057(shi)001:5461: pa'i sgo ting nge 'dzin skye bar 'gyur ba dang
NK057(shi)001:5462: gnas pa na / / de bzhin du yul la la na kha zas zos pas /
NK057(shi)001:5463: la la na chos gos gyon pas /
NK057(shi)001:5464: la la na sku la bltas pas /
NK057(shi)001:5465: la la na rmi lam rmis pa la sogs pas
NK057(shi)001:5466: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa nye bar sgrub pa yod
NK057(shi)001:5467: de / de bas na tshul gcig bsam du mi rung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5468: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku snang ba de'ang sa dang po nas bcu pa'i bar dag tu grags so //
NK057(shi)001:5469: sprul pa'i sku snang bar gyur pa'ang nyan thos dang
NK057(shi)001:5470: mos pa spyod pa nas sa bdun pa man chad
NK057(shi)001:5472: las dag pa'i sems can phal pa la ni tha mal pa'i gzugs su snang bar grags so //
NK057(shi)001:5473: da ni bsdus pa'i don bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5474: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
NK057(shi)001:5475: de la dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med
NK057(shi)001:5476: bsam mi khyab ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings
NK057(shi)001:5478: ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang //
NK057(shi)001:5479: zhes bya ba ni ye shes las sprul pa' dkyil 'khor yang grangs med pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5480: de ltar dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5481: dkyil 'khor gyis chos thams cad la khyab par bstan
NK057(shi)001:5482: pa ni / mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings //
NK057(shi)001:5483: ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam spros spros pa med //
NK057(shi)001:5485: ji ltar khyab pa'i tshul ni /
NK057(shi)001:5487: chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
NK057(shi)001:5488: nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i //
NK057(shi)001:5489: nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal //
NK057(shi)001:5490: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas //
NK057(shi)001:5491: zhes gsungs pa ltar chos thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin gyis khyab cing /
NK057(shi)001:5492: rdzas kyi dngos pos kyang khyab pa med de zhes bya pa'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:5495: // da ni gsang sngags rnams ston te /
NK057(shi)001:5496: de yang gsang sngags kyi dngos po dang bya ba rnams ni gong du bstan zin to //
NK057(shi)001:5497: khyad par gyi bya ba cung zad brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5498: ji srid du ting nge 'dzin ji lta ji snyed
NK057(shi)001:5499: gnas pa de dag sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis
NK057(shi)001:5501: de yang phal cher phyag rgya ni sngags dang ldan pas byin gyis rlob par byed la /
NK057(shi)001:5502: sngags ni phyag rgya med par yang byin gyis rlab bo zhes grags so //
NK057(shi)001:5503: 'di yang lha rnams bskyed pa dang mnyes par byed
NK057(shi)001:5504: pa'i mtshan nyid bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i bzlas brjod
NK057(shi)001:5506: las rgya mtsho sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid rnams la sbyar du rung bar shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5507: da ni ba sgoms pa'i rim pa brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5508: de yang rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyis bsdus pa na /
NK057(shi)001:5509: dang po 'jug pa'i spyod pa'i dbang du ni rdo
NK057(shi)001:5510: rje slob dpon gyi las su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:5511: bri zhing byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5512: mchod cing dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5513: slob ma la dbang dang dam tshig dang man ngag
NK057(shi)001:5514: dpog pa'i cho ga rnams kyi bya ba bstan pa
NK057(shi)001:5515: ste / le'u dgu pa dang bcu gcig pa'i skabs su rigs par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5516: mtha' ma grub pa'i spyod pa las sna tshogs ni phal cher gzhan gyi don du gtogs pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5517: le'u nyi shu par bstan no //
NK057(shi)001:5518: bar du dngos grub sgrub pa'i spyod pa ni yi ge sgyu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK057(shi)001:5519: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams yin te /
NK057(shi)001:5520: de yang gsang sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sgrub par byed pas /
NK057(shi)001:5521: de bas na gsang sngags kyi skabs su bsgom pa
NK057(shi)001:5522: la sogs pa las kyi rim pa bstan pa'i gnas
NK057(shi)001:5523: yin no // de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
NK057(shi)001:5524: dang por 'jug pa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5525: sngags pas tshogs gsog pa'i phyir rtag tu rang gi
NK057(shi)001:5526: lha mnyes par byed par 'dod par dang /
NK057(shi)001:5527: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub sgrub par bya
NK057(shi)001:5528: ba'i phyir dam bcas pa'i bsnyen sgrub la sbyor bar
NK057(shi)001:5529: 'dod pa dang las phra mo la sbyor bar 'dod
NK057(shi)001:5530: kyang rung ste / gnas la sogs pa'i yo byad tshogs par byas nas /
NK057(shi)001:5531: mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa'i yan lag sngon du 'gro bas dang por sems bskyed par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5532: e ma hohngo mtshar rmad kyi chos //
NK057(shi)001:5533: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang //
NK057(shi)001:5534: skye ba med las thams cad skyes //
NK057(shi)001:5535: skyes tsam nyid na skye ba med //
NK057(shi)001:5536: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga brjod pas /
NK057(shi)001:5537: chos thams spros pa dang bral bar rtogs pa rang gi rgyud la bskyed par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5538: de ltar sems bskyed nas ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum rim par bsgom par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5540: lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad //
NK057(shi)001:5541: gang na'ang mi gnas dmigs pa //
NK057(shi)001:5542: mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis //
NK057(shi)001:5543: nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom //
NK057(shi)001:5545: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mi dmigs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5546: ngang las kun snang gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma
NK057(shi)001:5547: dang mig yor tsam la dmigs pa'i khyab pa'i snying
NK057(shi)001:5548: rje chen po bskyed par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5549: de nas snying rje chen po'i byin rlabs rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5550: rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni //
NK057(shi)001:5551: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
NK057(shi)001:5552: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
NK057(shi)001:5553: yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin //
NK057(shi)001:5554: a zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin a dkar por gsal bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5555: de cung zad brtan par gyur nas //
NK057(shi)001:5557: rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las //
NK057(shi)001:5558: shin tu phra ma'i a rnams spros //
NK057(shi)001:5559: phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas //
NK057(shi)001:5561: zhes brjod pas byang chub kyi sems a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
NK057(shi)001:5562: mtshan bzang po'i sa bon sgra yig bcu drug gi
NK057(shi)001:5563: phreng ba rim pa gnyis su bskor ba a'i snying
NK057(shi)001:5565: de la sgra'i yi ge ni 'di rnams yin no //
NK057(shi)001:5573: am ah de nas a de las ming gi yi
NK057(shi)001:5574: ge rnams 'phros shing 'dus pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:5576: dper byed bzang po'i sa bon du gyur pa ming
NK057(shi)001:5577: gi yi ge sum cu rtsa bzhi phreng ba'i rim
NK057(shi)001:5579: nang rim a bcu gnyis kyi phreng ba can snying po yi ge k+sha'o //
NK057(shi)001:5580: de ltar cung zad gsal bar byas te /
NK057(shi)001:5581: thams cad kyang 'od kyi gong bu gcig tu 'dril
NK057(shi)001:5582: ba las h+au dang ldan pa'i rdo rjer gyur par
NK057(shi)001:5583: bya'o // de yongs su gyur pa las kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:5584: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par byang chub
NK057(shi)001:5585: pa thugs su chud pa'i mtshan nyid sku lnga ye
NK057(shi)001:5586: shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'bras bu'i ngo bor sangs rgyas
NK057(shi)001:5587: pa'i tshul bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su grub
NK057(shi)001:5589: de la de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang ba
NK057(shi)001:5590: ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid
NK057(shi)001:5591: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:5592: nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang rdo rje'i rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:5593: de bzhin du 'od kyi gong bu ni mnyam pa nyid dang rin po che'i rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:5594: rdo rje h+aum gis mtshan pa ni so sor rtogs pa dang pad+ma'i rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:5595: sku ni bya ba grub pa dang las kyi rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:5596: de dag tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:5597: 'di ltar rdo rje snying po rgyan gyis rgyud las /
NK057(shi)001:5598: sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis gsungs pa yang rigs lnga dang ye shes lnga dang /
NK057(shi)001:5599: thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid du gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK057(shi)001:5600: de la dbyangs dang ming gi yi ge mtshan dang
NK057(shi)001:5601: dpe byad kyi sa bon du ji ltar rung ba'i
NK057(shi)001:5602: tshul ni spyir yi ge ni ye shes kyi phyag
NK057(shi)001:5603: rgya yin la / mtshan dang dpe byad kyang ye shes kyi yon tan yin te /
NK057(shi)001:5604: de'i phyir de'i rigs dang sa bon du rung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5605: de la dbyangs yig mtshan du 'gyur ba dang ming
NK057(shi)001:5606: yig dpe byad du 'gyur ba ni rigs mthun pa
NK057(shi)001:5607: yin te / yi ge yang dbyangs kyi gzhi ma
NK057(shi)001:5608: la ming gi 'bras bu gsal bar 'byed pa yin
NK057(shi)001:5609: yin te / no // de bzhin du mtshan gyi
NK057(shi)001:5610: me tog la dpe byad kyi 'bras bu gsal bar
NK057(shi)001:5612: b+h+ya dza na zhes bya ba'i ming yang gsal byed
NK057(shi)001:5613: kyi yi ge dang mtshan gyi ming thun mong ba
NK057(shi)001:5614: yin no // de dag ni shes par bya ba'i
NK057(shi)001:5615: don cung zad rnams par spros pa ste chog go
NK057(shi)001:5616: yin no // // gzhung la 'jug par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5617: de ltar gtso bo bskyed nas dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5618: de yang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin bskyed kyang rung ma bskyed kyang rung ste /
NK057(shi)001:5621: ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang gleng gzhi'i le'u nas gsungs pa lta bur bskyed par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5622: de yang shin tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5623: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //
NK057(shi)001:5625: nyi zla pad+ma rin po che //
NK057(shi)001:5626: zhes bya ba'i bar dag brjod pas shin tu gsal bar gyur par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5627: da ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5628: de yang bdag sngon gyi sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir
NK057(shi)001:5629: bdag gi sras su de bzhin gshegs par bya ba
NK057(shi)001:5630: dang / rigs mi nub cing lhun gyis grub par
NK057(shi)001:5631: bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag
NK057(shi)001:5632: dang / bya ba'o // de la bdag ces bya
NK057(shi)001:5633: ba yang byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin te
NK057(shi)001:5634: dang / bya ba'o // / de ni thog ma
NK057(shi)001:5635: dang mtha' ma med pa'i sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir
NK057(shi)001:5636: sangs rgyas thams cad de las sprul par byad ste
NK057(shi)001:5637: dang / bya ba'o // / / de'i phyir g.yon
NK057(shi)001:5638: phyogs su yum kun tu bzang mo skad cig ma'i
NK057(shi)001:5639: ting nge 'dzin gyis yi ge a las bskyed de
NK057(shi)001:5640: dang / bya ba'o // / / / a ni skye med de bzhin nyid //
NK057(shi)001:5641: k+sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs //
NK057(shi)001:5642: zhes brjod pas yab yum shin tu gsal bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5643: de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par
NK057(shi)001:5644: rol pa las byang chub kyi sems yi ge'i tshogs
NK057(shi)001:5645: su gyur te / tshig 'dis kyang rjes su bskul bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5646: thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo //
NK057(shi)001:5647: 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis //
NK057(shi)001:5648: 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam //
NK057(shi)001:5649: 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen 'tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin //
NK057(shi)001:5650: a hoh zhes brjod pas yi ge'i tshogs de dag 'phros te /
NK057(shi)001:5651: lha'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bsgrubs te /
NK057(shi)001:5652: slar 'dus nas dkyil 'khor chen por bzhugs par bsam zhing /
NK057(shi)001:5653: de dag shin tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5654: tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid //
NK057(shi)001:5655: ta ni snang ba'i sgyur 'phrul nyid //
NK057(shi)001:5657: o ni thams cad 'jigs par byed //
NK057(shi)001:5658: +amo ni thams cad zhig pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:5659: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod pas shin tu gsal bar gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:5660: mi bskyod pa yab yum ni kun tu bzang po yab yum la thim par gyur /
NK057(shi)001:5661: gzhan ni rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5662: da ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su bdag bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5663: de yang byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas
NK057(shi)001:5664: sangs rgyas pa yin kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
NK057(shi)001:5666: rang rig pa'i ye shes can du ma gyur na
NK057(shi)001:5667: sangs rgyas nyid du snang bar grub par mi 'gyur
NK057(shi)001:5668: bas / de'i phyir gtso bo'i thugs ka nas kun
NK057(shi)001:5669: tu bzang po byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid 'khor
NK057(shi)001:5670: gyi lus 'dzin pa zhig tu 'phrul nas byung ste
NK057(shi)001:5671: bas / / dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la bskor
NK057(shi)001:5672: ba byas te nub sgo nas rig pa'i me tog
NK057(shi)001:5673: dor te gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5675: sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni //
NK057(shi)001:5676: 'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun //
NK057(shi)001:5677: rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na //
NK057(shi)001:5678: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /
NK057(shi)001:5681: thabs dang shes rab kyi 'od zer bdag la 'phros
NK057(shi)001:5682: pas sems kyi rtog pa dang de las gyur pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5684: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes gzung 'dzin dang bral
NK057(shi)001:5685: ba'i rang bzhin 'od kyi gong bu gcig tu gyur
NK057(shi)001:5686: par bya'o // de ltar dri ma'i phyogs dag par
NK057(shi)001:5687: byas nas yon tan gyi tshogs bsgrub cing byin gyis
NK057(shi)001:5689: yang lha rnams kyi 'od zer yi ge 'bru gsum gyi rnam par 'phros te thim pas /
NK057(shi)001:5690: sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i yi
NK057(shi)001:5691: ge h+aum du gyur nas gtso bo'i thugs kar thim
NK057(shi)001:5692: par gyur te sku'i dbyig dang bcud du gyur par
NK057(shi)001:5693: bya'o // de nas gtso gzungs gnyis su med pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5694: byang chub kyi sems su gyur te yum gyi mkha'
NK057(shi)001:5696: lha rnams thams cad rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi
NK057(shi)001:5697: sgra dang bcas nas byang chub kyi sems la thim
NK057(shi)001:5698: par gyur te / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gdan
NK057(shi)001:5699: steng na byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin 'od kyi
NK057(shi)001:5700: gong bu tsam zhig dmigs pa las /
NK057(shi)001:5701: thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis bskyod nas yi ge h+aum dang m+aum du gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:5702: de'i 'phro 'du las thugs kyi mtshan ma rdo rje
NK057(shi)001:5703: dang dril bur gyur pa dang mi bskyod pa yab
NK057(shi)001:5704: yum gyi skur gyur par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5705: de la +amo ma h+aa shu nya t+aa dz+h+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa +aat+ma ko&a ham /
NK057(shi)001:5706: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ye shes lnga yis dbang bskur ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:5707: sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rnam pa lnga yis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5708: de nas gtso gzungs kyi mkha' rnam gnyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5709: gnyis su med par brdas bskul ba dag byas te /
NK057(shi)001:5710: byung chub kyi sems yum gyi mkha' la 'phros pas gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5711: lha rnams kyi snying po h+aum dang +amo la sogs
NK057(shi)001:5712: pa so so'i sa bon gyi yig 'bru rnams su
NK057(shi)001:5713: gsal ba las / lha so so'i gsang sngags brjod pa tsam gyi so so'i skur gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:5714: dzahs mdun gyi nam mkha' la bton /
NK057(shi)001:5715: 'bru gsum gyis sku brtas par byas nas /
NK057(shi)001:5716: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi
NK057(shi)001:5717: mdzad pa bsgrubs te rang rang gi gnas su bzhugs
NK057(shi)001:5718: par bya'o // mi bskyod pa yab yum gyi snying
NK057(shi)001:5719: po ni sku bskyed pa'i skabs su brjod pa bya'o
NK057(shi)001:5720: par bya'o // // kun tu bzang po yab yum ni mdun rgyab tu bzhugs par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5721: thub pa drug ni slob dpon kha cig na re /
NK057(shi)001:5722: 'dod yon spangs pa'i tshul yin pas yum gyi mkha' las mi bskyed de /
NK057(shi)001:5723: rigs lnga bskyed pa'i dus su longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5724: sku'i tshul gyis mi 'dul ba rnams la thub pa
NK057(shi)001:5725: drug gi sprul par gyur te /
NK057(shi)001:5726: mdzad pa bsgrubs nas slar 'dus pa las rang rang
NK057(shi)001:5727: gi gsang sngags brjod pa tsam gyis sku re rer
NK057(shi)001:5728: gyur te / dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bya'o zhes zer ro //
NK057(shi)001:5729: la la ni btsun mo dang ldan par byas pa
NK057(shi)001:5730: ma yin bskyed pa'i yum tsam la 'gal ba med
NK057(shi)001:5732: de yan chad ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i tshul bstan pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5733: da ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing mchod pa'i cho ga la 'jug par byed ste /
NK057(shi)001:5734: de yang tshigs su bcad pa dang gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyan drang ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:5735: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK057(shi)001:5736: mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
NK057(shi)001:5737: dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5738: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
NK057(shi)001:5739: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
NK057(shi)001:5740: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi //
NK057(shi)001:5741: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs //
NK057(shi)001:5742: nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /
NK057(shi)001:5743: +amo e h+ye hi b+ha ga w+aan ma h+aa ka
NK057(shi)001:5744: ru ni ka dri sh+ya hoh sa ma ya s+t+wam
NK057(shi)001:5745: / dzahh+aum bam hoh zhes brjod pas spyan drang bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5746: de nas gnyis su med par bstim zhing dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:5747: du 'jug pa'i phyir rig pa'i me tog dor bar
NK057(shi)001:5748: bya ste / +amo badz+ra sa ma ya +amo /
NK057(shi)001:5749: am badz+ra sa ma ya am /
NK057(shi)001:5750: h+aum badz+ra sa ma ya h+aum /
NK057(shi)001:5751: s+w+aa badz+ra sa ma ya s+w+aa /
NK057(shi)001:5752: h+aa badz+ra sa ma ya h+aa /
NK057(shi)001:5754: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las dang /
NK057(shi)001:5755: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sku gsung thugs
NK057(shi)001:5756: yon tan phrin las rnams rang bzhin dbyer med par
NK057(shi)001:5758: 'di ni rig pa'i me tog dor ba zhes kyang bya /
NK057(shi)001:5759: so so ma yin pa rig par 'dun pa'i phyag ces kyang bya /
NK057(shi)001:5760: rang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul zhes kyang bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5761: de ltar dbyer med pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan pas lha'i sku rnams dbyer med par bstim pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5762: dngos grub gsol ba'i dbyangs ni /
NK057(shi)001:5764: ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs //
NK057(shi)001:5765: yon tan phrin las rmad po che //
NK057(shi)001:5766: de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK057(shi)001:5767: phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /
NK057(shi)001:5768: ces brjod pas lha rnams dngos grub bstsol ba la phyogs par gyur pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5770: zhes brjod pas chu la chu bzhag pa bzhin du dbyer med par thim par gyur to //
NK057(shi)001:5772: zhes brjod pas nam mkha' lha'i dkyil 'khor nyid du
NK057(shi)001:5773: grub par ma gyur gyi bar du brtan par bzhugs
NK057(shi)001:5774: par bya'o // +amo badz+ra sa ma ya hoh zhes brjod pas /
NK057(shi)001:5775: de yang shin tu dbang du gyur te dgyes pa chen pos rjes su chags par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5776: dzahh+aum bam ho zhes brjod pas brtan zhing gsal ba nyid du bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5777: de nas shin tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:5778: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
NK057(shi)001:5779: 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
NK057(shi)001:5781: dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub //
NK057(shi)001:5782: ces bya ba'i bar dag brjod pas shin tu gsal bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5783: de nas mchod pa bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5784: de yang mchod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni phyag gi mchod pa yin par grags te /
NK057(shi)001:5785: gong du me tog dor ba nyid rnal 'byor mchog
NK057(shi)001:5786: gi phyag yin pas 'dir lhag par ma smos kyang
NK057(shi)001:5788: gal te gzhung gzhan nas 'byung ba bzhin skabs 'dir phyag byas par gyur na yang /
NK057(shi)001:5789: bsam pa mnyam pa'i dgongs pas zin na 'gal ba med do //
NK057(shi)001:5791: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las tshul rnam pa gsum snang ste /
NK057(shi)001:5792: de la gcig ni 'phrul dag'i lha rnams longs spyod
NK057(shi)001:5793: la rtse ba'i tshul du bdag nyid gtso bor gsal
NK057(shi)001:5794: ba la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi thugs ka nas
NK057(shi)001:5795: 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi lha mo rnams spros te
NK057(shi)001:5796: / de dag gis mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sgo
NK057(shi)001:5797: nas nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la mchod par bsam zhing
NK057(shi)001:5798: / mchod par bya'o // gnyis pa ni mchod pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5799: phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5800: skabs nas 'byung ba bzhin phyogs bcu thams cad sangs
NK057(shi)001:5801: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bsam zhing /
NK057(shi)001:5802: longs spyod chen po'i rgyan gyi rol pa la mchod
NK057(shi)001:5803: pa chen po rgyun mi 'chad par lhun gyis gnas
NK057(shi)001:5804: pa'am / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mtha' yas pas
NK057(shi)001:5805: kun tu bzang po'i mchod sprin bsam gyis mi khyab
NK057(shi)001:5806: pa 'phrul pas lha la lha rol pa'i tshul gyis
NK057(shi)001:5807: pa'am / mchod par bya'o // gsum pa ni phyi
NK057(shi)001:5808: pa rnams dang tshul cung zad mthun par mchod pa'i
NK057(shi)001:5809: skabs su bdag dang lha'i dkyil 'khor gnyis su dmigs
NK057(shi)001:5810: pa'am / mchod par bya'o // te / phyag bya
NK057(shi)001:5811: ba dang mchod pa dang bstod pa dang bshags pa
NK057(shi)001:5812: dang dngos grub stsol bar bskul ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:5813: smon lam gdab pa la sogs pa'ang byed la /
NK057(shi)001:5814: don ni 'di dag sems kyi 'phrul pa tsam ste /
NK057(shi)001:5815: rang bzhin dbyer med par rtogs par byas pas phyi pa'i tshul yang mi 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:5816: de bas na dmigs pa rnam pa gsum po 'di
NK057(shi)001:5817: dag ji ltar blo la 'tshams pa bzhin sbyar bar
NK057(shi)001:5818: bya'o // de la mchod pa'ang rgyud 'di nyid las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5819: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5822: sbyor ba'i zhar la dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i mchod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5823: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i mchod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:5824: glu ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i mchod pa'am bstod pa rnams su shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5825: de la bstod pa 'di yang sgrub thabs rin po
NK057(shi)001:5826: che'i d+r+wa ba las ni sngon la bya bar 'byung
NK057(shi)001:5827: ste / de lta na yang bstod pa dang phyag go chu rub yin pas 'gal ba med do //
NK057(shi)001:5828: rgyud las ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rdzogs nas
NK057(shi)001:5829: dgyes pa chen po'i glu blangs par 'byung ba dang
NK057(shi)001:5830: / gsang sngags kyi tshul spyi las kyang bstod pa mjug tu bya bar phal cher la grags pas /
NK057(shi)001:5831: de ltar bya'o zhes bdag gi bla ma gsung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5832: bzlas brjod kyi tshul 'di ni rgyun 'di las gsal bar ma gsungs kyang /
NK057(shi)001:5833: dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams //
NK057(shi)001:5834: ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan //
NK057(shi)001:5835: zhes bya ba lta bu dang /
NK057(shi)001:5836: sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na //
NK057(shi)001:5837: dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur //
NK057(shi)001:5838: zhes bya ba lta bu gsungs la /
NK057(shi)001:5839: dam tshig gi skabs las kyang /
NK057(shi)001:5840: sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad //
NK057(shi)001:5842: bzlas brjod kyang bya ba yin no //
NK057(shi)001:5843: de'i tshul ni bzlas brjod kyi skabs su dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang /
NK057(shi)001:5844: ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis su dmigs te bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5845: zhes dbus lugs bka' phyogs pa gsung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5846: bdag cag gi bla ma ni nam mkha' dbyings kyi
NK057(shi)001:5847: mtha' klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnams dang
NK057(shi)001:5848: / sems can gyi ris rnams ni spro bsdu'i yul yin no //
NK057(shi)001:5849: bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor ni spro bsdu'i gnas yin no zhes gsung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5851: gtso bo'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'khor gyi dkyil rnams
NK057(shi)001:5852: su spro bsdu byas kyang sangs rgyas rnams la rang
NK057(shi)001:5853: bzhin bye brag tu gyur pa med pas thams cad
NK057(shi)001:5855: yongs ni bzlas brjod ji ltar byas kyang chos kyi
NK057(shi)001:5856: phyag rgya yin pas lha mnyes pa'i thabs su 'gyur
NK057(shi)001:5857: te / dmigs kyis 'gal ba'i nyes pa ma mthong ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5858: don zab cing rgya che ba ni bla ma'i gzhung nyid yin par mthong ngo //
NK057(shi)001:5859: phyi pa'i gzhung las grags pa rnams ni 'dir ma smras so //
NK057(shi)001:5860: da ni gsang sngags rnams so so'i don cung zad brjod par bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5861: de la gzhal yas kha nga bskyed pa'i sngags ni /
NK057(shi)001:5862: spyir chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags dang mchod sprin gyi sngags dang /
NK057(shi)001:5863: 'khor lo'i yig 'bru rnams kyis bskyed par 'byung ste /
NK057(shi)001:5864: gtsug tor gyi snying po yang 'khor lo'i yig 'brur 'dus so //
NK057(shi)001:5865: de la 'dir 'khor lo'i yig 'bru dang chos kyi dbyings kyi sngags so //
NK057(shi)001:5866: h+aum badz+ra d+h+rika ces pa la sogs sngags ni /
NK057(shi)001:5867: rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba'i rgyal //
NK057(shi)001:5868: rin chen 'dzin dang chags chen mtshon //
NK057(shi)001:5869: shes rab 'dzin ces bya ba ste //
NK057(shi)001:5870: 'di rnams kyi don ni gong du rigs lnga'i skabs su bshad zin no //
NK057(shi)001:5871: m+aum d+ha tu shwa zhes bya ba la sogs pa /
NK057(shi)001:5872: m+aum ni mok+sha ste ngo bo nyid kyi mkha' rang bzhin gyi rnam par thar pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5873: l+aam ni lo tsa na ste spyan no //
NK057(shi)001:5874: m+aam ni m+aa ma k+ai ste bdag nyid ma'o //
NK057(shi)001:5875: p+aam ni pan dar ste dkar mo'o //
NK057(shi)001:5876: t+aam ni ta ra ste sgrol ma'o //
NK057(shi)001:5877: klad kor rnams ni byang chub sems kyi thig le ste sa bon gyi don no //
NK057(shi)001:5878: gzhan la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5879: d+ha tu shwa ri ni dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
NK057(shi)001:5880: dwe sha ra ti zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhe sdang dga' ma /
NK057(shi)001:5884: zhe sdang gi rigs la sogs pa'i gtso bo rnams
NK057(shi)001:5885: mnyes par byed pas zhe sdang dga' ma la sogs
NK057(shi)001:5886: pa'o // rnam pa gcig tu mi gnyis pa'i shes
NK057(shi)001:5887: rab chen po nyid dug gsum rdo rje'i sgras brjod
NK057(shi)001:5888: pa'o // pa yin la / de nyid dga' ma ste shes rab ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:5889: ji skad du gsang ba 'dus pa las /
NK057(shi)001:5890: gnyis med chos kyi ye shes las //
NK057(shi)001:5891: phyir rol nga rgyal rmongs zhes bya //
NK057(shi)001:5892: de la phan tshun thug pa ni //
NK057(shi)001:5893: zhe sdang zhes ni bstan pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:5894: mtshan nyid 'dod chags kun zhen pa //
NK057(shi)001:5896: gti mug zhe sdang 'dod chags dang //
NK057(shi)001:5897: rdo rje rtag tu dga' mar sbyar //
NK057(shi)001:5899: k+shim hi r+aa dza ya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags te /
NK057(shi)001:5900: de la k+shim zhes bya ba sa'i sa bon no //
NK057(shi)001:5901: de bzhin du tram ni rin po che'i'o //
NK057(shi)001:5903: dzim ni rgyal ba'i sa bon no //
NK057(shi)001:5904: sngags kyi don ni sa'i rgyal po /
NK057(shi)001:5907: rgyal byed phyag ces zer te /
NK057(shi)001:5908: sems dpa' bzhi'i don dang sngar bshad pa bzhin du sbyar ro //
NK057(shi)001:5909: h+aumm la s+ya sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK057(shi)001:5910: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yul bzhi'i sems ma rnams kyi snying po ste /
NK057(shi)001:5912: nang gi sems ma bzhi dang /
NK057(shi)001:5913: sbyor ba'i brda bzhi rnams dang sbyar nas sems ma bzhi'i rang bzhin du ston te /
NK057(shi)001:5914: de la'ang h+aum t+r+aam h+r+aih+aahbazhi ni rigs bzhi'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:5915: la s+ya ma le g+airti n+airti bzhi ni nang gi lha mo bzhi ste /
NK057(shi)001:5916: de yang sgeg mo ni 'dod chags kyi yul /
NK057(shi)001:5918: glu ni dga' bar gyur pa /
NK057(shi)001:5919: gar ni bskyod par gyur ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:5920: sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i brda bzhi ste /
NK057(shi)001:5921: de yang sa ma ya s+t+wam ni yum gyis bskul ba ste /
NK057(shi)001:5922: dus la bab bo zhes pa'am /
NK057(shi)001:5924: sa ma ya hohlana byin pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5926: dam tshig gi mnyes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5928: r+aa go&a ham ni nye bar bskul ba ste /
NK057(shi)001:5930: r+aa ga ya mi lan byin pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5933: 'di bzhi yang nang gi byang chub sems dpa' bzhi smon 'jug ldang gnas bzhi dang sbyar te /
NK057(shi)001:5934: lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du sbyar ro //
NK057(shi)001:5935: mee d+ha ra ni s+w+aa h+aa zhes bya ba la
NK057(shi)001:5936: sogs pa ni dbang po'i sems dpa' rnams kyi sngags
NK057(shi)001:5937: te / de la mee shi byams pa chen po'i snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5938: th+l+him ni sgrib pa sel ba'i snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5939: h+aum ni byang chub sems kyi snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5940: mum ni grol ba'i snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5941: lhag ma rnas ni sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags te /
NK057(shi)001:5942: de yang sngar bshad pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5943: dza d+hu pe pra be sha ya zhes bya ba
NK057(shi)001:5944: la sogs pa ni dus bzhi'i sems ma bzhi'i gsang
NK057(shi)001:5945: sngags te / de yang mngag gzhug gi phyag rgya bzhi dang /
NK057(shi)001:5946: dus bzhi'i lha mo bzhi dang /
NK057(shi)001:5947: sbyor tshad bzhi ru sbyar te bstan no //
NK057(shi)001:5948: de la dzahhu bam hohbazhi ni phyag rgya bzhi ste /
NK057(shi)001:5953: d+h+au pe push+pe d+ai pa gan+d+he bzhi ni lha mo bzhi ste /
NK057(shi)001:5954: byang chub kyi sems 'phro ba dang 'bab pa dang gsal bar gyur pa dang reg pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5955: pra be sha a be sha su ki ni tsi
NK057(shi)001:5956: ta zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba'i tshad bzhi ste
NK057(shi)001:5957: / zhugs pa dang 'bab pa dang bde ba dang 'phros pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5958: de bzhi lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin nyid du sbyar ro //
NK057(shi)001:5959: h+aum ya m+aan+ta krita phata ces bya ba la sogs
NK057(shi)001:5960: pa'i khro bo bzhi'i snying po ni gong du bshad
NK057(shi)001:5961: pa bzhin no // +amo badz+ra ma h+aa d+ha ra
NK057(shi)001:5962: kro ti shwa ri dz+aa li ni h+aum phata ces
NK057(shi)001:5963: bya ba la sogs pa ni khro mo rnams kyi
NK057(shi)001:5964: pa bzhin no // sngags te / rdo rje 'dzin
NK057(shi)001:5965: pa chen po'i khro mo dbang phyug ma chen mo
NK057(shi)001:5966: 'bar ma zhes bya ba la sogs par sbyar ro
NK057(shi)001:5967: pa bzhin no // sngags te / // h+aum h+aum
NK057(shi)001:5968: h+aum zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi snying po'o
NK057(shi)001:5969: pa bzhin no // sngags te / // // badz+ra tsit+ta ni rdo rje thugs te /
NK057(shi)001:5970: kun tu bzang po'i snying po dang sngags so //
NK057(shi)001:5971: a a a zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5972: badz+ri b+ha dra sa ma man+ta zhes bya ba ni rdo rje kun tu bzang mo ste /
NK057(shi)001:5974: +amo mu ne krim s+w+aa h+aa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thub pa rnams kyi sngags te /
NK057(shi)001:5975: de la +amo dang s+w+aa h+aa ni sngags kyi mgo dang mjug ma ste /
NK057(shi)001:5976: de la +amo ni rab sngags te /
NK057(shi)001:5977: gsang sngags kyis phyag btsal ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:5978: s+w+aa h+aa ni gzhi 'jugs pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5979: gzhi mi 'jig pa dang gzhi 'phel ba la sogs pa la sbyar ba bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:5980: mu ne zhes bya ba ni mi smra ba la
NK057(shi)001:5981: sogs pa'i dka' thub dang ldan pa ste thub pa
NK057(shi)001:5982: zhes bya'o // krim ni srin po rnams kyi snying po ste /
NK057(shi)001:5983: lha ma yin la sogs pa rnam par zhi ba rnams kyi snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5984: h+aum trum ni mi la sogs pa sred pas chags pa rnams kyi snying pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5985: srum ni sru sar zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:5986: dud 'gro la sogs pa blo gros zlum por gnas pa rnams kyi snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5987: bram ni skom pa dang bkres pa la sogs pas gdungs pas /
NK057(shi)001:5988: de sel bar byed pas chu la sogs pa 'dod pa'i snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5989: k+sham ni lha la sogs pa bzod ldan gyi snying po'o //
NK057(shi)001:5990: ye nas gang yang rung bar khrid par byed pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:5991: dmyal ba lta bu smad pa'i gnas su gyur pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:5992: de dag ni lha so so'i gsang sngags so //
NK057(shi)001:5993: spyan drang ba'i sngags su gyur pa /
NK057(shi)001:5994: +amo e h+ye hi b+ha ga w+aan ni kye tshur spyon bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:5995: ma h+aa ka ru ni ka dri sh+ya hohzhesa bya
NK057(shi)001:5996: ba ni thugs rje chen po spyan ras gzigs zhes
NK057(shi)001:5997: pa'o // sa ma ya s+t+wam ni dus la bab bo'am /
NK057(shi)001:5998: khyed dam tshig las ma 'da' zhig pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6000: +amo ma h+aa shu nya t+aa dz+ny+aa na badz+ra swa b+h+aa wa at+ma ko&a ham /
NK057(shi)001:6001: zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ye shes
NK057(shi)001:6002: rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid
NK057(shi)001:6004: de la swa b+h+aa wa ni rang gi ngo bo'am ngo bo nyid /
NK057(shi)001:6007: de la tshig rnam par sbyar na /
NK057(shi)001:6008: at+ma ko&aham zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:6009: gzhan la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6010: rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba las //
NK057(shi)001:6011: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'phyong yin te snga ma bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:6012: yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung //
NK057(shi)001:6013: zhes bya ba la yi ge med pa ni don dam pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6014: rig pa'i ye shes te de dag kyang yul dang
NK057(shi)001:6015: yul can du rang gsal bas gsung gi sgras bshad
NK057(shi)001:6016: do // dkyil 'khor bsdus pa gsang sngags kyi le'u zhes bya ba la /
NK057(shi)001:6017: dkyil 'khor bsdus pa ni byed pa po rdo rje
NK057(shi)001:6018: dang bya ba mo gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:6019: la thim par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don nyid
NK057(shi)001:6022: // da ni phyag rgya ston te /
NK057(shi)001:6023: de la phyag rgya spyi'i don ni gong du bshad zin to //
NK057(shi)001:6024: gzhung 'di nyid las ni lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya dang /
NK057(shi)001:6025: phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu rdo rje thal mo dang /
NK057(shi)001:6026: spyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
NK057(shi)001:6027: lha so so'i phyag rgya rnams ston te /
NK057(shi)001:6028: de la so so'i phyag rgya de dag kyang dam
NK057(shi)001:6029: tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya thun mong du bstan
NK057(shi)001:6030: pa yin no // de la spyir dam tshig gi
NK057(shi)001:6031: phyag rgya'i las ni lha rnams dam tshig las mi
NK057(shi)001:6033: las kyi phyag rgya'i las ni lha rnams rang rang
NK057(shi)001:6034: gi mdzad pa la 'jug par byed pa'o zhes gzhung
NK057(shi)001:6036: de nyid 'dus pa'i rgyud chen po las ni /
NK057(shi)001:6037: las kyi phyag rgya mchog chen pos //
NK057(shi)001:6038: dam tshig rnams ni gzhug par bya //
NK057(shi)001:6040: las kyi phyag rgyas ye shes kyi lha rnams dam
NK057(shi)001:6041: tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor la gzhug pa'i las byed
NK057(shi)001:6042: par ston to // 'dir ni bya ba so sor phye ba lhag par med de /
NK057(shi)001:6043: sngags dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6044: tshogs kyi mchod pa byin gyis brlab cing dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa dbul dang /
NK057(shi)001:6045: bzlas brjod kyis lha mnyes par bya ba la sogs
NK057(shi)001:6046: pa rnams la phyag rgya dang ldan par bya ba
NK057(shi)001:6049: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK057(shi)001:6050: de la yan lag thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i
NK057(shi)001:6051: dkyil 'khor du byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba
NK057(shi)001:6052: ni / spyir phyag rgyas lus lhar byin gyis rlob par byed par grags pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6053: 'dir lhun gyis grub par 'dod pas de skad bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6054: lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya brtan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:6055: sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba mngon rdzogs pa'i //
NK057(shi)001:6056: thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu //
NK057(shi)001:6057: gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi //
NK057(shi)001:6060: gong du bstan pa bzhin phung po khams dang skye
NK057(shi)001:6061: mched kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa
NK057(shi)001:6062: ba'i dkyil 'khor du ye nas mngon par rdzogs par
NK057(shi)001:6063: sangs rgyas pas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste
NK057(shi)001:6064: / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:6065: gsang ba de nyid nges pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6066: 'da' dka' zhes bya ba ni skabs 'dir lha rnams dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK057(shi)001:6067: bdud la sogs pa'i phyir rgol ba rnams kyis glags
NK057(shi)001:6068: mi rnyed pa la sogs pas 'da' bar dka' zhes
NK057(shi)001:6069: gsungs pa lta bu ni ma yin gyi /
NK057(shi)001:6070: dngos po rnams kyi rang rang gi chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas pa yin pas 'dar mi rung ste /
NK057(shi)001:6071: dper na me ni tsha ba'i mtshan nyid dang nam yang mi 'bral te /
NK057(shi)001:6072: nam zhig tsha ba'i mtshan nyid med par gyur pa de'i tshe me nyid kyang ma yin no //
NK057(shi)001:6073: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang de dang 'dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:6074: nam yang chos nyid de las mi 'ada'o //
NK057(shi)001:6075: mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge /
NK057(shi)001:6076: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK057(shi)001:6077: phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu rdo rje thal mo ston pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:6078: skabs 'dir yan lag lnga rgyud spyir grags pa dang
NK057(shi)001:6079: mthun par rigs lnga'i byin gyis brlabs su 'dod de
NK057(shi)001:6080: / de yang lag pa g.yas pa ni mi bskyod pa'i byin rlabs so //
NK057(shi)001:6081: g.yon pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi byin rlabs so //
NK057(shi)001:6082: rkang pa g.yas pa ni don yod grub pa'i byin rlabs so //
NK057(shi)001:6083: g.yon pa ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi byin rlabs so //
NK057(shi)001:6084: dbu la sogs pa'i lus kyi gzhi ni rnams par snang mdzad kyi byin rlabs so //
NK057(shi)001:6085: de ltar 'byor cing reg pa las mi bskyod pa'i
NK057(shi)001:6086: byin rlabs lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du thabs kyi
NK057(shi)001:6087: bdag nyid nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la thabs kyi yi
NK057(shi)001:6088: ge h+aum +amo s+w+aa +aam h+aa rnams gsal ba ni
NK057(shi)001:6089: thabs kyi cha rigs lnga'i rang bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:6090: rin cen 'byung ldan gyi byin rlabs lag pa g.yon
NK057(shi)001:6091: pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:6092: la shes rab kyi yi ge m+aum l+aam m+aam pyam
NK057(shi)001:6093: t+aam rnams gsal ba ni shes rab kyi cha yum
NK057(shi)001:6095: de gnyis rdo rje thal mo cung zad sbyar ba
NK057(shi)001:6096: ni thabs dang shes rab la 'jug par phyogs pas
NK057(shi)001:6098: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i sgo nas
NK057(shi)001:6099: 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la phyogs pas dgyes pa
NK057(shi)001:6101: de nas rdo rje thal mo de legs par sbyar
NK057(shi)001:6102: nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med par gyur
NK057(shi)001:6103: pas / don dam pa'i bde ba chen po bsnyems pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6104: de'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa la zhugs pa'i dgyes pa bskyed pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:6105: de'i phyir rdo rje thal mo ni don dang rtogs
NK057(shi)001:6106: gnyis ka'i sgo nas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur
NK057(shi)001:6107: to // +amo dang m+au gnyis rtse sbyar te //
NK057(shi)001:6108: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6109: spyir dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
NK057(shi)001:6110: de la +amo ni g.yas pa'i mdzub mo /
NK057(shi)001:6111: m+aum ni g.yon pa'i gung mo ste /
NK057(shi)001:6112: de gnyis rtse sbyar nas lhag ma'i yi ge 'bru
NK057(shi)001:6113: brgyad kyi sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te rtse
NK057(shi)001:6114: sprad pa ni / thabs kyi zhags pa las /
NK057(shi)001:6115: sor mo nang du bsnol nas bkan //
NK057(shi)001:6116: gung mdzub mthe bong mathe'u chung rnams //
NK057(shi)001:6117: so sor rtse sprad phyir bskyed de //
NK057(shi)001:6118: srin lag gshibs bsgrengs dam tshig rgya //
NK057(shi)001:6119: zhes 'byung ba dang mthun par sbyar ro //
NK057(shi)001:6120: phyag rgya de yi yon tan ni /
NK057(shi)001:6121: rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //
NK057(shi)001:6122: bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya //
NK057(shi)001:6124: rgyal ba rnams dang dbyer med par gyur nas /
NK057(shi)001:6125: de dag gi bde ba chen po thob par byed do //
NK057(shi)001:6126: sor mo rnams la yig 'bru ji ltar dgod pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6127: 'di nyid nas gsal bar mi 'byung la /
NK057(shi)001:6128: rgyud gzhan las 'byung ba'ang cung zad mi mthun te /
NK057(shi)001:6129: rgyud la la nas grags pa gung mo ni dbu ma zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:6130: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su grags so //
NK057(shi)001:6131: mdzub mo ni khro mo'am sdigs mo zhes bya ste rdo rje'i rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:6132: mthe bong ni sbom po zhes bya ste rin po che'i rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:6133: srin lag ni dbang mo zhes bya ste pad+ma'i rigs so //
NK057(shi)001:6134: mathe'u chung ni mtha' ma'am chung ngu zhes bya ste las kyi rigs su grags so //
NK057(shi)001:6135: rgyud gzhan las gzhan du'ang grags te /
NK057(shi)001:6136: de las rgyud 'dir thugs gtso bor grags pas /
NK057(shi)001:6137: g.yas pa'i gung mo la h+aum bkod la /
NK057(shi)001:6138: gzhan ma rim pa bzhin sbyar ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:6139: g.yon pa'i gung mo la m+aum /
NK057(shi)001:6143: mthe bong la pyam dgod par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6144: zhes yongs grags dbus lugs pa gsung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:6145: thabs kyi zhags pa'i gzhung ltar sbyar zhes yongs grags khams lugs pa gsung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:6146: yongs ni gsal bar smos pa med pa rnams spyir
NK057(shi)001:6147: grags pa dang mthun par sbyar ba la nyes pa
NK057(shi)001:6148: med do // rigs lnga yab yum so so'i phyag rgya ni /
NK057(shi)001:6149: yab rnams kyi ni g.yas pa'i yig 'bru so so'i
NK057(shi)001:6150: sor mo'i rtse mo la rang rang gi thugs phyag
NK057(shi)001:6151: mtshan rnams thugs kar bkan te /
NK057(shi)001:6152: g.yon pa'i yig 'bru lnga gzungs ma la 'khril bas
NK057(shi)001:6153: chos snang ba mtha' yas kyi byin rlabs rkang pa
NK057(shi)001:6154: g.yon pa la brten te bzhugs so //
NK057(shi)001:6155: yum rnams ni lag pa g.yon pa'i rang rang gi
NK057(shi)001:6156: yig 'bru rnams kyi sor mo'i rtse mor dril bu
NK057(shi)001:6158: g.yas pa'i yi ge 'bru lnga gtso bo la 'khril
NK057(shi)001:6159: bas las kyi rigs kyi byin rlabs rkang pa g.yas
NK057(shi)001:6161: sems dpa' rnams ni g.yas pa rang rang gi mtshan ma thugs kar 'dzin /
NK057(shi)001:6162: g.yon pa gtso bo rnams dang mthun /
NK057(shi)001:6163: sems ma rnams ni g.yon pa rang rang gi mtshan ma thugs kar 'dzin /
NK057(shi)001:6164: g.yas pa gtso mo rnams dang mthun /
NK057(shi)001:6165: sgo ba dang sgo ma'ang tshul de bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:6166: thub pa drug gi phyag rgya bstan pa'i skabs su /
NK057(shi)001:6167: yum ni mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings //
NK057(shi)001:6168: zhes gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6169: phyag rgya thams cad kyang lha mnyes par byed pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad la /
NK057(shi)001:6170: 'dir yang thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba
NK057(shi)001:6171: nyid dgyes pa bskyed par byed pa rnams kyi dam
NK057(shi)001:6172: pa yin pas phyag rgya yin par bshad pa las
NK057(shi)001:6173: / thub pa drug ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs pa'i tshul yin pas /
NK057(shi)001:6174: gzugs kyi skur bstan pa'i yum mi bzhugs pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:6175: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas mnyes par
NK057(shi)001:6176: byed pa'i phyag rgya med dam snyam du rtog par
NK057(shi)001:6178: yum ni dmigs med chos kyi dbyings //
NK057(shi)001:6180: chos kyi dbyings nyid phyag rgya chen po'i chen po
NK057(shi)001:6181: yin pa'i phyir des mnyes par byed do zhes bya
NK057(shi)001:6182: ba'i don no // kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro //
NK057(shi)001:6184: kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya mnyam par gzhag pa nyid de /
NK057(shi)001:6185: de nyid las ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba'o //
NK057(shi)001:6186: kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya ni /
NK057(shi)001:6189: mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyi grub pas mnyam rdzogs te /
NK057(shi)001:6190: phyag rgya ni yab dang mthun no //
NK057(shi)001:6191: cung zad bye brag tu phye na bzhugs thabs ni pad+ma'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6192: de dag la sogs pa gdul bya'i dbang gis phyag rgya yang grangs med pas /
NK057(shi)001:6193: gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te //
NK057(shi)001:6195: mdor bsdu ba la dga' ba rnams kyi phyir phyag rgya mang po la sbyor bar mi 'dod na /
NK057(shi)001:6196: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i spyi'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ba' zhig bcas kyang rung /
NK057(shi)001:6197: rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya 'ba' zhig bcas kyang rung ste 'gal ba med par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:6198: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid //
NK057(shi)001:6199: yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid //
NK057(shi)001:6201: phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni //
NK057(shi)001:6202: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'phyong yin no //
NK057(shi)001:6204: yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan //
NK057(shi)001:6205: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phyag rgya spros pa ston pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:6206: de yang phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid gcig la
NK057(shi)001:6207: lha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi yan lag dang ldan
NK057(shi)001:6208: pas / de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste //
NK057(shi)001:6210: de dag re re yang sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya dang ldan pas /
NK057(shi)001:6213: de lta bur ldan pa des phyag rgya ji snyed
NK057(shi)001:6214: 'phro zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar 'grub
NK057(shi)001:6216: de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis //
NK057(shi)001:6217: rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du //
NK057(shi)001:6219: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6220: de la rgyal ba rgyal mchog ces bya ba ni
NK057(shi)001:6221: bdag nyid rigs kyi gtso bo gang yang rung ba'i
NK057(shi)001:6222: phyag rgya gang yang rung ba'i gtso gzungs kyi phyag
NK057(shi)001:6223: rgyar gnas pa'o // gtso bo la sku gsung thugs
NK057(shi)001:6224: kyi phyag rgya ji ltar ldan pa de bzhin du
NK057(shi)001:6225: rgyar gnas pa'o // / yan lag gi lha rnams
NK057(shi)001:6226: la yang ldan par brtsis na phyag rgya brgya nyi
NK057(shi)001:6227: rgyar gnas pa'o // / shur 'gyur pas / bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar //
NK057(shi)001:6229: de la spyir grangs kyi rtsis kyang rnam par gsum ste /
NK057(shi)001:6230: 'gyur dang snon dang de gnyis bsres pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6231: de la 'gyur du brtsis na ni brgya nyi shu'o //
NK057(shi)001:6232: snon du brtsis na ni bco brgyad do //
NK057(shi)001:6233: bsres pa'i grangs la ni nges pa med de nyi
NK057(shi)001:6234: shu rtsa drug gam nyi shu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur
NK057(shi)001:6235: ro // grangs kyi rtsis 'di dag slob dpon rnams
NK057(shi)001:6236: kyis so sor sbyar ba snang yang 'gyur du brtsis
NK057(shi)001:6237: pa nyid don dang ldan par mthong ngo //
NK057(shi)001:6238: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas //
NK057(shi)001:6239: zhes bya ba ni spyir phyag rgya chen po'i sgra 'jug pa rnam pa gsum ste /
NK057(shi)001:6240: phyag rgya so so'i yon tan ston pa'i dus na
NK057(shi)001:6241: phyag rgya thams cad la yang chen po'i sgra 'jug
NK057(shi)001:6242: go // sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma'i sgra 'dom
NK057(shi)001:6243: pa'i dus na sku yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan ma
NK057(shi)001:6244: la phyag rgya chen po'i sgra 'jug go //
NK057(shi)001:6245: skabs la lar ni chos kyi sku mtshan ma med pa la phyag rgya chen po'i sgra 'jug ste /
NK057(shi)001:6246: skabs kyis ni ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6249: // da ni gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas
NK057(shi)001:6250: slob ma la dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho
NK057(shi)001:6252: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6253: de la rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa zhes bya ba la /
NK057(shi)001:6254: 'dir dam tshig gi sgras dkyil 'khor ston te /
NK057(shi)001:6256: shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /
NK057(shi)001:6257: phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du //
NK057(shi)001:6258: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de //
NK057(shi)001:6259: sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya //
NK057(shi)001:6260: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK057(shi)001:6261: de la gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor chung tshad ni sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas la /
NK057(shi)001:6262: slob dpon lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por gsal ba'i phyag mthil du bzhag ste /
NK057(shi)001:6263: 'bru lnga dang spos lnga la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs kyis go ma ye btang ste /
NK057(shi)001:6264: lag gis 'bri bar nus pa rnams ni lag gis bris /
NK057(shi)001:6265: shin tu phra ba rnams ni yid gyis bris te /
NK057(shi)001:6266: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6267: phyi nang gi mchod pa dbul ba byas la /
NK057(shi)001:6268: de nas slob dpon dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga byas te /
NK057(shi)001:6271: man ngag sbyin pa rnams bya'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:6272: de bzhin du mdzub gang ba nas rgyang grags dang
NK057(shi)001:6273: dpag tshad kyi bar du tshad kyi bye brag gsungs
NK057(shi)001:6274: pa rnams dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas
NK057(shi)001:6275: pa la sogs pa rnams su yang sangs rgyas kyi
NK057(shi)001:6277: mchod pa dang 'jug pa'i cho ga de bzhin du bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6279: de la skabs la lar ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga gsungs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6280: de bzhin du tshon 'gyed pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6281: la lar phyag rgyar dgod cing dkyil 'khor byin gyis
NK057(shi)001:6282: brlab par gsungs pa yang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
NK057(shi)001:6283: thun mong du shes par bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6284: de la 'di'i rim pa ni dang por dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:6285: bri ba'i cho ga la sta gon gyi cho ga
NK057(shi)001:6286: dag ni 'dir gsal bar ma gsungs pas spyi la
NK057(shi)001:6288: dkyil 'khor bris pa dang bsgom pa nyid kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs par 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:6289: de bas na dang po dkyil 'khor bris te /
NK057(shi)001:6290: de nas dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga
NK057(shi)001:6291: le'u bdun par bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o
NK057(shi)001:6292: // mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byas nas de
NK057(shi)001:6293: nas bdag dang slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bya'o
NK057(shi)001:6294: // // de las 'dir mchod pa gsungs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6295: bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs dang /
NK057(shi)001:6296: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdzas kyi mchod pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6297: yum dang 'jo ma sems ma yis //
NK057(shi)001:6298: zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6299: las rnam bzhi'i sbyin sreg gi mchod pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:6300: de la gzungs ma smos pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6301: 'di ru gzungs dang ldan pas las bya bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK057(shi)001:6302: zhal du gyur pa'i me zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:6303: spyir me lha brtag pa rnam pa bzhir grags te /
NK057(shi)001:6304: de la kha cig las ni /
NK057(shi)001:6305: me lha me 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur pa byas te /
NK057(shi)001:6306: der lha rnams spyan drangs nas mchod par 'byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:6308: me lha me 'bar ba'i rnam par gyur pa'i dkyil du gzhal yas khang bsams te /
NK057(shi)001:6309: der dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te /
NK057(shi)001:6310: dbyer med par bstims nas mchod par 'byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:6311: kha cig las ni 'byung ba'i me'i dkyil du me lha bzhugs par bsams te /
NK057(shi)001:6312: de'i thugs kar gzhal yas khang bsams te /
NK057(shi)001:6313: der lha rnams bzhugs par bsams nas der mchod par 'byung ngo //
NK057(shi)001:6314: kha cig las ni me lha phyogs gcig tu bzhag par gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6315: 'di ltar zhal drug khro'i rgyal po'i rgyud las /
NK057(shi)001:6316: phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK057(shi)001:6317: de ltar brtag pa rnam pa bzhi po gang yang rung ste /
NK057(shi)001:6318: de dag gi sgo me yin la me'i sgo nas me lha tshim par 'gyur ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:6319: me lha'i sgo nas lha rnams tshim par 'gyur ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:6320: dper na kha zas kyis lus kyi 'byung ba chen po rgyas pa'i sgo nas /
NK057(shi)001:6321: de la brten pa'i dbang po rgyas par 'gyur la /
NK057(shi)001:6322: de rgyas pas de la brten pa'i rnam par shes pa rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
NK057(shi)001:6323: de'i phyir me lha ni lha'i zhal du bzhed do //
NK057(shi)001:6324: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
NK057(shi)001:6325: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6326: mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa chen po ste /
NK057(shi)001:6327: 'di dag ji ltar dbul ba ni gong du bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:6328: re zhig yi ge las spro bar 'dod na zhing
NK057(shi)001:6329: dang gzhal yas khang dang bcas pa ni yi ge
NK057(shi)001:6331: rin po che'i rgyan gyi bye brag rnams ni yi ge tram las spros te dbul /
NK057(shi)001:6332: khrus kyi rdzing bu la sogs pa ni yi ge kham las spros te dbul /
NK057(shi)001:6333: sgra'i bye brag ni yi ge h+r+aihls spros te dbul /
NK057(shi)001:6334: bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i zhal zas kyi bye brag ni yi ge a las spros te dbul /
NK057(shi)001:6335: bro gar gyi 'du 'phro rnams ni yi ge ham las spros te dbul zhes kyang bshad do //
NK057(shi)001:6336: dbul ba'i rim pa'ang gnas skabs kyi bye brag dang /
NK057(shi)001:6337: ting nge 'dzin gsal mi gsal gyi bye brag gis rim pa'am cig car du dbul bar bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6338: gsal ldan ma'am byin rlabs la //
NK057(shi)001:6339: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sbyor ba'i mchod pa ste /
NK057(shi)001:6340: de la gsal ldan ma ni shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin ldan pa'i gzungs ma'o //
NK057(shi)001:6341: de dang mi ldan pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6342: la la na re gsal ldan ma ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6343: byin gyis brlab pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o zhes zer ro //
NK057(shi)001:6344: lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad //
NK057(shi)001:6345: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6346: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i mtshams sbyor yin te /
NK057(shi)001:6347: dang por de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin nas
NK057(shi)001:6348: bzung nas mchod pa'i cho ga yan chad rdzogs par
NK057(shi)001:6349: byas pa la ni kun byas zhes bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6350: de nas rdo rje slob dpon 'jug par bya bas /
NK057(shi)001:6351: dbang phyug rig pas 'jug ces te /
NK057(shi)001:6352: lha dang dbyer med par bsgom pa nyid rig pas 'jug pa yin no //
NK057(shi)001:6353: de nas slob ma gzhug par bya //
NK057(shi)001:6355: sems bskyed pa'i cho ga dang /
NK057(shi)001:6357: brtan par dam bca' zhing dam chu blud ba dang /
NK057(shi)001:6359: lhar byin gyis brlabs cing dkyil 'khor bstan pa rnams so //
NK057(shi)001:6360: de la phan pa'i dbang dang /
NK057(shi)001:6361: nus pa'i dbang rim pa bzhin du sbyin zhing /
NK057(shi)001:6362: dam tshig dpog pa dang man ngag sbyin pa rnams bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6363: de nas slob mas kyang slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:6364: dang grogs po rnams la ci nus kyis mchod par
NK057(shi)001:6365: bya'o // de la phan pa'i dbang ni dbu rgyan gyi dbang la sogs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6366: nus pa'i dbang ni nyan pa la sogs pa'i dbang ste /
NK057(shi)001:6367: 'di dag kyang phan pa'i dbang yin mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:6368: bye brag tu so so'i nus tshad la rag lus pas de skad ces bya'o //
NK057(shi)001:6369: de bas na dbang dang dam tshig dang man ngag rnams la so so'i thig tshad yod pas /
NK057(shi)001:6370: snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung //
NK057(shi)001:6372: de la dkyil 'khor mdzub gang pa la sogs pa'i skabs su thig gdab pa'i cho ga gsungs so //
NK057(shi)001:6373: bcu drug pa la sogs pa'i skabs su phyag rgya dgod pa gsungs so //
NK057(shi)001:6374: rgyang grags la sogs pa'i skabs su tshon dgye bar gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6375: de la tshon gyi nges tshig ni r+aa dza zhes
NK057(shi)001:6376: bya ba mchod pa dang ro bcud dang mtshan ma
NK057(shi)001:6377: la 'jug ste / 'dir ni mtshan mar grags pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6378: gzhan yang ra ga zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don ni /
NK057(shi)001:6379: ra na rag ti rang ga zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:6380: de la ra na zhes bya ba ni /
NK057(shi)001:6381: kle sha a ga nya na ra na zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:6382: nyon mongs pa dang mi shes pa'i kun nas dkrugs pa la bya /
NK057(shi)001:6383: rnam pa gcig tu a pa ra nar zhes bya ba ste /
NK057(shi)001:6385: gti ni rtogs shing khong du chud pa la bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:6386: sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis kyis dkrugs shing bsgribs pa
NK057(shi)001:6387: rnams la rtogs pa bskyed par byed pas de skad
NK057(shi)001:6388: ces bya'o // ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog /
NK057(shi)001:6389: ces bya ba la sogs pa ni /
NK057(shi)001:6390: dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa ston te /
NK057(shi)001:6391: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi 'phrul pas 'di ltar yi ge bris pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6392: de bzhin du gdan dang snying po dang phyag rgya
NK057(shi)001:6393: bris shing bkod pa rnams la sku gsung thugs dang
NK057(shi)001:6394: ldan par byin gyis brlab na dngos grub 'grub par
NK057(shi)001:6395: nges so zhes bya ba'i don no //
NK057(shi)001:6397: sa la sogs pas phyag rgyar byas //
NK057(shi)001:6398: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6399: ji ltar 'byung ba chen po'i rgyud las /
NK057(shi)001:6400: phyag rgya'i mtshan mar byas pa tsam gyis kyang rgyu'i
NK057(shi)001:6401: bye brag dang bsam pa'i bye brag gi dbang gis
NK057(shi)001:6402: rnam par grol ba rim pa thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur
NK057(shi)001:6403: na / gzung 'dzin gyi dngos po la zhen pa'i
NK057(shi)001:6404: dri ma dag pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma'i phyag
NK057(shi)001:6405: rgya de dag ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor du byin
NK057(shi)001:6406: gyis brlabs shing sbyangs pa las grub par 'gyur ba
NK057(shi)001:6408: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin de nyid dngos grub chen po yin no //
NK057(shi)001:6409: da ni gong du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis
NK057(shi)001:6410: brlabs pa de dag tu spyan drangs pa la sogs
NK057(shi)001:6412: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che //
NK057(shi)001:6413: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
NK057(shi)001:6414: de la phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ni /
NK057(shi)001:6415: phyogs bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor rnams so //
NK057(shi)001:6416: bdag nyid che zhes bya ba ni spyir grags pa
NK057(shi)001:6417: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs 'dren pa rang
NK057(shi)001:6418: byung bdag nyid chen po la sogs pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6419: la la dag na re byang chub sems kyi mtshan
NK057(shi)001:6420: nyid du chos thams cad dbyer med pa ni bdag
NK057(shi)001:6421: nyid chen po zhes bya ste /
NK057(shi)001:6422: de nyid mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin no zhes zer ro //
NK057(shi)001:6423: mdor na chos kyi skus kun tu khyab par thugs rje dang sprul pa dag gis kyang khyab ste /
NK057(shi)001:6424: de bas na gang nas gang du spyan drangs pa
NK057(shi)001:6425: mi dmigs kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs shing 'phrul
NK057(shi)001:6426: pa nyid kyis spyan drangs par 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:6427: da ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid lha
NK057(shi)001:6428: rnams dang gnyis su med par bya ba ston te
NK057(shi)001:6430: rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la //
NK057(shi)001:6431: 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas //
NK057(shi)001:6432: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6433: de la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang
NK057(shi)001:6434: rig pa rang snang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir bdag
NK057(shi)001:6435: dang rang bzhin dbyer med de /
NK057(shi)001:6436: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor der rnal 'byor ba 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dam lugs kyang /
NK057(shi)001:6437: bdag la bstims shing mnyam par sbyar bas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:6439: phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi //
NK057(shi)001:6440: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6441: phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rgyal ba rnams kyis sngon byang chub kya spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
NK057(shi)001:6442: nyid kyi dka' ba sna tshogs pa'i sgo nas bsnyen
NK057(shi)001:6443: pa'i dngos grub sna tshogs pa dag de la rdzogs
NK057(shi)001:6444: par 'gyur ro // gzhan yang nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur ro //
NK057(shi)001:6446: nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /
NK057(shi)001:6448: da ni dngos grub de dag ji ltar 'grub pa'i tshul ston ste /
NK057(shi)001:6449: de la dngos grub gzhan dang gzhan na yod pa
NK057(shi)001:6450: zhig gzhan gyis thob par 'gyur ba ni ma yin
NK057(shi)001:6451: gyis / rang rig pa'i ye shes nyid dngos grub
NK057(shi)001:6452: sna tshogs su snang ba brgal ba lan dang bcas
NK057(shi)001:6453: gyis / par ston te / de la dang por dpe dgod pa bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:6454: dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi //
NK057(shi)001:6455: rin po che dang 'byung ba kun //
NK057(shi)001:6456: de dag rdzas yod ma yin te //
NK057(shi)001:6457: rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin //
NK057(shi)001:6459: dper na lha'i gnas la sogs pa na dpag bsam
NK057(shi)001:6460: gyi shing gi grib ma la gnas pa rnams la
NK057(shi)001:6461: re ba bskong bar nus pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6462: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la mchod
NK057(shi)001:6463: pa byed pa rnams la re ba skong bar byed
NK057(shi)001:6465: gzhan 'dod pa 'byung ba'i gnas su gyur pa kun
NK057(shi)001:6466: de dag sems las gud na rdzas su yod nas
NK057(shi)001:6467: de la spyod pa ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:6468: rang rang gi sems bsod nams kyi mthus brtas shing
NK057(shi)001:6469: brtan par gyur pa de nyid de lta bur snang
NK057(shi)001:6470: ba yin no // de bzhin du sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:6471: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos //
NK057(shi)001:6472: gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te //
NK057(shi)001:6473: thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid //
NK057(shi)001:6474: de lta bu yi ngang du byung //
NK057(shi)001:6476: de la ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos ni sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
NK057(shi)001:6477: de dag gud na med de thabs zhes bya ba
NK057(shi)001:6478: gsang sngags kyi bslab par gyur pa mtha' drug dang
NK057(shi)001:6479: bcus bsdus pa la brten nas /
NK057(shi)001:6480: phyin ci ma log par skyes pas shes rab nyid
NK057(shi)001:6481: dngos grub de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung ngo zhe'o
NK057(shi)001:6483: 'byung zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyu dang 'byung khungs dag las byung zhing skyes pa la bya na /
NK057(shi)001:6485: lan du de dag gnyis su med par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:6486: shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid //
NK057(shi)001:6487: thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir //
NK057(shi)001:6489: phyin ci ma log pa'i shes rab kyi ngang nyid
NK057(shi)001:6490: thabs kyi phyag rgya sku dang ye shes su gyur
NK057(shi)001:6493: ye shes la ni ye shes rol //
NK057(shi)001:6495: 'o na shes rab kyi rang bzhin dang bral bar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:6496: ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /
NK057(shi)001:6498: de nyid kyang dngos por ma grub bo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
NK057(shi)001:6499: ye shes ci 'dra bar sku yang de 'dra ste /
NK057(shi)001:6501: rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang //
NK057(shi)001:6502: byin rlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te //
NK057(shi)001:6504: rgyal ba 'jig rten du sku mngon du byung nas
NK057(shi)001:6505: 'gro ba la skyob pa'i byin gyi rlabs ston pa
NK057(shi)001:6506: rnams kyang ye shes la brjod pa bzhin du /
NK057(shi)001:6507: rang rig pa'i shes rab nyid sku sna tshogs su snang bas sku la sku rol zhing /
NK057(shi)001:6509: de nyid rang bzhin med pas gsog lta bur shes par bya'o zhe'o //
NK057(shi)001:6510: 'o na sku dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de
NK057(shi)001:6511: dag kyang gsob ya ma barla sgyu ma lta bu
NK057(shi)001:6512: yin pas / don gyis dgos pa ci yang med pa zhig yin nam zhe na /
NK057(shi)001:6513: bya byed nus pa'i gzi brjid kyis //
NK057(shi)001:6514: sgyu ma rdo rje mtshan po mchog /
NK057(shi)001:6516: de lta bu ma yin te /
NK057(shi)001:6517: ye shes kyang don la phyin ci ma log par rtogs pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6518: sku dag gis kyang 'gro ba chud mi gson pa'i nus pa dag mnga' ste /
NK057(shi)001:6519: de lta bas na sgyu ma lta bu yin mod kyi /
NK057(shi)001:6520: bdud thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i nus mthu mnga' bas /
NK057(shi)001:6521: rdo rje btsan po mchog ces gsungs so //
NK057(shi)001:6522: da ni dngos grub de dag rgyu gang gis 'grub pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6523: gzhan gyi rgyud la ji ltar snang ba rnams brgal ba lan dang bcas par bstan pa'i phyir /
NK057(shi)001:6524: cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing //
NK057(shi)001:6525: yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan //
NK057(shi)001:6526: sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas //
NK057(shi)001:6527: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6528: de la skabs 'dir ni dngos grub kyi rgyu dang thabs su gyur pa /
NK057(shi)001:6529: dang po 'jug pa'i spyod pa dang /
NK057(shi)001:6530: dngos grub sgrub pa'i spyod pa dag gsungs te /
NK057(shi)001:6531: de la theg pa chen po ma nor bar ston
NK057(shi)001:6532: pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su bzung ba ni
NK057(shi)001:6533: dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga dang po'o
NK057(shi)001:6534: // de nas des bstan pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK057(shi)001:6535: du 'jug cing dbang nod pa ni de bzhin du
NK057(shi)001:6536: // gnyis pa'o // de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i
NK057(shi)001:6537: dam tshig gi sdom pa nos te bdag dam tshig
NK057(shi)001:6538: can du bya ba ni gsum pa'o //
NK057(shi)001:6539: de nas sgrub pa la sogs pa'i man ngag thams
NK057(shi)001:6540: cad nos te man ngag can du bya ba ni
NK057(shi)001:6541: bzhi pa ste / de phan chad kyang spro ba
NK057(shi)001:6542: mi lhod cing brtson pa mi 'dor bas bka' bzhin
